original: rnam shes la sogs bye brag tu //
analyzed: rnam shes la sogs bye brag tu //
translated: The consciousness, etc., are the particular ones.

original: zhes bya ba la rnam par shes pa dang / sems dang yid ces bya ba rnam grangs so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la rnam par shes pa dang / sems dang yid ces bya ba rnam grangs so //
translated: Here, consciousness, mind, and thought are synonyms.

original: sems kyi gnas ni snying yin no //
analyzed: sems kyi gnas ni snying yin no //
translated: The abode of the mind is the heart.

original: sogs pa ni bde ba chen po'i bdag nyid dang / longs spyod dang / sprul pa'i @235a * //
analyzed: sogs pa ni bde ba chen po'i bdag nyid dang / longs spyod dang / sprul pa'i @235a * //
translated: The “etc.” refers to the great bliss nature, the enjoyment, and the emanation

original: 'khor lo dang / de rnams mchod sbyin byed pa'o //
analyzed: 'khor lo dang / de rnams mchod sbyin byed pa'o //
translated: wheels, and the offering of those.

original: bye brag tu ni dga' ba'i khyad par tha dad pa'i ni bye brag skye ba'i gnas so //
analyzed: bye brag tu ni dga' ba'i khyad par tha dad pa'i ni bye brag skye ba'i gnas so //
translated: The “particulars” are the different kinds of joy, which are the abodes of birth.

original: de'i don gsal bar gsungs pa ni mchod sbyin ni byang chub kyi sems kyi bdag nyid mchod sbyin no //
analyzed: de'i don gsal bar gsungs pa ni mchod sbyin ni byang chub kyi sems kyi bdag nyid mchod sbyin no //
translated: The meaning of that is stated clearly: “The offering is the offering of the nature of the thought of awakening.

original: tshangs pa ni bde ba'i ye shes te /
analyzed: tshangs pa ni bde ba'i ye shes te /
translated: Brahma is the gnosis of bliss.

original: mchod sbyin yang de yin la tshangs pa yang de yin no //
analyzed: mchod sbyin yang de yin la tshangs pa yang de yin no //
translated: The offering is that, and Brahma is that.

original: g-yul sa che zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: g-yul sa che zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The great battlefield is

original: sku'i 'khor lo'i bzhugs pa'i gnas yin no //
analyzed: sku'i 'khor lo'i bzhugs pa'i gnas yin no //
translated: the abode of the body wheel.

original: longs spyod ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: longs spyod ces bya ba ni /
translated: The enjoyment is

original: gsung gi 'khor lo'o //
analyzed: gsung gi 'khor lo'o //
translated: the speech wheel.

original: rnam par shes pa dang zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa dang zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The consciousness is🔽the mind wheel.

original: thugs kyi 'khor lo'o //
analyzed: thugs kyi 'khor lo'o //
translated: of the mind.

original: nam mkhar ye shes zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: nam mkhar ye shes zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The knowledge in the sky

original: 'pho ba la sogs pa'i ye shes bcas pa'i gnas ni sprul pa'i 'khor lor ro //
analyzed: 'pho ba la sogs pa'i ye shes bcas pa'i gnas ni sprul pa'i 'khor lor ro //
translated: is the abode of the knowledge of transference, etc., in the emanation wheel.

original: de bzhin no zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de bzhin no zhes bya ba ni /
translated: So it is

original: sprul pa'i 'khor lo'i ye shes dang ldan par gsungs pa de bzhin du /
analyzed: sprul pa'i 'khor lo'i ye shes dang ldan par gsungs pa de bzhin du /
translated: . Just as it is said that the emanation wheel is endowed with knowledge,

original: gzhan gsum po yang dag pa la sogs pa'i dngos po la sogs pa gsum dang sbyar ro //
analyzed: gzhan gsum po yang dag pa la sogs pa'i dngos po la sogs pa gsum dang sbyar ro //
translated: so also the other three are to be applied to the three things, such as reality, etc.🔽The eight bodies

original: sku brgyad kyi ni bye brag tu //🔽zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: sku brgyad kyi ni bye brag tu // zhes bya ba ni /
translated: are distinguished.

original: 'khor lo bzhi'i bye brag gis gnas brgyad dang ldan pa'i sku brgyad bskyed pa'i cho ga'o //🔽dngos po rten dang rnam par 'byed //
analyzed: 'khor lo bzhi'i bye brag gis gnas brgyad dang ldan pa'i sku brgyad bskyed pa'i cho ga'o // dngos po rten dang rnam par 'byed //
translated: The eight bodies are generated by the procedure of the eight abodes distinguished by the four wheels.

original: ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: ces bya ba ni /
translated: The thing is the basis and the division.

original: sku'i 'khor lo la sogs pa'i gzhi'i gnas la sogs par dngos po la sogs pa'i mchod sbyin bya zhes bla ma'i man ngag gi 'chang pa'o //🔽ji bzhin 'dod pa sdud pa ni //
analyzed: sku'i 'khor lo la sogs pa'i gzhi'i gnas la sogs par dngos po la sogs pa'i mchod sbyin bya zhes bla ma'i man ngag gi 'chang pa'o // ji bzhin 'dod pa sdud pa ni //
translated: The thing, etc., is to be offered in the abode, etc., of the body wheel, etc., according to the instruction of the guru.

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The gathering of what is desired just as it is🔽is the knowledge of the enjoyment body.

original: bskyed pa dang rdzogs pa'i thig le bstan pa bzhin du /
analyzed: bskyed pa dang rdzogs pa'i thig le bstan pa bzhin du /
translated: Just as the bindu of creation and completion is taught,

original: bde ba'i byang chub kyi sems 'di yang de bzhin no //
analyzed: bde ba'i byang chub kyi sems 'di yang de bzhin no //
translated: so too is this bodhicitta of bliss.

original: mchod sbyin rnal 'byor ma dkyil 'khor //
analyzed: mchod sbyin rnal 'byor ma dkyil 'khor //
translated: The mandala of yoginīs’ offerings

original: zhes bya ba ni 'khor lo bzhi'i rtsa'i dkyil 'khor ni mkha' ni mkha' ma'i dkyil 'khor 'dod pa'i bde ba dang bcas pa'i ngo bo ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni 'khor lo bzhi'i rtsa'i dkyil 'khor ni mkha' ni mkha' ma'i dkyil 'khor 'dod pa'i bde ba dang bcas pa'i ngo bo ste /
translated: is the mandala of the channels of the four cakras, the essence of the bliss of desire,

original: mchog gi dga' ba'i mtshan nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mchog gi dga' ba'i mtshan nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: which becomes the characteristic of supreme joy.

original: phyi'i gnas shes nang gi gnas la 'jug par 'gyur pa'i phyir /
analyzed: phyi'i gnas shes nang gi gnas la 'jug par 'gyur pa'i phyir /
translated: Because of knowing the external locations, one enters the internal locations.

original: de gsungs pa ste /
analyzed: de gsungs pa ste /
translated: Therefore, it is said:

original: au dyan na sogs gnas su ni ;🔽/ zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: au dyan na sogs gnas su ni ; / zhes bya ba ni /
translated: In Oḍḍiyāna and so on,

original: mkha' 'gro ma 'du ba'i gnas ni au dyan dang / dz'a landha ra dang / pulli ra dang / k'a ma r'u dang / ma la ya dang / sindhu dang / nag ra dang / singe la dang / mu mu ni dang / de bi ko t'i dang /
analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma 'du ba'i gnas ni au dyan dang / dz'a landha ra dang / pulli ra dang / k'a ma r'u dang / ma la ya dang / sindhu dang / nag ra dang / singe la dang / mu mu ni dang / de bi ko t'i dang /
translated: the gathering places of the ḍākinīs are Oḍḍiyāna, Jālandhara, Pūrṇagiri, Kāmarūpa, Mālava, Sindhu, Nagara, Siṃhala, Kumārī, and Devīkoṭa.

original: ko ku da dang / aa rbu da dang / ha ri ke la dang / ko ta pa dang / lamba ka dang / @235b k'anytsi dang / las kyi yul dang / gser gyi gling dang / kodga na dang / bi da ra dang / yig dags 'dus pa dang /
analyzed: ko ku da dang / aa rbu da dang / ha ri ke la dang / ko ta pa dang / lamba ka dang / @235b k'anytsi dang / las kyi yul dang / gser gyi gling dang / kodga na dang / bi da ra dang / yig dags 'dus pa dang /
translated: Vidara, and the assembly of letters.🔽Ocean shore, Charita,🔽Youth city, Kasmari, Kerta,🔽Nevale, Karnaja,🔽upper, middle, and lower regions,

original: rgya mtsho'i dogs dang / tsa ri ta dang / gzhon nu'i grong khyer dang / kasma ri dang / ker ta dang / ne ba le dang / kar nu dza dang / sa bla dang / sa steng dang / sa 'og dang / ri rab rtse dang /
analyzed: rgya mtsho'i dogs dang / tsa ri ta dang / gzhon nu'i grong khyer dang / kasma ri dang / ker ta dang / ne ba le dang / kar nu dza dang / sa bla dang / sa steng dang / sa 'og dang / ri rab rtse dang /
translated: Meru peak,🔽Videha in the east,🔽Kuru in the north,🔽Godaniya in the west,

original: shar gyi lus 'phags dang / byang gi sgra mi snyan dang / nub kyi ba lang spyod dang / lho'i 'dzam bu glings dang de rnams so //🔽legs dgyes la sogs lha mo kun //
analyzed: shar gyi lus 'phags dang / byang gi sgra mi snyan dang / nub kyi ba lang spyod dang / lho'i 'dzam bu glings dang de rnams so // legs dgyes la sogs lha mo kun //
translated: and Jambudvipa in the south.

original: zhes pa ni /
analyzed: zhes pa ni /
translated: All goddesses such as Manohara and so forth,

original: lha mo legs dgyes rdo rje ma dang / rdo rje mche ba ma dang / rdo rje glang chen ma dang / 'jigs ma dang ; dpa' mo la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams so //
analyzed: lha mo legs dgyes rdo rje ma dang / rdo rje mche ba ma dang / rdo rje glang chen ma dang / 'jigs ma dang ; dpa' mo la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams so //
translated: ni, Vajradaṃṣṭrī, Vajra-Gajacchāyā, Vajra-Bhīma, and Vajra-Śūrī.

original: k'a li zhes pa la sogs pa ni bla ma'i kha las shes par bya'o //
analyzed: k'a li zhes pa la sogs pa ni bla ma'i kha las shes par bya'o //
translated: The meaning of the words kālī, etc., should be understood from the guru.🔽The various minds of sentient beings

original: sems can sems kyi bye brag tu //🔽zhes bya ba ni /🔽'gro ba'i bsam pa tha dad pa'i dbang gis /
analyzed: sems can sems kyi bye brag tu // zhes bya ba ni / 'gro ba'i bsam pa tha dad pa'i dbang gis /
translated: are the various families of the Tathāgatas.🔽The various intentions of sentient beings are the various families of the Tathāgatas.🔽The various intentions of sentient beings are the various families of the Tathāgatas.

original: sangs rgyas rnams kyi dgongs pa yang de bzhin du mdzad pa yin no ;🔽/ de bas na /
analyzed: sangs rgyas rnams kyi dgongs pa yang de bzhin du mdzad pa yin no ; / de bas na /
translated: The various intentions of sentient beings are the various families of the Tathāgatas.

original: sna tshogs thabs ni rab tu bshad //🔽ces gsungs so //🔽mtshan yang dag par brjod pa las kyang /
analyzed: sna tshogs thabs ni rab tu bshad // ces gsungs so // mtshan yang dag par brjod pa las kyang /
translated: The various intentions of sentient beings are the various families of the Tathāgatas.

original: theg pa sna tshogs thabs tshul gyis //
analyzed: theg pa sna tshogs thabs tshul gyis //
translated: The various intentions of sentient beings are the various families of the Tathāgatas.

original: 'gro ba'i don la rtogs pa po //🔽zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: 'gro ba'i don la rtogs pa po //🔽zhes gsungs so //
translated: The various intentions of sentient beings are the various families of the Tathāgatas.🔽The various intentions of sentient beings are the various families of the Tathāgatas.🔽The various intentions of sentient beings are the various families of the Tathāgatas.🔽The various intentions of sentient beings are the various families of the Tathāgatas.🔽The various intentions of sentient beings are the various families of the Tathāgatas.🔽The various intentions of sentient beings are the various families of the Tathāgatas.🔽The various intentions of sentient beings are the various families of the Tathāgatas.🔽The various intentions of sentient beings are the various families of the Tathāgatas.🔽The various intentions of sentient beings are the various families of the Tathāgatas.

original: bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi sku'i gzugs ji ltar 'thad pa bzhin du mdzad nas thabs rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i sgo nas chos ston pa dang / sprul pa'i sku'i gnas skabs su /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi sku'i gzugs ji ltar 'thad pa bzhin du mdzad nas thabs rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i sgo nas chos ston pa dang / sprul pa'i sku'i gnas skabs su /
translated: In the context of the Transformation Body,

original: sems can rnams la gzigs te /
analyzed: sems can rnams la gzigs te /
translated: he sees sentient beings

original: 'dul ba'i thabs la sogs pa tshul rnam pa bzhi gsungs te /
analyzed: 'dul ba'i thabs la sogs pa tshul rnam pa bzhi gsungs te /
translated: and teaches the four methods, such as the method of conversion.

original: kha cig rnams la 'dul ba'i thabs //
analyzed: kha cig rnams la 'dul ba'i thabs //
translated: For some, the method of conversion.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: And so on.

original: kha cig rnams ni sems can 'dod chags dang bral ba'i lam la khyad par du mos pa rnams la chos bstan pa /
analyzed: kha cig rnams ni sems can 'dod chags dang bral ba'i lam la khyad par du mos pa rnams la chos bstan pa /
translated: For some, he teaches the Dharma to sentient beings who are especially devoted to the path of freedom from desire.

original: 'dul ba'i thabs ni gdul bya de rnams kyi don du'o //
analyzed: 'dul ba'i thabs ni gdul bya de rnams kyi don du'o //
translated: The method of conversion is for the sake of those to be converted.

original: kha cig rnams la mdo sde ni //
analyzed: kha cig rnams la mdo sde ni //
translated: For some, the sutra collection.

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: This means

original: theg pa chen po'i mdo sde dang de las gzhan pa'o //
analyzed: theg pa chen po'i mdo sde dang de las gzhan pa'o //
translated: the Mahayana sutras and those other than that.

original: theg pa chen po ni sbyin pa dang // tshul khrims la sogs pa'i lam la zhugs pa yin la /
analyzed: theg pa chen po ni sbyin pa dang // tshul khrims la sogs pa'i lam la zhugs pa yin la /
translated: The Mahayana is the path of generosity, morality, and so on.

original: gzhan ma ni spyin pa la sog pa bya ba'i lam la ma zhugs pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan ma ni spyin pa la sog pa bya ba'i lam la ma zhugs pa'o //
translated: The other is the one who has not entered the path of action of giving, etc.

original: la la pha rol phyin pa'i lam //
analyzed: la la pha rol phyin pa'i lam //
translated: For some, the path of the perfections.

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: This is the practice

original: sa dang pha rol phyin pa'i sgo nas spyod pa ste /
analyzed: sa dang pha rol phyin pa'i sgo nas spyod pa ste /
translated: from the point of view of the stages and the perfections.

original: sbyin pa la sogs pa'i bya ba rnams so //🔽kha @236a * //
analyzed: sbyin pa la sogs pa'i bya ba rnams so // kha @236a * //
translated: The practices of giving, etc.

original: cig la ni sngags kyang mchog / ces bya ba ni //
analyzed: cig la ni sngags kyang mchog / ces bya ba ni //
translated: For some, the mantra vehicle is supreme.

original: bya ba dang / spyod pa dang / rnal 'byor dang / rnal 'byor bla ma'i spyod pa ni sngags so //
analyzed: bya ba dang / spyod pa dang / rnal 'byor dang / rnal 'byor bla ma'i spyod pa ni sngags so //
translated: The mantra vehicle is the practice of action, the practice of conduct, the practice of yoga, and the supreme practice of yoga.

original: sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa las mchog tu gyur pa'i phyin na mchog go //🔽rab 'bring tha ma'i bya brag tu //
analyzed: sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa las mchog tu gyur pa'i phyin na mchog go // rab 'bring tha ma'i bya brag tu //
translated: It is supreme because it is superior to the stages and the perfections.

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: For some, it is taught in terms of superior, middling, and inferior.

original: rab rnams la ni sngags kyi theg pa gsungs so //
analyzed: rab rnams la ni sngags kyi theg pa gsungs so //
translated: For the superior, the mantra vehicle is taught.

original: 'bring rnams ni sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos gsungs so //🔽tha ma rnams la ni shes rab dam dman pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'bring rnams ni sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos gsungs so // tha ma rnams la ni shes rab dam dman pa'i phyir /
translated: For the middling, the Dharma of the stages and the perfections is taught.

original: bden pa bzhi gsungs te /
analyzed: bden pa bzhi gsungs te /
translated: For the inferior, the four noble truths are taught because of their inferior wisdom.

original: de bas na bcom ldan 'das kyis /
analyzed: de bas na bcom ldan 'das kyis /
translated: Therefore, the Blessed One said:

original: gang zhig dge slong dngos gnas dang // gang yang rtogs pa dga' ba'i mi //
analyzed: gang zhig dge slong dngos gnas dang // gang yang rtogs pa dga' ba'i mi //
translated: and one who delights in realization,

original: gang zhig rgan por gnas pa la //🔽de la de nyid mi bstan no //
analyzed: gang zhig rgan por gnas pa la // de la de nyid mi bstan no //
translated: and one who is an elder,

original: zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes gsungs so //
translated: to them one should not teach reality.

original: thar par 'gro ba'i thabs yin no //
analyzed: thar par 'gro ba'i thabs yin no //
translated: The means for going to liberation

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: is the three vehicles.

original: sna tshogs pa'i thabs de rnams so //
analyzed: sna tshogs pa'i thabs de rnams so //
translated: These are the various means.

original: de yang 'khor ba'i rnam par rtogs pas bcings pa las nges par grol ba'i phyir thar pa'o //
analyzed: de yang 'khor ba'i rnam par rtogs pas bcings pa las nges par grol ba'i phyir thar pa'o //
translated: Moreover, liberation is so called because it is definitely free from being bound by the conceptions of cyclic existence.

original: der 'gro ba'i thabs theg pa gsum po la yod pa'i phyir thar par 'gro ba'i thabs yin pa'o //
analyzed: der 'gro ba'i thabs theg pa gsum po la yod pa'i phyir thar par 'gro ba'i thabs yin pa'o //
translated: The means for going to liberation is so called because it exists in the three vehicles that go there.

original: rtag pa la sogs pa'i phyin ci log rnams kyi gnyen po sdug bsngal la sogs pa'i 'phags pa'i bden pa bsgoms pas /
analyzed: rtag pa la sogs pa'i phyin ci log rnams kyi gnyen po sdug bsngal la sogs pa'i 'phags pa'i bden pa bsgoms pas /
translated: By meditating on the noble truths of suffering and so on, which are the antidotes to the errors of permanence and so on,

original: 'dod chags dang bral ba mngon du byas nas rtogs par byed cing /
analyzed: 'dod chags dang bral ba mngon du byas nas rtogs par byed cing /
translated: one realizes freedom from attachment.

original: dus phyi nas bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs gnyis yongs su rdzogs nas bskal pa grangs med pa bzhis sangs rgyas nyid rdzogs par byed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dus phyi nas bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs gnyis yongs su rdzogs nas bskal pa grangs med pa bzhis sangs rgyas nyid rdzogs par byed par 'gyur ro //
translated: Later, after completing the two collections of merit and wisdom, one will perfect buddhahood in four incalculable aeons.

original: yang mngon par rdzogs pas sa dang pha rol tu phyin pas ma lus pa'i bsod rnams kyi tshogs nyid sbyin pa la sogs pa'i thabs la bslabs pa'i phyir na /
analyzed: yang mngon par rdzogs pas sa dang pha rol tu phyin pas ma lus pa'i bsod rnams kyi tshogs nyid sbyin pa la sogs pa'i thabs la bslabs pa'i phyir na /
translated: Moreover, by training in the means such as generosity, etc., one will complete the collection of merit and wisdom, the stages, and the perfections without exception.🔽Therefore, it is said:

original: bskal pa gsum gyi sangs rgyas ni //🔽zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: bskal pa gsum gyi sangs rgyas ni // zhes gsungs so //
translated: The Buddha in three aeons.

original: de la bskal pa gsum zhes bya ba la bskal pa grangs med pa gsum na 'tshang rgya'o //
analyzed: de la bskal pa gsum zhes bya ba la bskal pa grangs med pa gsum na 'tshang rgya'o //
translated: Here, three aeons means that one will become a buddha in three incalculable aeons.

original: theg pa kun gyi blo gros che //
analyzed: theg pa kun gyi blo gros che //
translated: The great intellect of all vehicles

original: zhes bya ba ni ;
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ;
translated: means

original: theg pa chen po ni dmigs pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / thabs dang / brtson 'grus dang / ye shes dang / kun nas dang / lam chen po dang ldan pa ste /
analyzed: theg pa chen po ni dmigs pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / thabs dang / brtson 'grus dang / ye shes dang / kun nas dang / lam chen po dang ldan pa ste /
translated: the Great Vehicle is endowed with the great object, practice, means, effort, wisdom, and path.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'bras bu dang bcas pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa rnams kyi ngo bo @236b nyid do ;🔽/ de las kyang khyad par du 'gyur ba ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'bras bu dang bcas pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa rnams kyi ngo bo @236b nyid do ; / de las kyang khyad par du 'gyur ba ni /
translated: It is the essence of the Bodhisattva path with its results, and of the perfection of wisdom and so forth.

original: rdo rje theg pa chen po ste /
analyzed: rdo rje theg pa chen po ste /
translated: And it is especially so for the Great Vehicle of the Diamond Way.

original: tshe 'di nyid la sangs rgyas pa'o //
analyzed: tshe 'di nyid la sangs rgyas pa'o //
translated: In this very life, one becomes a Buddha.

original: de bas na /
analyzed: de bas na /
translated: Therefore,

original: sngags theg mos la de ltar min //🔽zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: sngags theg mos la de ltar min // zhes gsungs so //
translated: the Mantra Vehicle is not like that.

original: de la sngags theg ni /
analyzed: de la sngags theg ni /
translated: The Mantra Vehicle is🔽the three: the Action, the Conduct, and the Yoga.

original: bya ba dang / spyod pa dang / rnal 'byor gsum gyis ni de lta min te /
analyzed: bya ba dang / spyod pa dang / rnal 'byor gsum gyis ni de lta min te /
translated: It is not like that.

original: bsgoms pa'i stobs rdzogs pas bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs ma lus pa nyid kyis ni /
analyzed: bsgoms pa'i stobs rdzogs pas bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs ma lus pa nyid kyis ni /
translated: By perfecting the power of meditation, one completes all the accumulations of merit and wisdom.

original: bsgom pa la mchog tu gzhol ba'i phyir /
analyzed: bsgom pa la mchog tu gzhol ba'i phyir /
translated: Because one is supremely devoted to meditation,

original: dus nges pa med pas /
analyzed: dus nges pa med pas /
translated: there is no fixed time.

original: sangs rgyas nyid rdzogs par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: sangs rgyas nyid rdzogs par byed pa yin no //
translated: One perfects Buddhahood itself.

original: rnal 'byor bla ma ni rdzogs rim bsgom pa'i stobs kyis tshe gcig gis sangs rgyas pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: rnal 'byor bla ma ni rdzogs rim bsgom pa'i stobs kyis tshe gcig gis sangs rgyas pa nyid yin no //
translated: The highest Yoga is the perfection of Buddhahood in one lifetime by the power of meditating on the perfection stage.

original: de'i don ni thabs dang / shes rab gnyis su med pa'i rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyun las kyang /🔽bskyed pa'i rim par ldan pa yis //
analyzed: de'i don ni thabs dang / shes rab gnyis su med pa'i rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyun las kyang / bskyed pa'i rim par ldan pa yis //
translated: The means and wisdom that are not two🔽are accomplished in a definite time

original: dus ni nges pa med pas 'grub //
analyzed: dus ni nges pa med pas 'grub //
translated: by one who possesses the stage of generation.

original: rdzogs pa'i don gyi rnal 'byor la //
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i don gyi rnal 'byor la //
translated: In the yoga of the meaning of perfection,

original: tshe gcig tu ni sangs rgyas 'grub //
analyzed: tshe gcig tu ni sangs rgyas 'grub //
translated: buddhahood is accomplished in one lifetime.

original: ces gsungs pa dang / yang slob dpon padma'i rdo rjes mdzad pa las kyang /
analyzed: ces gsungs pa dang / yang slob dpon padma'i rdo rjes mdzad pa las kyang /
translated: And also in the one composed by Master Padmadharma:

original: de nyid lam la 'jug rnams kyi //
analyzed: de nyid lam la 'jug rnams kyi //
translated: Those who enter the path of reality

original: rnal 'byor pa rnams thams cad ni //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa rnams thams cad ni //
translated: are all yogis.

original: thabs dang ldan pa'i sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: thabs dang ldan pa'i sbyor ba yis //
translated: By the union endowed with means,

original: de rnams dngos grub gzhan du min //
analyzed: de rnams dngos grub gzhan du min //
translated: they have powers, not otherwise.

original: bskyed pa'i rim pa'i lam gyis ni //🔽gzhan du yang ni /
analyzed: bskyed pa'i rim pa'i lam gyis ni // gzhan du yang ni /
translated: By the path of the stage of generation,

original: 'gyur ba ste //🔽skye ba du ma'i bar gyis 'grub //
analyzed: 'gyur ba ste // skye ba du ma'i bar gyis 'grub //
translated: they are accomplished in other lives.

original: 'dir ni gcig tu 'grub par 'gyur //
analyzed: 'dir ni gcig tu 'grub par 'gyur //
translated: Here, they are accomplished in one life.

original: de ltar nges par shes bya yi //
analyzed: de ltar nges par shes bya yi //
translated: Thus, it should be known for certain

original: shes rab thabs kyis rnams par bsgom //
analyzed: shes rab thabs kyis rnams par bsgom //
translated: that wisdom and means are cultivated.

original: zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes gsungs so //
translated: And also:

original: rnal 'byor ma khyod smos ci dgos //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma khyod smos ci dgos //
translated: What need is there to mention a yoginī?

original: zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor pha'i rgyud nas rtsa'i man ngag shas chung la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor pha'i rgyud nas rtsa'i man ngag shas chung la /
translated: This is because the father tantras have less instruction on the channels,🔽and the mother tantras have more.

original: ma rgyud nas shas che ba dang / de bzhin du rnal 'byor pa'i ye shes skye ba bul la /
analyzed: ma rgyud nas shas che ba dang / de bzhin du rnal 'byor pa'i ye shes skye ba bul la /
translated: Similarly, the wisdom of the yogi arises slowly,

original: rnal 'byor ma'i myur ba'i dpes so //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma'i myur ba'i dpes so //
translated: and the wisdom of the yoginī arises quickly.

original: de skad du lung las kyang /🔽rnal 'byor ma rnams rnyed mi dka' //
analyzed: de skad du lung las kyang / rnal 'byor ma rnams rnyed mi dka' //
translated: This is stated in the scriptures:🔽The yoginīs are not difficult to find.

original: rnal 'byor cung zad rnyed dka' ba //
analyzed: rnal 'byor cung zad rnyed dka' ba //
translated: The yogis are a little difficult to find.

original: thabs ni rab kyis rnyed 'gyur te /
analyzed: thabs ni rab kyis rnyed 'gyur te /
translated: The method is found by the best,

original: thabs rab min na nam yang min //
analyzed: thabs rab min na nam yang min //
translated: but not at all by the middling method.

original: zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes gsungs so //
translated: Thus it is said.

original: de'i phyir khyad par yod pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir khyad par yod pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, there is a difference.

original: tshe 'di la ni sangs rgyas so //
analyzed: tshe 'di la ni sangs rgyas so //
translated: In this life, one becomes a buddha.

original: zhas bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs bcad lnga ni go sla bas ma bshad do //
analyzed: zhas bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs bcad lnga ni go sla bas ma bshad do //
translated: The five verses beginning with this are easy to understand and are not explained.

original: dpal ye shes thig le'i dka' 'grel gsang ba'i de kho na nyid ces bya ba @237a * //
analyzed: dpal ye shes thig le'i dka' 'grel gsang ba'i de kho na nyid ces bya ba @237a * //
translated: The commentary on the difficult points of the glorious Wisdom Drop, called the Secret Thatness,

original: le'u drug pa'i bshad pa'o /
analyzed: le'u drug pa'i bshad pa'o /
translated: is the explanation of the sixth chapter.

original: // / de nas mchod pa'i cho ga ni //
analyzed: // / de nas mchod pa'i cho ga ni //
translated: Then, the ritual of worship,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: and so forth.

original: de nas zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Then,🔽

original: bar ma chad pa'i tshig yin te /
analyzed: bar ma chad pa'i tshig yin te /
translated: Then is a word of immediate sequence.

original: mchod pa ni me tog la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: mchod pa ni me tog la sogs pa'o //
translated: Worship is with flowers, etc.

original: cho ga ni mchod bya dang / mchod byed dang / mchod rdzas la sogs pa'i cho ga rdzogs pa'o //
analyzed: cho ga ni mchod bya dang / mchod byed dang / mchod rdzas la sogs pa'i cho ga rdzogs pa'o //
translated: The rite is the completion of the rite of the worshipper, the worshipped, the articles of worship, etc.

original: sdig pa ni dge ba ma yin pa'i glo bur ba'i 'o //
analyzed: sdig pa ni dge ba ma yin pa'i glo bur ba'i 'o //
translated: Sin is the adventitious impurity which is not virtue.

original: thams cad ni 'dod chags la sogs pa'i rtog pa'i mtshan nyid thams cad 'khor ba'i rgyu'o //🔽'jig byed pa ni mchod pa'i cho ga'i 'bras bu de kho na nyid kyis glu bur ba'i dri ma dag pa'i phyir ;
analyzed: thams cad ni 'dod chags la sogs pa'i rtog pa'i mtshan nyid thams cad 'khor ba'i rgyu'o // 'jig byed pa ni mchod pa'i cho ga'i 'bras bu de kho na nyid kyis glu bur ba'i dri ma dag pa'i phyir ;
translated: All is the cause of cyclic existence, characterized by all the concepts of passion, etc.

original: 'jig par byed pa'o //
analyzed: 'jig par byed pa'o //
translated: The destroyer is the destroyer of the adventitious defilements by means of the reality which is the fruit of the rite of worship.

original: yid 'phrog ces bya ba la sogs pa ni /
analyzed: yid 'phrog ces bya ba la sogs pa ni /
translated: The captivating etc.

original: nges par bstan pa'i gnas skabs kyis shes pra 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nges par bstan pa'i gnas skabs kyis shes pra 'gyur ro //
translated: is to be understood by the situation of the definitive teaching.

original: byang chub sems 'byung mchod pa yis //🔽zhes bya ba la sogs la /
analyzed: byang chub sems 'byung mchod pa yis // zhes bya ba la sogs la /
translated: The arising of the Thought of Enlightenment etc.🔽is to be understood by the situation of the definitive teaching.🔽The arising of the Thought of Enlightenment etc.🔽is to be understood by the situation of the definitive teaching.🔽The arising of the Thought of Enlightenment etc.🔽is to be understood by the situation of the definitive teaching.🔽The arising of the Thought of Enlightenment etc.🔽is to be understood by the situation of the definitive teaching.🔽The arising of the Thought of Enlightenment etc.🔽is to be understood by the situation of the definitive teaching.🔽The arising of the Thought of Enlightenment etc.🔽is to be understood by the situation of the definitive teaching.🔽The arising of the Thought of Enlightenment etc.🔽is to be understood by the situation of the definitive teaching.🔽The arising of the Thought of Enlightenment etc.🔽is to be understood by the situation of the definitive teaching.🔽The arising of the Thought of Enlightenment etc.🔽is to be understood by the situation of the definitive teaching.🔽The arising of the Thought of Enlightenment etc.🔽is to be understood by the situation of the definitive teaching.🔽The arising of the Thought of Enlightenment etc.

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i rgyur 'gyur ba'i phyir byang chub sems yin no //
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i rgyur 'gyur ba'i phyir byang chub sems yin no //
translated: is to be understood by the situation of the definitive teaching.

original: de bral ba la sogs pa'i bdag nyid kyi gnas rnams su 'bab pa ni 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: de bral ba la sogs pa'i bdag nyid kyi gnas rnams su 'bab pa ni 'byung ba'o //
translated: The descent of the bodhicitta into the places of the nature of the absence of that and so forth is the emergence.

original: mchod pas zhes pa ni /
analyzed: mchod pas zhes pa ni /
translated: The worship is

original: mchod pa'i cho ga rdzogs par byed pa'i phyir mchod pa'o //
analyzed: mchod pa'i cho ga rdzogs par byed pa'i phyir mchod pa'o //
translated: the worship that is performed by means of the rite of worship.

original: yar ngo ni mchod sbyin yin te sngar bstan pa'o //
analyzed: yar ngo ni mchod sbyin yin te sngar bstan pa'o //
translated: The bright fortnight is the sacrifice, as previously explained.

original: mar do ni mchod pa'i cho ga yin no //
analyzed: mar do ni mchod pa'i cho ga yin no //
translated: The dark fortnight is the rite of worship.

original: bye brag ni tha dad pa'i dngos po'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: bye brag ni tha dad pa'i dngos po'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: The distinction is the characteristic of the different things.

original: shes rab ni mchod pa'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: shes rab ni mchod pa'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: Wisdom is the characteristic of worship.

original: de bzhin du mchod sbyin gyi mtshan nyid thabs so //
analyzed: de bzhin du mchod sbyin gyi mtshan nyid thabs so //
translated: Similarly, the characteristic of the sacrifice is method.

original: sbyor ba ni ro gcig pa'i ngo bo mchog gi dga' bar ro //
analyzed: sbyor ba ni ro gcig pa'i ngo bo mchog gi dga' bar ro //
translated: The union is the supreme joy of the nature of one taste.

original: mchod pa'i mtshan nyid ni chad pa'i dga' ba'o //
analyzed: mchod pa'i mtshan nyid ni chad pa'i dga' ba'o //
translated: The characteristic of worship is the joy of cessation.

original: mchod sbyin gyi mtshan nyid ni mchog gi dga' ba'o //
analyzed: mchod sbyin gyi mtshan nyid ni mchog gi dga' ba'o //
translated: The characteristic of the sacrifice is the supreme joy.

original: ro gcig pa ni rang bzhin gyi dga' ba'o //
analyzed: ro gcig pa ni rang bzhin gyi dga' ba'o //
translated: One taste is the joy of the nature.

original: de dag las de kho na nyid rnyed par 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: de dag las de kho na nyid rnyed par 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: The reality of those is attained.

original: sku gsum ye shes dkyil 'khor ni //
analyzed: sku gsum ye shes dkyil 'khor ni //
translated: The mandala of the three bodies and gnosis🔽is

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: This is the meaning of the above verse.

original: chos kyi sku la sogs pa'i gsum po ni /
analyzed: chos kyi sku la sogs pa'i gsum po ni /
translated: The three, the dharmakāya and so forth,

original: thim pa dang / longs spyad dang / dbang gsum gyi ye shes dga' ba rnams kyi bdag nyid yin no //
analyzed: thim pa dang / longs spyad dang / dbang gsum gyi ye shes dga' ba rnams kyi bdag nyid yin no //
translated: are the nature of the wisdoms of the three, dissolution, enjoyment, and power, and of the joys.

original: tshes ni mar ngo'i bcu drug nas bgrangs pa'i tshes so //
analyzed: tshes ni mar ngo'i bcu drug nas bgrangs pa'i tshes so //
translated: The lunar day is the lunar day counted from the sixteenth of the waning phase.

original: yi ge ni a'a li'i yi ge bcu drug go //
analyzed: yi ge ni a'a li'i yi ge bcu drug go //
translated: The syllable is the sixteen vowels.

original: sngags ni sems srung bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sngags ni sems srung bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The mantra is the mantra that protects the mind.

original: ri bong can ni zla ba dang ldan pa'i don du gnas pa'o //
analyzed: ri bong can ni zla ba dang ldan pa'i don du gnas pa'o //
translated: The rabbit is the moon.

original: 'phel bar 'gyur ba ni /
analyzed: 'phel bar 'gyur ba ni /
translated: The increase is

original: skye zhing 'phel bar rdzogs pa'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: skye zhing 'phel bar rdzogs pa'i tha tshig go //
translated: the completion of the arising and increasing.

original: thig le ni @237b bde ba'i byang chub kyi thig le bco lnga dang ldan no //
analyzed: thig le ni @237b bde ba'i byang chub kyi thig le bco lnga dang ldan no //
translated: The drop is endowed with the fifteen drops of the bodhicitta of bliss.

original: mkha' ni rtsa gnas kyi gtso bo dang bcas pa'o //
analyzed: mkha' ni rtsa gnas kyi gtso bo dang bcas pa'o //
translated: The space is the principal place of the nāḍīs.

original: 'gog pa ni rdzogs par byed pa'i ngo bo de mnyam pa'i ror gyur pa'o //
analyzed: 'gog pa ni rdzogs par byed pa'i ngo bo de mnyam pa'i ror gyur pa'o //
translated: The cessation is the nature of the completion, which becomes the taste of the sameness.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: 'gog pa yis zhes gsungs pa'i gtan tshigs dang ldan pa yin no //
analyzed: 'gog pa yis zhes gsungs pa'i gtan tshigs dang ldan pa yin no //
translated: It is because of the reason stated as “cessation.”

original: rang bzhin ni gnyis su med pa'i don de kho na nyid do //
analyzed: rang bzhin ni gnyis su med pa'i don de kho na nyid do //
translated: Nature is the reality of non-dual meaning.

original: 'byung bar 'gyur ba ni //
analyzed: 'byung bar 'gyur ba ni //
translated: Arising is

original: thabs dang shes rab spyor ba'i don gyis 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab spyor ba'i don gyis 'byung ba'o //
translated: arising by the meaning of the practice of method and wisdom.

original: thig le'i rang bzhin ye shes te //
analyzed: thig le'i rang bzhin ye shes te //
translated: The nature of the bindu is pristine consciousness.

original: zhes 'byung ba ni /
analyzed: zhes 'byung ba ni /
translated: This is stated.

original: byang chub sems bde ba'i thig le'i bdag nyid rang bzhin dga' ba'i ye shes te /
analyzed: byang chub sems bde ba'i thig le'i bdag nyid rang bzhin dga' ba'i ye shes te /
translated: The bodhicitta is the nature of the bindu of bliss, the pristine consciousness of natural joy,

original: sngon dang / phyi ma dang / da ltar dang / gzung ba dang / 'dzin pa la sogs pa thams cad dang rang bzhin gyis bral ba mnyam pa nyid do //
analyzed: sngon dang / phyi ma dang / da ltar dang / gzung ba dang / 'dzin pa la sogs pa thams cad dang rang bzhin gyis bral ba mnyam pa nyid do //
translated: free from all former, later, present, apprehended, apprehender, and so on, the equality of nature.

original: sangs rgyas kun ni rnam par sna mdzad la sogs pa thams cad do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun ni rnam par sna mdzad la sogs pa thams cad do //
translated: All buddhas are all the buddhas such as Vairocana.

original: yang zhes bya ba'i sgras ni /
analyzed: yang zhes bya ba'i sgras ni /
translated: The word also

original: sangs rgyas kyis kyang mi rnyed na /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyis kyang mi rnyed na /
translated: means that if it is not found by the buddhas,

original: gzhan rnams kyis ni rnyed pa ha cang ches zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: gzhan rnams kyis ni rnyed pa ha cang ches zhes pa'i don to //
translated: it is too much for others to find.

original: rnyed par dka' ba ni /
analyzed: rnyed par dka' ba ni /
translated: The difficult to find

original: don dam pa so sor rang rig pa de'i mtshan nyid 'di ni /
analyzed: don dam pa so sor rang rig pa de'i mtshan nyid 'di ni /
translated: is the characteristic of that ultimate reality that is individually realized.

original: tshig dang yi ge'i rnam par rtog pa'i yul las 'das pa'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: tshig dang yi ge'i rnam par rtog pa'i yul las 'das pa'i rang bzhin no //
translated: It is the nature that transcends the domain of conceptual thoughts of words and letters.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: bstan pa thams cad ni kun rdzob yin te ;
analyzed: bstan pa thams cad ni kun rdzob yin te ;
translated: All teachings are conventional.

original: dper na dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal bstan pa na /
analyzed: dper na dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal bstan pa na /
translated: For example, when the suffering of hell is taught,

original: de thos pas nyams su mi myongs ba bzhin no //
analyzed: de thos pas nyams su mi myongs ba bzhin no //
translated: it is not experienced by hearing it.

original: de skad du ye shes mnyam pa'i rgyud las kyang /
analyzed: de skad du ye shes mnyam pa'i rgyud las kyang /
translated: Thus it is said in the Tantra of the Equality of Wisdom:

original: spros pa med pa'i mchog nyid ni //🔽sangs rgyas la sogs kun gyis kyang //
analyzed: spros pa med pa'i mchog nyid ni // sangs rgyas la sogs kun gyis kyang //
translated: The supreme absence of conceptual elaborations🔽is not described by any measure

original: de yi tshad ma brjod pa med //🔽ji snyed brjod pa kun rdzob yin //
analyzed: de yi tshad ma brjod pa med // ji snyed brjod pa kun rdzob yin //
translated: by the buddhas and so forth.

original: zhes gsungs so //🔽bdag gi bka' drin rang bzhin myur //
analyzed: zhes gsungs so // bdag gi bka' drin rang bzhin myur //
translated: All that is described is conventional.

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The nature of those who are kind to me is swift.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis man ngag bka' stsal pa'i drin gyis sems can skal ba dang ldan pa rnams kyi rang bzhin don myur du 'thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis man ngag bka' stsal pa'i drin gyis sems can skal ba dang ldan pa rnams kyi rang bzhin don myur du 'thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: By the kindness of the Bhagavān's instructions, the nature of fortunate sentient beings is swiftly attained.

original: the tshom med par rnyed pa yin ;🔽/ zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: the tshom med par rnyed pa yin ;🔽/ zhes bya ba ni /
translated: It is obtained without doubt.

original: yid gnyis kyi sems ma yin zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: yid gnyis kyi sems ma yin zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The phrase not a mind of doubt means

original: nges par zung shig ces pa'i don to //
analyzed: nges par zung shig ces pa'i don to //
translated: that one should grasp it with certainty.

original: blun po gang gis zhes pa ni /
analyzed: blun po gang gis zhes pa ni /
translated: The phrase by what fools means

original: shes rab dman pa'i byis pa la sogs pa rnams so //
analyzed: shes rab dman pa'i byis pa la sogs pa rnams so //
translated: by childish people who have little wisdom.

original: bdag ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: bdag ces bya ba ni /
translated: The phrase the self means

original: thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa'i ros @238a * //
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa'i ros @238a * //
translated: the taste of the nondual union of method and wisdom.

original: thams cad la khyab kyang mthong ba ma yin no //
analyzed: thams cad la khyab kyang mthong ba ma yin no //
translated: Although it pervades everything, it is not seen.

original: mi shes pa ni rtogs par dka' ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mi shes pa ni rtogs par dka' ba'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because the ignorant find it difficult to understand.

original: ci'i phyir blun po rnams kyis mi shes she na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir blun po rnams kyis mi shes she na /
translated: Why is it that fools do not understand?

original: de'i don gsungs pa ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: de'i don gsungs pa ni 'di yin te /
translated: The meaning of that is stated:

original: bsam gtan rags la rtag mos pa //
analyzed: bsam gtan rags la rtag mos pa //
translated: They are always devoted to coarse meditative concentration.

original: zhes bya ba dang / dngos po rtog pa la zhen pa'i phyir bsam gtan rags pa yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba dang / dngos po rtog pa la zhen pa'i phyir bsam gtan rags pa yin no //
translated: Because they cling to conceptual things, their meditative concentration is coarse.

original: de'i rnam pa la dga' zhing 'dun pas na rtag mos pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de'i rnam pa la dga' zhing 'dun pas na rtag mos pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Since they delight in and aspire to its aspects, they are called always devoted.

original: de rnams kun ni 'grub pa med //
analyzed: de rnams kun ni 'grub pa med //
translated: All of them are not accomplished.

original: lha yi dbang phyug bden pa'o //🔽zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: lha yi dbang phyug bden pa'o //🔽zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The lord of gods is true.

original: bsam gtan rags pa'i rtog pa can kun gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mi 'grub pa bden pa kho na'o zhes sdud pa po la gsungs pa'i don to //
analyzed: bsam gtan rags pa'i rtog pa can kun gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mi 'grub pa bden pa kho na'o zhes sdud pa po la gsungs pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that the compiler was told, It is certainly true that all those with coarse conceptual thoughts in meditative concentration will not attain unsurpassed perfect complete awakening.

original: shes rab dang thabs kyi ros thams cad la khyab pa mi mthong ba de gang yin snyam pa la /
analyzed: shes rab dang thabs kyi ros thams cad la khyab pa mi mthong ba de gang yin snyam pa la /
translated: What is it that does not see the pervasion of everything with the taste of wisdom and method?

original: de'i don tshigs su bcad pa gsum gyis ston te /
analyzed: de'i don tshigs su bcad pa gsum gyis ston te /
translated: The meaning of that is taught in three verses.

original: sa kun dbang phyug gi bdag po //
analyzed: sa kun dbang phyug gi bdag po //
translated: The lord of all stages,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: and so on is said.

original: sa kun ni bcu drug gnas pa'o //
analyzed: sa kun ni bcu drug gnas pa'o //
translated: All stages are the sixteen abodes.

original: de rnams la dbang ba'i phyir dang phyug kyang yin la /
analyzed: de rnams la dbang ba'i phyir dang phyug kyang yin la /
translated: Because he has power over them, he is also wealthy.

original: bdag po yin te kun gyis bdag po bcom ldan 'das dpal ye shes thig le spros pa dang bral ba 'bras bu zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: bdag po yin te kun gyis bdag po bcom ldan 'das dpal ye shes thig le spros pa dang bral ba 'bras bu zhes bya ba'o //
translated: He is the lord of all. The lord of all is the glorious Bhagavān Jñānatilaka, free from proliferation, called the result.

original: de nyid gzhan la rag ma las par bdag rang la mnga' bas mnga' bdag go //
analyzed: de nyid gzhan la rag ma las par bdag rang la mnga' bas mnga' bdag go //
translated: Since he himself possesses that without depending on another, he is the lord.

original: de nyid ni sa kun gyi yon tan dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' mi thub pa'i phyir rgyal po'o //
analyzed: de nyid ni sa kun gyi yon tan dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' mi thub pa'i phyir rgyal po'o //
translated: It is the king because it is invincible to the Buddhas and Bodhisattvas who are endowed with the virtues of all the stages.

original: de nyid ni 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i skyon gyis ma gos pa'i phyir bdag nyid do //🔽de nyid de bdag la khyab pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de nyid ni 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i skyon gyis ma gos pa'i phyir bdag nyid do // de nyid de bdag la khyab pa'i phyir /
translated: It is the self because it is unstained by the faults of cyclic existence and nirvana.

original: kun nas bdag go //
analyzed: kun nas bdag go //
translated: It is the all-pervading self because it pervades that self.🔽It is the all-encompassing self because it pervades all things.

original: de nyid ni de dag gi mtha' la mi gnas pa'i phyir /🔽thams cad la rtag tu stong zhes bya ste /
analyzed: de nyid ni de dag gi mtha' la mi gnas pa'i phyir / thams cad la rtag tu stong zhes bya ste /
translated: It is the emptiness of all things because it does not dwell in the extremes of those things.

original: chos thams cad la khyab pa tha ma'i mthar thug pa ji srid du rgyun mi 'chad par bzhugs pa'i phyir /
analyzed: chos thams cad la khyab pa tha ma'i mthar thug pa ji srid du rgyun mi 'chad par bzhugs pa'i phyir /
translated: It is the permanent emptiness because it pervades all things, and because it abides without interruption until the end of cyclic existence.

original: rtag tu stong pa dngos po dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: rtag tu stong pa dngos po dang bral ba'o //
translated: It is the emptiness devoid of substance.

original: de nyid bsgrub bya yin pa'i phyir //
analyzed: de nyid bsgrub bya yin pa'i phyir //
translated: It is the object of attainment because it is the goal.

original: kun gyis mchod cing phyag 'dzad pa'i gnas so //🔽de nyid sgyu ma lta bu'i shes rab dang / thabs las byung ba'i phyir /
analyzed: kun gyis mchod cing phyag 'dzad pa'i gnas so // de nyid sgyu ma lta bu'i shes rab dang / thabs las byung ba'i phyir /
translated: It is the object of worship and obeisance by all.

original: shes rab dang thabs kyi rang bzhin du grags pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab dang thabs kyi rang bzhin du grags pa'o //
translated: It is renowned as the essence of wisdom and method because it arises from the wisdom and method that are like an illusion.

original: de nyid sangs rgyas dang sems can thams cad la dbang byed pas na /
analyzed: de nyid sangs rgyas dang sems can thams cad la dbang byed pas na /
translated: Since it is the master of all buddhas and sentient beings,

original: @238b 'gro med 'gro la bdag nyid rol lo //
analyzed: @238b 'gro med 'gro la bdag nyid rol lo //
translated: it is the play of the self in the non-going and going of beings.

original: de nyid ni 'jig rten pa dang / bstan bcos la grags pa'i nam mkha' las mchog tu gyur pas na /
analyzed: de nyid ni 'jig rten pa dang / bstan bcos la grags pa'i nam mkha' las mchog tu gyur pas na /
translated: Since it is superior to the space known in the world and in the treatises,

original: mchog gi nam mkha'o //
analyzed: mchog gi nam mkha'o //
translated: it is the supreme space.

original: mtha' gnyis grol bas na mtha' med pa nyid pa nyid do //
analyzed: mtha' gnyis grol bas na mtha' med pa nyid pa nyid do //
translated: Since it is free from the two extremes, it is the infinite.

original: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam pa rtog pa'i dngos po ni don dam par med pas na /
analyzed: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam pa rtog pa'i dngos po ni don dam par med pas na /
translated: Since the things that are the aspects of apprehended and apprehender do not exist ultimately,

original: mngon sum du bya ba'i ye shes de yang rnam par rtog pa'i shes pa yin te /
analyzed: mngon sum du bya ba'i ye shes de yang rnam par rtog pa'i shes pa yin te /
translated: that wisdom that is to be manifested is also a conceptual consciousness.

original: skra'i rtse mo 'bum gyi cha tsam yang dmigs su med pa'i phyir /🔽mtshan nyid dang bral gnas dang bral //
analyzed: skra'i rtse mo 'bum gyi cha tsam yang dmigs su med pa'i phyir / mtshan nyid dang bral gnas dang bral //
translated: Because it is not observed even to the extent of a hundredth or a thousandth part of the tip of a hair.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: It is said that it is free from characteristics and free from abode.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' drin gyi man ngag gang yin snyam pa la /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' drin gyi man ngag gang yin snyam pa la /
translated: What is the intimate instruction of the kindness of the Bhagavān?

original: chos dang longs spyod dag gi mtha' //
analyzed: chos dang longs spyod dag gi mtha' //
translated: The end of phenomena and enjoyment

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: and so on.

original: de la chos ni thugs kyi 'khor lo'o //
analyzed: de la chos ni thugs kyi 'khor lo'o //
translated: There, the Dharma is the mind wheel.

original: longs spyod ni gsung gi 'khor lo'o //
analyzed: longs spyod ni gsung gi 'khor lo'o //
translated: Enjoyment is the speech wheel.

original: bdag ni ye shes kyi 'khor lo'o //
analyzed: bdag ni ye shes kyi 'khor lo'o //
translated: The self is the gnosis wheel.

original: mtha' ni sku'i 'khor lo'o //
analyzed: mtha' ni sku'i 'khor lo'o //
translated: The end is the body wheel.

original: de rnams kyi don ni dga' ba rnams dang yang sbyar bar bya ba yin no //
analyzed: de rnams kyi don ni dga' ba rnams dang yang sbyar bar bya ba yin no //
translated: The meaning of those should be connected with the joys.

original: ye shes rnam shes ngo bo bdag //
analyzed: ye shes rnam shes ngo bo bdag //
translated: The self is the essence of gnosis and consciousness.

original: ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no //
translated: And so forth.

original: dpal ye shes thig le'i dka' 'grel gsang ba'i de kho na nyid ces bya ba le'u bdun pa'i bshad pa'o /
analyzed: dpal ye shes thig le'i dka' 'grel gsang ba'i de kho na nyid ces bya ba le'u bdun pa'i bshad pa'o /
translated: The explanation of the seventh chapter of the commentary called the Secret Suchness of the Shri-jñana-bindu.

original: // / da ni sdig pa dang bral bas dngos grub rnam gnyis 'grub pa'i phyir /
analyzed: // / da ni sdig pa dang bral bas dngos grub rnam gnyis 'grub pa'i phyir /
translated: Now, in order to accomplish the two kinds of powers by being free from sin,

original: sbyin sreg gsungs pa ni /
analyzed: sbyin sreg gsungs pa ni /
translated: the fire sacrifice is taught.

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: It begins with Then.

original: phrin las rnams bzhi bshad pa ni /
analyzed: phrin las rnams bzhi bshad pa ni /
translated: The explanation of the four actions

original: zhi ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: zhi ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: begins with the line Pacification.,

original: de'i tshe brda yis bstan pa ni //🔽rgyas mtsho me dang mig zla la //
analyzed: de'i tshe brda yis bstan pa ni // rgyas mtsho me dang mig zla la //
translated: and the symbolic teaching at that time is

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: the line The ocean of increase, fire, and the moon.,

original: me'i lha spyan 'dren pa ni /
analyzed: me'i lha spyan 'dren pa ni /
translated: The invocation of the fire god is

original: lag pas bskor zhing mdzub mos g-yob pa ste /
analyzed: lag pas bskor zhing mdzub mos g-yob pa ste /
translated: The hand is the encircling, and the finger is the pointing.

original: de'i phyir mdzub mo dang / rgya mtsho la sogs pa'i brda bshad do //🔽de la rgya mtsho bdun du grags pas rgyas pa'i kha khyer dang / zabs su bsgres la /
analyzed: de'i phyir mdzub mo dang / rgya mtsho la sogs pa'i brda bshad do // de la rgya mtsho bdun du grags pas rgyas pa'i kha khyer dang / zabs su bsgres la /
translated: Therefore, the finger and the ocean and so forth are explained as the mudra.

original: mdzub bdun no //
analyzed: mdzub bdun no //
translated: There, the seven oceans are known as the encircling, and the depth is seven fingers.

original: me ni me lha bdun zhes grags pas /
analyzed: me ni me lha bdun zhes grags pas /
translated: The fire is known as the seven fire gods.

original: dbang gi yang mdzub bdun gyis gnas skabs kyi kha khyer dang shul dang zabs su'o //
analyzed: dbang gi yang mdzub bdun gyis gnas skabs kyi kha khyer dang shul dang zabs su'o //
translated: The depth is seven fingers.🔽The eye is known as the three-eyed fire god.

original: mig ni me lha spyan gsum par grags pas drag po'i kha khyer la mdzub gnyis zabs su brtsig go //
analyzed: mig ni me lha spyan gsum par grags pas drag po'i kha khyer la mdzub gnyis zabs su brtsig go //
translated: The depth is two fingers.

original: zla ba ni dus bzhi zla bar grags pas zhi ba'i kha khyer la mdzub gnyis dang / gcig gi sum gnyis /
analyzed: zla ba ni dus bzhi zla bar grags pas zhi ba'i kha khyer la mdzub gnyis dang / gcig gi sum gnyis /
translated: The moon is known as the four-part moon.

original: @239a * // zabs su gcig dang sum cha'o //
analyzed: @239a * // zabs su gcig dang sum cha'o //
translated: The depth is one and one-third.

original: lha yi dbang phyug tshad yin no //🔽zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: lha yi dbang phyug tshad yin no // zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The lord of gods is the measure.

original: de rnams thab khung gi tshad yin pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams thab khung gi tshad yin pa'o //
translated: This is the measure of the hearth.

original: gzhan ma kun gyi rim pas gcig / ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: gzhan ma kun gyi rim pas gcig / ces bya ba ni /
translated: One is in the order of all others.

original: dgug pa dang bskrad pa dang dbye ba dang / mnan pa dang / bcing ba la sogs pa yang bzhi po dang gcig pa'o //🔽de'i phyir / sngar grub kyis ni gzhan ma grub //
analyzed: dgug pa dang bskrad pa dang dbye ba dang / mnan pa dang / bcing ba la sogs pa yang bzhi po dang gcig pa'o // de'i phyir / sngar grub kyis ni gzhan ma grub //
translated: Summoning, expelling, separating, pressing down, binding, and so on, are also the same as the four.🔽Therefore, it is said:

original: ces gsungs so //
analyzed: ces gsungs so //
translated: “The other is not established by the previously established.”

original: dam tshig sems dpa'i rim pa la sogs pa'i don bstan pa hom khung zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: dam tshig sems dpa'i rim pa la sogs pa'i don bstan pa hom khung zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: The meaning of the stage of the pledge being, and so on, is taught by “the fire pit,” and so on.

original: yo byad kyi rim pa la sogs pa /
analyzed: yo byad kyi rim pa la sogs pa /
translated: The stage of the articles, and so on,

original: mkhas pa yis ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o ;
analyzed: mkhas pa yis ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o ;
translated: is taught by “the wise one,” and so on.

original: / rnal 'byor pa sgrub pa po'i mtshan nyid tshigs bcad phyed dang gnyis kyis gsungs pa /
analyzed: / rnal 'byor pa sgrub pa po'i mtshan nyid tshigs bcad phyed dang gnyis kyis gsungs pa /
translated: The characteristics of the practitioner, the yogi, are taught by one and a half verses.

original: sgrub pa'i dbang po zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: sgrub pa'i dbang po zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: The meaning of “the lord of practice,” and so on, is as follows.

original: de la sgrub pa'i dbang po ni bsgrub pa'i bdag po'i don yin no //
analyzed: de la sgrub pa'i dbang po ni bsgrub pa'i bdag po'i don yin no //
translated: Therein, the lord of practice is the meaning of the master of practice.

original: thig le'i don ni mchog gi dga' ba'o //
analyzed: thig le'i don ni mchog gi dga' ba'o //
translated: The meaning of the drop is supreme joy.

original: tshul ni dga' ba'o ;
analyzed: tshul ni dga' ba'o ;
translated: The method is joy.

original: / ye shes ni rang bzhin dga' ba'o //
analyzed: / ye shes ni rang bzhin dga' ba'o //
translated: Wisdom is natural joy.

original: bye brag ni dga' ba bzhi'i mtshan nyid de /
analyzed: bye brag ni dga' ba bzhi'i mtshan nyid de /
translated: The distinction is the characteristic of the four joys.

original: chad pa'i dga' ba dang bcas pa'i shes pa bsgrub pa'o //
analyzed: chad pa'i dga' ba dang bcas pa'i shes pa bsgrub pa'o //
translated: and the attainment of consciousness endowed with the bliss of cessation.

original: rin chen rigs ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs yin no /
analyzed: rin chen rigs ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs yin no /
translated: The jewel family is the Tathagata family.

original: gzhan na re gang zag rin po che'i rigs su nges te /
analyzed: gzhan na re gang zag rin po che'i rigs su nges te /
translated: According to another, the jewel family is the person of definite jewel lineage.

original: slob ma la bshad pa'i skabs so zhes zer ro //
analyzed: slob ma la bshad pa'i skabs so zhes zer ro //
translated: This is the section on the disciple.

original: da ni de'i phyag rgya tshigs bcad gnyis kyis gsungs te /
analyzed: da ni de'i phyag rgya tshigs bcad gnyis kyis gsungs te /
translated: Now, his seal is stated in two verses.

original: rigs lnga'i gzhon nu ma ni lnga zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: rigs lnga'i gzhon nu ma ni lnga zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: The five young girls of the five families are the five.

original: thod pa ma srid mo'i bdag nyid kyis sangs rgyas spyan du bsgom pa yin te zhi ba'i las bya'o //🔽brtso blag mkhan ma'i bdag nyid kyis rgyas pa'i las bya'o //
analyzed: thod pa ma srid mo'i bdag nyid kyis sangs rgyas spyan du bsgom pa yin te zhi ba'i las bya'o // brtso blag mkhan ma'i bdag nyid kyis rgyas pa'i las bya'o //
translated: The skull-bearing woman is visualized as Buddhalocana, and one should perform the pacifying rite.🔽The weaver woman is visualized as Mamaki, and one should perform the enriching rite.

original: gtum mo sgyug mo'i bdag nyid kyis dbang gis las bya'o //
analyzed: gtum mo sgyug mo'i bdag nyid kyis dbang gis las bya'o //
translated: The fierce woman is visualized as Pandaravasini, and one should perform the rite of subjugation.

original: do mbi chung ma'i bdag nyid kyis drag po la'o //
analyzed: do mbi chung ma'i bdag nyid kyis drag po la'o //
translated: The Dombi woman is visualized as Tara, and one should perform the rite of violence.

original: gar mkhan bu mo'i ni bdag nyid kyis las sna tshogs pa'o //
analyzed: gar mkhan bu mo'i ni bdag nyid kyis las sna tshogs pa'o //
translated: The dancing girl is visualized as Mamaki, and one should perform the various rites.

original: de rnams ni rigs lnga'o //
analyzed: de rnams ni rigs lnga'o //
translated: These are the five families.

original: 'khor lo bcu drug la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i gzhon nu ma rnams so //
analyzed: 'khor lo bcu drug la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i gzhon nu ma rnams so //
translated: one should enter the lowest caste.

original: sbyin sreg las ni don bsgrub phyir //
analyzed: sbyin sreg las ni don bsgrub phyir //
translated: For the sake of accomplishing the goal of the rite of fire sacrifice,

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: one should enter the lowest caste.🔽For the sake of accomplishing the goal of the rite of fire sacrifice,🔽one should enter the lowest caste.🔽For the sake of accomplishing the goal of the rite of fire sacrifice,🔽one should enter the lowest caste.

original: sbyin sreg phyi'i las kyi don nang la sogs pa'i sbyin sreg gi de kho na nyid kyi don bsgrub pas ni gzhan rnams kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro //🔽don chen po de nas @239b de'i phyir /
analyzed: sbyin sreg phyi'i las kyi don nang la sogs pa'i sbyin sreg gi de kho na nyid kyi don bsgrub pas ni gzhan rnams kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro // don chen po de nas @239b de'i phyir /
translated: For the sake of accomplishing the goal of the rite of fire sacrifice,

original: rigs ngan mo ni 'jug par bya //
analyzed: rigs ngan mo ni 'jug par bya //
translated: one should enter the lowest caste.🔽For the sake of accomplishing the goal of the rite of fire sacrifice,

original: zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes gsungs so //
translated: one should enter the lowest caste.

original: de rnams kyi don ji ltar sgrub snyam pa la /
analyzed: de rnams kyi don ji ltar sgrub snyam pa la /
translated: For the sake of accomplishing the goal of the rite of fire sacrifice,🔽one should enter the lowest caste.

original: don bsgrub pa'i don gsungs te /
analyzed: don bsgrub pa'i don gsungs te /
translated: For the sake of accomplishing the goal of the rite of fire sacrifice,🔽one should enter the lowest caste.

original: shes rab thabs kyi cho ga yis //
analyzed: shes rab thabs kyi cho ga yis //
translated: For the sake of accomplishing the goal of the rite of fire sacrifice,🔽one should enter the lowest caste.🔽For the sake of accomplishing the goal of the rite of fire sacrifice,🔽one should enter the lowest caste.🔽For the sake of accomplishing the goal of the rite of fire sacrifice,🔽one should enter the lowest caste.🔽For the sake of accomplishing the goal of the rite of fire sacrifice,🔽one should enter the lowest caste.🔽For the sake of accomplishing the goal of the rite of fire sacrifice,🔽one should enter the lowest caste.🔽For the sake of accomplishing the goal of the rite of fire sacrifice,🔽one should enter the lowest caste.🔽For the sake of accomplishing the goal of the rite of fire sacrifice,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs bcad phyed dang gnyis so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs bcad phyed dang gnyis so //
translated: one should enter the lowest caste.

original: 'o na don gyi 'bras bu gang yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na don gyi 'bras bu gang yin zhe na /
translated: For the sake of accomplishing the goal of the rite of fire sacrifice,

original: de'i 'bras bu bstan pa 'di yin te /
analyzed: de'i 'bras bu bstan pa 'di yin te /
translated: one should enter the lowest caste.

original: don dam du ni phyi don min //
analyzed: don dam du ni phyi don min //
translated: For the sake of accomplishing the goal of the rite of fire sacrifice,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: one should enter the lowest caste.🔽For the sake of accomplishing the goal of the rite of fire sacrifice,🔽one should enter the lowest caste.

original: da ni kun rdzob gyi  don dam pa'i de nyid rnyed pa bshad de /
analyzed: da ni kun rdzob gyi  don dam pa'i de nyid rnyed pa bshad de /
translated: For the sake of accomplishing the goal of the rite of fire sacrifice,🔽one should enter the lowest caste.

original: kun rdzob rnam pa'i gzugs su ni //
analyzed: kun rdzob rnam pa'i gzugs su ni //
translated: In the form of the aspects of the relative,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: and so forth.

original: kun rdzob rnam pa'i gzugs ni /
analyzed: kun rdzob rnam pa'i gzugs ni /
translated: The form of the aspects of the relative

original: rnal 'byor pa dang ; phyag rgyas gnyis lha'i gzugs sgyu ma'i bdag nyid dang ldan par bskyed do //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa dang ; phyag rgyas gnyis lha'i gzugs sgyu ma'i bdag nyid dang ldan par bskyed do //
translated: is generated as the form of the deity endowed with the nature of illusion, by the yogi and the mudra.

original: kun brtags ni rang gi ngo bo ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: kun brtags ni rang gi ngo bo ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The imagined is not the nature of the form of the deity, because it is not established as its own nature.

original: ye shes ni dga' ba rnams kyi ngo bo yin no //
analyzed: ye shes ni dga' ba rnams kyi ngo bo yin no //
translated: Wisdom is the nature of the joys.

original: sbyor ba yis zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: sbyor ba yis zhes bya ba ni /
translated: By the union

original: thabs dang shes rab /
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab /
translated: means by the union of method and wisdom.

original: a'a li k'a li ro gcig par sbyor bar 'gyur pas so ;
analyzed: a'a li k'a li ro gcig par sbyor bar 'gyur pas so ;
translated: The union of the vowels and consonants is one taste.

original: / dga' ba dang mchog gi dga' ba dang / chad pa'i dga' bas ni rim pas bstan pa yin la /
analyzed: / dga' ba dang mchog gi dga' ba dang / chad pa'i dga' bas ni rim pas bstan pa yin la /
translated: The joy, supreme joy, and innate joy are taught in order.

original: gnas ni rnyed par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: gnas ni rnyed par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The abode is attained

original: bzhi pa rten can las rten med pa'i rang bzhin dga' ba'i rgyal po rnyed cing mthong gi skye ba ni ma yin no //
analyzed: bzhi pa rten can las rten med pa'i rang bzhin dga' ba'i rgyal po rnyed cing mthong gi skye ba ni ma yin no //
translated: means that the nature of the fourth, which is free from a basis, is attained and seen, but it is not generated.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / 'pho ba dang / 'jig pa med pa'i don ni mdo dang / sgrub thams cad la sogs pa kun nas gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / 'pho ba dang / 'jig pa med pa'i don ni mdo dang / sgrub thams cad la sogs pa kun nas gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The meaning of non-arising, non-ceasing, non-transference, and non-destruction is taught in all the sutras, tantras, and so forth.

original: de bas na zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de bas na zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Therefore,

original: gtan tshigs so //
analyzed: gtan tshigs so //
translated: is the reason.🔽All means all sentient beings.

original: thams cad ni sems can kun bla na med pa'i byang chub sgrub pa la 'bad pa chen po bya dgos zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs 'dir ro //
analyzed: thams cad ni sems can kun bla na med pa'i byang chub sgrub pa la 'bad pa chen po bya dgos zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs 'dir ro //
translated: The great effort that must be made to accomplish unsurpassed enlightenment is the reason here.

original: rnam pa thams cad ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mnga' ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad do //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mnga' ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad do //
translated: All aspects means all the buddhas who possess omniscient wisdom.

original: mchog ni rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid do //
analyzed: mchog ni rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid do //
translated: The supreme is the state of Vajradhara.

original: de rnams kyi rgyur 'gyur bas na man ngag yin no //
analyzed: de rnams kyi rgyur 'gyur bas na man ngag yin no //
translated: Since this is the cause of those, it is the instruction.

original: thabs sna tshogs pa gzhan yang gsungs pa /
analyzed: thabs sna tshogs pa gzhan yang gsungs pa /
translated: Other various methods are also taught:

original: rang dang gzhan rnams 'grub don du //
analyzed: rang dang gzhan rnams 'grub don du //
translated: For the sake of accomplishing oneself and others,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: and so forth.

original: dpal ye shes thig le'i dka' 'grel /
analyzed: dpal ye shes thig le'i dka' 'grel /
translated: Commentary on the glorious Wisdom-Essence

original: gsang ba'i de kho na nyid ces bya ba le'u brgyad pa'i bshad pa'o /
analyzed: gsang ba'i de kho na nyid ces bya ba le'u brgyad pa'i bshad pa'o /
translated: The explanation of the eighth chapter, called “The Secret Suchness.

original: // / da ni go rims kyi gtor ma chen po dang bcas pa @240a * //
analyzed: // / da ni go rims kyi gtor ma chen po dang bcas pa @240a * //
translated: Now, the great bali with its sequence is to be explained,

original: 'byung bas na /
analyzed: 'byung bas na /
translated: therefore:

original: de nas yang ni bshad bya ba //🔽zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de nas yang ni bshad bya ba // zhes bya ba ni /
