original: yang gi sgras sngar bstang pa yod pa de'i rjes su bshad pa'o //
analyzed: yang gi sgras sngar bstang pa yod pa de'i rjes su bshad pa'o //
translated: The word “now” means that after the previous explanation, this is to be explained.

original: tshogs kyi 'khor lo gtor chen pos //
analyzed: tshogs kyi 'khor lo gtor chen pos //
translated: The great bali of the gaṇacakra

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: is as follows:

original: dam tshig dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams thabs dang shes rab 'dus pa rtsa ba'i gtor ma ka p'a la dum bu gcig pa dang ldan pa'am //
analyzed: dam tshig dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams thabs dang shes rab 'dus pa rtsa ba'i gtor ma ka p'a la dum bu gcig pa dang ldan pa'am //
translated: The yogins and yoginīs who possess the samaya gather in method and wisdom. The root bali is the kapāla with one section or

original: yang na dum bu gsum par gtor ma chen po'i snod byas te //
analyzed: yang na dum bu gsum par gtor ma chen po'i snod byas te //
translated: the great bali vessel with three sections.

original: de nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gtor ma chen po'o //
analyzed: de nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gtor ma chen po'o //
translated: With the mind that possesses suchness, the great bali is offered.

original: khyim ni sum thog gnas su ni //
analyzed: khyim ni sum thog gnas su ni //
translated: The house is the three-storied abode.

original: rim pa gsum pa'i gnas su bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pas sgrub pa po byin gyis brlab par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: rim pa gsum pa'i gnas su bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pas sgrub pa po byin gyis brlab par bya ba yin no //
translated: The Bhagavān and his retinue bless the practitioner in the place of the three-storied abode.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: de'i dgongs pa ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: de'i dgongs pa ni 'di yin te /
translated: This is the intended meaning:

original: chom rkun kun dang bral ba yi //
analyzed: chom rkun kun dang bral ba yi //
translated: Free from all thieves.

original: zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes gsungs so //
translated: Thus it is said.

original: phyir ril yul min nang gi min //
analyzed: phyir ril yul min nang gi min //
translated: Not outside, not inside.

original: zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi gnas ni phyi rol yin te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi gnas ni phyi rol yin te /
translated: The abode of others is outside.

original: gzhan / ni gnas su bar chad byed pa'i chom rkun la sogs pa'i bgegs 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: gzhan / ni gnas su bar chad byed pa'i chom rkun la sogs pa'i bgegs 'byung ba'o //
translated: Others are obstacles that arise as thieves, etc.

original: nang du yang mi bsgrub /
analyzed: nang du yang mi bsgrub /
translated: Also, not inside.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: de ni bdag gi gnas yin te /
analyzed: de ni bdag gi gnas yin te /
translated: That is one's own abode.

original: 'khor gyi 'du 'dzi mang bas mi dben no //
analyzed: 'khor gyi 'du 'dzi mang bas mi dben no //
translated: It is not secluded because of the many distractions of the retinue.

original: slob dpon ni //
analyzed: slob dpon ni //
translated: The master

original: sgrub pa po rnal 'byor pa'i gtso bo yin la /
analyzed: sgrub pa po rnal 'byor pa'i gtso bo yin la /
translated: is the chief of the practitioners, the yogis.

original: 'dus pas brgyan pa ni /
analyzed: 'dus pas brgyan pa ni /
translated: Adorned with the assembly

original: 'khor la sogs pa dang ldan pas brgyan cing mdzes par byas ba'i don yin pa'o //
analyzed: 'khor la sogs pa dang ldan pas brgyan cing mdzes par byas ba'i don yin pa'o //
translated: means adorned and beautified with a retinue and so on.

original: rdo rje mda' ni rnam par gzugs //
analyzed: rdo rje mda' ni rnam par gzugs //
translated: The vajra arrow is drawn.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: And so forth.

original: de ru mchod sbyin don du ni //
analyzed: de ru mchod sbyin don du ni //
translated: There, for the sake of the sacrifice,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i mchod sbyin ni rnal 'byor pa rnams dang gtor ma'i rim pa bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i mchod sbyin ni rnal 'byor pa rnams dang gtor ma'i rim pa bya'o //
translated: The offering and giving of these and so forth should be done by the yogī/nī in the manner of a bali offering.

original: byol song rab kyi gzugs ni glang //
analyzed: byol song rab kyi gzugs ni glang //
translated: The best animal form is an elephant.

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: This is what is being said.

original: rig pa med pa'i phyir na byol song rab shi ba'i ro dang mtshungs so //
analyzed: rig pa med pa'i phyir na byol song rab shi ba'i ro dang mtshungs so //
translated: Because of the absence of awareness, the best animal is like a dead corpse.

original: de yang bdag dang bral ba'i phyir ro ste /
analyzed: de yang bdag dang bral ba'i phyir ro ste /
translated: Moreover, because of being devoid of self,

original: rnal 'byor pa yis kyang chos bdag dang bdag gi 'dzin pa spangs pa'i phyir blang bar bya'o ;
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa yis kyang chos bdag dang bdag gi 'dzin pa spangs pa'i phyir blang bar bya'o ;
translated: the yogī/nī should take it up in order to abandon the grasping of the self and the grasping of “mine.”

original: / gri gug rung bas brtag par bya //
analyzed: / gri gug rung bas brtag par bya //
translated: The skull cup is suitable for examination.

original: zhes pa ni /
analyzed: zhes pa ni /
translated: This is what is being said.

original: nyon mongs pa rnams gcod pa'i bdag nyid ni /
analyzed: nyon mongs pa rnams gcod pa'i bdag nyid ni /
translated: The nature of the afflictions is to be cut by wisdom.

original: shes rab kyis de rnams brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyis de rnams brtag par bya'o //
translated: They should be examined by the yogī/nī.

original: de rnams kyi rang bzhin shes par bya zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //🔽de nas yang 'dir lta ste /
analyzed: de rnams kyi rang bzhin shes par bya zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // de nas yang 'dir lta ste /
translated: This means that their nature should be known.

original: yan lag rang ni mgo bo'i thod pa @240b yin no ;
analyzed: yan lag rang ni mgo bo'i thod pa @240b yin no ;
translated: Then, here, the limbs are the skull.

original: / padma'i snod ces bya ba ni thod pa yang yin la padma yang yin te /
analyzed: / padma'i snod ces bya ba ni thod pa yang yin la padma yang yin te /
translated: The vessel of the lotus is both a skull and a lotus.

original: padma dang ldan pas so //
analyzed: padma dang ldan pas so //
translated: Because it is endowed with the lotus.

original: snod kyang yin te bdud rtsi'i snod do //
analyzed: snod kyang yin te bdud rtsi'i snod do //
translated: It is also a vessel, because it is a vessel of nectar.

original: sgron ma lnga ni glang po che'i stobs la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: sgron ma lnga ni glang po che'i stobs la sogs pa'o //
translated: The five lamps are the strength of the elephant, etc.

original: bsres pa ni mnam par sbyar bas bsres pa'o //
analyzed: bsres pa ni mnam par sbyar bas bsres pa'o //
translated: The mixture is the mixture with the foul-smelling.

original: gang dang sbyar ba zhe na /
analyzed: gang dang sbyar ba zhe na /
translated: With what is it mixed?

original: de gsungs pa /
analyzed: de gsungs pa /
translated: That is stated:

original: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga dang ldan //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga dang ldan //
translated: Endowed with the five Tathagatas.

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: That is to say,

original: mi bskyod pa ni gla rtsi'o //
analyzed: mi bskyod pa ni gla rtsi'o //
translated: Akṣobhya is musk.

original: rnam par snang mdzad ni bzhi mnyam mo //
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad ni bzhi mnyam mo //
translated: Vairocana is the four-equal.

original: rin chen 'byung ldan ni si la'o //
analyzed: rin chen 'byung ldan ni si la'o //
translated: Ratnasambhava is śrī.

original: 'od dpag med ni ga bur ro //
analyzed: 'od dpag med ni ga bur ro //
translated: Amitābha is camphor.

original: don yod grub pa ni stobs chen po'o //
analyzed: don yod grub pa ni stobs chen po'o //
translated: Amoghasiddhi is mahābala.

original: ldan pa ni bsres nas ye shes kyi bdud rtsir ro mnyam par byas pa'o //
analyzed: ldan pa ni bsres nas ye shes kyi bdud rtsir ro mnyam par byas pa'o //
translated: Endowed means mixed, made equal in taste with the nectar of gnosis.

original: de ru dam tshig dag pa ni //
analyzed: de ru dam tshig dag pa ni //
translated: There, the purity of the commitments.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: And so on.

original: tshigs kyi 'khor lo'i gnas skabs de ru dam tshig 'da' bar mi bya bas na dam tshig go //
analyzed: tshigs kyi 'khor lo'i gnas skabs de ru dam tshig 'da' bar mi bya bas na dam tshig go //
translated: In that situation of the wheel of the joints, because the commitments are not transgressed, they are commitments.

original: nyes pa'i skyon rnams mi 'byung ba'i phyir dag pa'o //
analyzed: nyes pa'i skyon rnams mi 'byung ba'i phyir dag pa'o //
translated: Because faults do not occur, they are pure.

original: rtag tu ni gnas skabs thams cad du rgyun chad pa med pa dus gsum du'o //
analyzed: rtag tu ni gnas skabs thams cad du rgyun chad pa med pa dus gsum du'o //
translated: Always means in all situations, without interruption, in the three times.

original: bdag rang ni shi yis dogs pa dang / snad pa dang / lhung gis dogs pa la sogs pa dang ldan pa'o //🔽bzhin du bsrung zhes bya ba rnal 'byor pa'i bla ma dang / rnal 'byor pho mo rnams la sogs pa la ;
analyzed: bdag rang ni shi yis dogs pa dang / snad pa dang / lhung gis dogs pa la sogs pa dang ldan pa'o // bzhin du bsrung zhes bya ba rnal 'byor pa'i bla ma dang / rnal 'byor pho mo rnams la sogs pa la ;
translated: As if one were afraid of one's own death, injury, or falling, and so on.

original: srog dang bral gyis dogs pa'i bsam pa la sogs pa bzhin du bsrung ba'o //
analyzed: srog dang bral gyis dogs pa'i bsam pa la sogs pa bzhin du bsrung ba'o //
translated: One should guard like that means one should guard like a yogi who is afraid of losing his life and so on, with regard to the guru, male and female yogis, and so on.🔽One should guard like that.

original: dam tshig bsrungs pas ci zhig dgos snyam pa la /
analyzed: dam tshig bsrungs pas ci zhig dgos snyam pa la /
translated: What is the need for guarding the commitments?

original: de'i dgos pa 'di lta ste /
analyzed: de'i dgos pa 'di lta ste /
translated: The need for that is as follows.

original: dam tshig bsrungs na grub pa ni //
analyzed: dam tshig bsrungs na grub pa ni //
translated: If one guards the commitments, one will attain

original: lha yi dbang phyug rnyed pa'o //🔽zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: lha yi dbang phyug rnyed pa'o // zhes gsungs so //
translated: the lordship of the gods.

original: de'i don ni //
analyzed: de'i don ni //
translated: The meaning of that is as follows.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' lha'i dbang phyug la bos nas yon tan gsungs pa ste /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' lha'i dbang phyug la bos nas yon tan gsungs pa ste /
translated: The Bhagavān, having addressed the bodhisattva Lord of the Gods, spoke of the qualities.

original: de yang thun mong gi dngos grub dang / mchog gi dngos grub rnyed par byed pa'i rgyu dam tshig yin gyi /
analyzed: de yang thun mong gi dngos grub dang / mchog gi dngos grub rnyed par byed pa'i rgyu dam tshig yin gyi /
translated: Moreover, the cause for attaining the common and supreme feats is the vow.

original: gzhan du na skye ba'i 'dir yang mi bde ba sna tshogs la 'byung la /
analyzed: gzhan du na skye ba'i 'dir yang mi bde ba sna tshogs la 'byung la /
translated: Otherwise, in this life, various kinds of misfortune will occur.

original: shi 'phos nas kyang mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba la sogs par skye'o //
analyzed: shi 'phos nas kyang mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba la sogs par skye'o //
translated: And after death, one will be born in the Avici hell, and so on.

original: de skad du rgyud la sogs pa kun nas kyang gsungs so //
analyzed: de skad du rgyud la sogs pa kun nas kyang gsungs so //
translated: This is stated in all the tantras and so forth.

original: de bzhin du 'dir dgongs pa'i thig le'i rgyud las kyang /
analyzed: de bzhin du 'dir dgongs pa'i thig le'i rgyud las kyang /
translated: Likewise, the Tantra of the Drop of the Essence of Intention (dgongs-pa'i-yang-tig) also says:

original: dam tshig nyams pa'i sems can ni //
analyzed: dam tshig nyams pa'i sems can ni //
translated: Sentient beings who have violated the vow🔽Are harmed by the seven:

original: rgyal po blun po rkun ma @241a * //🔽dang ; / gcan gzan gza' dang sa bdag rims //
analyzed: rgyal po blun po rkun ma @241a * // dang ; / gcan gzan gza' dang sa bdag rims //
translated: The king, the fool, the thief,

original: me chu dug dang mkha' 'gro bdun //🔽yid du mi 'ong sna tshogs dang // dus min shi nas mnar med 'gro //
analyzed: me chu dug dang mkha' 'gro bdun // yid du mi 'ong sna tshogs dang // dus min shi nas mnar med 'gro //
translated: The beast, the planet, the earth lord, and the plague.🔽And by various unpleasant things,

original: zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes gsungs so //
translated: And by untimely death, they go to Avici.

original: da ni bza' ba'i dam tshig bshad de /
analyzed: da ni bza' ba'i dam tshig bshad de /
translated: Now, the vow of eating is explained.

original: dam tshig mchog gi ye shes te ;🔽/ zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: dam tshig mchog gi ye shes te ;🔽/ zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: The wisdom of the supreme vow

original: bza' ba'i dam tshig kyang de bzhin du shes par bya'o //
analyzed: bza' ba'i dam tshig kyang de bzhin du shes par bya'o //
translated: The pledge of eating should be understood in the same way.

original: mchog ni bdud rtsi lnga'o //
analyzed: mchog ni bdud rtsi lnga'o //
translated: The supreme is the five nectars.

original: ye shes ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdag nyid do //
analyzed: ye shes ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdag nyid do //
translated: The intuition is the nature of the transcendent lords.

original: dang pa ni 'dod pa la sogs pa'i dngos po'o //
analyzed: dang pa ni 'dod pa la sogs pa'i dngos po'o //
translated: The desire is the thing desired, and so on.

original: rtag tu bza' ba ni /
analyzed: rtag tu bza' ba ni /
translated: One should always eat

original: zas la ji srid spyod pa de srid du bdud rtsi lnga dang / stobs lnga dang ldan par byas la bza' ba'o //
analyzed: zas la ji srid spyod pa de srid du bdud rtsi lnga dang / stobs lnga dang ldan par byas la bza' ba'o //
translated: the five nectars and the five strengths, for as long as one practices eating.

original: de dag ni rigs lnga'i dam tshig go //
analyzed: de dag ni rigs lnga'i dam tshig go //
translated: These are the pledges of the five buddha families.

original: de nas 'khor lo'i mchod pa la sogs pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: de nas 'khor lo'i mchod pa la sogs pa gsungs pa /
translated: Then, the wheel worship and so on are taught.

original: dgyes pa'i dam tshig zin nas ni //🔽zhes bya ba ni /🔽bsrung ba la sogs pas mnyes par byas nas ;
analyzed: dgyes pa'i dam tshig zin nas ni // zhes bya ba ni / bsrung ba la sogs pas mnyes par byas nas ;
translated: Having satisfied the pledge of delight,

original: de ma thag tu dkyil 'khor mchod pa'o //
analyzed: de ma thag tu dkyil 'khor mchod pa'o //
translated: one should worship the mandala immediately.

original: de yang 'di skad gsungs te /
analyzed: de yang 'di skad gsungs te /
translated: This is what is said:

original: 'khor lo dang bcas rigs rab ces bya'o //
analyzed: 'khor lo dang bcas rigs rab ces bya'o //
translated: The wheel and the family are called the supreme.

original: de nas gtor ma dbul ba ni //
analyzed: de nas gtor ma dbul ba ni //
translated: Then, the offering of the sacrificial cake

original: rab tshim byas nas gtor ma dbul //
analyzed: rab tshim byas nas gtor ma dbul //
translated: is made to satisfy the supreme.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: And so on.

original: gtor ma ni bdud rtsi la sogs pa dang bcas pa'i gtor ma'o //
analyzed: gtor ma ni bdud rtsi la sogs pa dang bcas pa'i gtor ma'o //
translated: The sacrificial cake is the sacrificial cake together with the nectar, etc.

original: de'i gnas la sogs pa ni nam phyed ni gtang ba'i dus so //
analyzed: de'i gnas la sogs pa ni nam phyed ni gtang ba'i dus so //
translated: The time for it, etc. is midnight, the time for offering.

original: mkha' 'gro ma'i rgyun srang gi lam bzhi mdo'am /
analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma'i rgyun srang gi lam bzhi mdo'am /
translated: The crossroads is the path of the dakinis.

original: yang na lam sum mdo gyes pa de ru gtor ma bskyal bar bya ba'o //
analyzed: yang na lam sum mdo gyes pa de ru gtor ma bskyal bar bya ba'o //
translated: Or else, the fork in the road is the place where the sacrificial cake is to be offered.

original: gnas tshogs kyi 'khor lo gtor ma chen po dang bcas pa'i gnas bstan par bya ba 'di yin te /
analyzed: gnas tshogs kyi 'khor lo gtor ma chen po dang bcas pa'i gnas bstan par bya ba 'di yin te /
translated: The place for the gaṇa-wheel together with the great sacrificial cake is to be taught as follows:

original: dur khrod dam ni chu ngogs su //🔽zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: dur khrod dam ni chu ngogs su // zhes gsungs so //
translated: In a charnel ground or on the bank of a river,

original: gzhan du na de ru ni tshogs kyi 'khor lor ro //
analyzed: gzhan du na de ru ni tshogs kyi 'khor lor ro //
translated: in a temple or in a forest,

original: dam tshig ni 'da' bar mi bya ste /
analyzed: dam tshig ni 'da' bar mi bya ste /
translated: in a house or in a mountain cave,

original: chad pa la sogs pa'i rtogs pa bsrung ba dag pa ni /
analyzed: chad pa la sogs pa'i rtogs pa bsrung ba dag pa ni /
translated: in a place of the dakinis or in a crossroads,🔽in a solitary place or in a temple,

original: rang bzhin dga' ba mchog //
analyzed: rang bzhin dga' ba mchog //
translated: one should always meditate on the supreme joy of the vow.

original: rtag tu ni dus rtag tu bsgoms pa'i stobs bskyed par bya /
analyzed: rtag tu ni dus rtag tu bsgoms pa'i stobs bskyed par bya /
translated: One should always generate the power of meditation at all times.

original: bdag rang ni srog dang bral gyi dgos pa la sogs pa bzhin bsrung ba ni /
analyzed: bdag rang ni srog dang bral gyi dgos pa la sogs pa bzhin bsrung ba ni /
translated: One should guard the vow as one would one's own life, etc.

original: de gnyis su med pa'i don la 'bad pa ste chad pa'i dga' ba bsrung ba'o //
analyzed: de gnyis su med pa'i don la 'bad pa ste chad pa'i dga' ba bsrung ba'o //
translated: The meaning of those two is the effort in the meaning of non-duality, the protection of the pleasure of cessation.

original: de'i don 'di lta ste /
analyzed: de'i don 'di lta ste /
translated: The meaning of that is as follows:

original: dam tshig ni mchog gi dga' ba /
analyzed: dam tshig ni mchog gi dga' ba /
translated: The pledge is the supreme pleasure.

original: bsrung ba ni @241b chad pa'i dga' ba dang / 'grub pa ni rang bzhin dga' ba /
analyzed: bsrung ba ni @241b chad pa'i dga' ba dang / 'grub pa ni rang bzhin dga' ba /
translated: The protection is the pleasure of cessation, and the accomplishment is the natural pleasure.

original: rnyed pa ni rang bzhin dga' mchog rnyed par 'gyur ba'i don to //
analyzed: rnyed pa ni rang bzhin dga' mchog rnyed par 'gyur ba'i don to //
translated: The attainment is the attainment of the supreme natural pleasure.

original: da ni bza' ba'i dam tshig bshad par bya'o //
analyzed: da ni bza' ba'i dam tshig bshad par bya'o //
translated: Now, the pledge of eating should be explained.

original: dam tshig ni bza' ba ste chad pa'i dga' bar /
analyzed: dam tshig ni bza' ba ste chad pa'i dga' bar /
translated: The pledge is eating, the pleasure of cessation.

original: de bzhin du mchog ni mchog gi dga' bar /
analyzed: de bzhin du mchog ni mchog gi dga' bar /
translated: Similarly, the supreme is the supreme pleasure.

original: ye shes ni chad pa'i dga' bar /
analyzed: ye shes ni chad pa'i dga' bar /
translated: The intuition is the pleasure of cessation.

original: dad pa ni 'dod pa'i dad pa la sogs pa /
analyzed: dad pa ni 'dod pa'i dad pa la sogs pa /
translated: Faith is the faith of desire, and so on.

original: rtag tu bza' ba ni rang bzhin dga' ba'i don rgyun du bza' zhing nyams su myong bar bya zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: rtag tu bza' ba ni rang bzhin dga' ba'i don rgyun du bza' zhing nyams su myong bar bya zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
translated: Always eating is the meaning of the natural pleasure, one should always eat and experience it.

original: dgyes pa'i dam tshig zin nas su //
analyzed: dgyes pa'i dam tshig zin nas su //
translated: Having understood the pledge of pleasure,🔽one should always eat the five nectars.

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The five nectars are feces, urine, blood, semen, and human flesh.

original: phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched la sogs pa yang dgyes shing tshim pas dga' ba'o //
analyzed: phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched la sogs pa yang dgyes shing tshim pas dga' ba'o //
translated: The heap is the aggregates, elements, and sense bases, and so on.  Delight is the delight and satisfaction of those.

original: 'khor lo ni bde ba chen po la sogs pa /
analyzed: 'khor lo ni bde ba chen po la sogs pa /
translated: The wheel is the great bliss, and so on.

original: bcas pa ni rtsa gzhan rnams dang bcas pa /
analyzed: bcas pa ni rtsa gzhan rnams dang bcas pa /
translated: The together with is the other channels together with that.

original: rigs ni rigs dang rigs can ma'i rtsa kun /
analyzed: rigs ni rigs dang rigs can ma'i rtsa kun /
translated: The family is the channels of the family and the family women.

original: rab tshim ni /
analyzed: rab tshim ni /
translated: The satisfied

original: khyad par du yang de dag gis dgyes pa'i don to //
analyzed: khyad par du yang de dag gis dgyes pa'i don to //
translated: is the special meaning of delighting them.

original: gtor ma ni bar chad kyi bgegs bsrung ba'i phyir /
analyzed: gtor ma ni bar chad kyi bgegs bsrung ba'i phyir /
translated: The offering is the offering for the sake of protecting against obstacles.

original: dbul ba ni gnas so //
analyzed: dbul ba ni gnas so //
translated: The giving is the place.

original: nam phyed ni mchog gi dga' bas phyin ci log gi mtshan ma mi mthong ba'i phyir lam gyi bzhi mdo ru bsdu'o //
analyzed: nam phyed ni mchog gi dga' bas phyin ci log gi mtshan ma mi mthong ba'i phyir lam gyi bzhi mdo ru bsdu'o //
translated: The midnight is the meeting at the crossroads for the sake of not seeing the signs of error with supreme delight.

original: yang sum mdor gyes pa ru ni /
analyzed: yang sum mdor gyes pa ru ni /
translated: Again, at the fork in the road

original: autpala'i snying po brgyad pa dang bcas pa'i lte bar ro //
analyzed: autpala'i snying po brgyad pa dang bcas pa'i lte bar ro //
translated: is the navel together with the eight-petaled heart of the utpala.

original: dur khrod ni dbugs dang bral ba'i byang chub sems kyi ro //
analyzed: dur khrod ni dbugs dang bral ba'i byang chub sems kyi ro //
translated: The charnel ground is the corpse of bodhicitta devoid of breath.

original: chu ngogs ni bde chen di zhes man ngag gis zhes bya'o //
analyzed: chu ngogs ni bde chen di zhes man ngag gis zhes bya'o //
translated: The riverbank is the great bliss, according to the intimate instruction.

original: da ni gtor ma bshad de /
analyzed: da ni gtor ma bshad de /
translated: Now, the offering is explained.

original: lhag ma 'am ni yang na phud //
analyzed: lhag ma 'am ni yang na phud //
translated: The remainder or the leftovers.

original: ces bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: ces bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: And so forth.

original: rang gnas phyir na zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
analyzed: rang gnas phyir na zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
translated: For the sake of one’s own place, and so forth,

original: sgrub pa po rang gi khyim du phyin pa ste /
analyzed: sgrub pa po rang gi khyim du phyin pa ste /
translated: is the adept’s return to his own home.

original: gtor ma btang la zhes tshig gi lhag ma'o //
analyzed: gtor ma btang la zhes tshig gi lhag ma'o //
translated: The remainder of the verse is self-evident.

original: 'khor lo ni zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: 'khor lo ni zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The wheel

original: 'khor gyi rnal 'byor pa rnams la ni mi gcig gi snod brtag pa yin te /
analyzed: 'khor gyi rnal 'byor pa rnams la ni mi gcig gi snod brtag pa yin te /
translated: is the vessel of a single person for the yogins in the circle.

original: kun la yang de yis so //
analyzed: kun la yang de yis so //
translated: For all of them, it is the same.🔽To the master, a single piece

original: slob dpon la ni dum bu gcig / ces bya ba ni thod pa gling gcig pa ru bdud rtsi dbul lo //
analyzed: slob dpon la ni dum bu gcig / ces bya ba ni thod pa gling gcig pa ru bdud rtsi dbul lo //
translated: is the offering of nectar in a skull cup with one section.

original: 'bad pa yis ni bsrung bar bya //
analyzed: 'bad pa yis ni bsrung bar bya //
translated: One should protect it with effort.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
translated: And so forth.

original: mi 'bod ba dang / mi sbyin pa la sogs pa'i dam tshig yin no //
analyzed: mi 'bod ba dang / mi sbyin pa la sogs pa'i dam tshig yin no //
translated: The pledges not to refuse, not to give, and so forth,🔽are the pledges of the mother tantras.

original: ma rgyud kyi dam tshig gsungs pa /
analyzed: ma rgyud kyi dam tshig gsungs pa /
translated: The pledges of the mother tantras are stated:

original: g-yon gyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: g-yon gyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: The left, and so forth.

original: de'i dus su gal te /
analyzed: de'i dus su gal te /
translated: At that time, if

original: rnal 'byor ma brtag pa'i don gyi phyir @242a * //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma brtag pa'i don gyi phyir @242a * //
translated: a yoginī comes for the sake of examination,

original: 'ong na zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
analyzed: 'ong na zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
translated: and so forth.

original: tshogs kyi 'khor lo dang / gtor ma chen po'i dus su ni /
analyzed: tshogs kyi 'khor lo dang / gtor ma chen po'i dus su ni /
translated: At the time of the gaṇacakra and the great bali offering,

original: mkha' 'gro ma 'ong ba srid pas zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma 'ong ba srid pas zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: it is possible that ḍākinīs will come.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: brtag pa'i don gyi phyir zhes gsungs to /
analyzed: brtag pa'i don gyi phyir zhes gsungs to /
translated: It is said for the purpose of examining.

original: dam tshig brtag pa'i ched du don 'ongs pa'i mkha' 'gro ma rnams so //
analyzed: dam tshig brtag pa'i ched du don 'ongs pa'i mkha' 'gro ma rnams so //
translated: The ḍākinīs who come for the purpose of examining the commitments.🔽There,

original: de la / re zhig 'jigs par mi bya ste //
analyzed: de la / re zhig 'jigs par mi bya ste //
translated: one should not be afraid at first.

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: With regard to that,

original: mkha' 'gro ba ma rnams de la'o //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro ba ma rnams de la'o //
translated: the ḍākinīs are there.

original: re zhig ni /
analyzed: re zhig ni /
translated: At first,

original: rim gyis 'jigs par mi bya'o //
analyzed: rim gyis 'jigs par mi bya'o //
translated: one should not be afraid gradually.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: rim pas de rnams 'ongs nas so //
analyzed: rim pas de rnams 'ongs nas so //
translated: Because they come gradually.

original: rang nyid dam tshig dang ldan par byas la /
analyzed: rang nyid dam tshig dang ldan par byas la /
translated: Having made oneself endowed with the commitments,

original: de kho na nyid la dmigs pas zhum pa'i sems mi skyed de /
analyzed: de kho na nyid la dmigs pas zhum pa'i sems mi skyed de /
translated: one should not generate a timid mind by observing reality.

original: de kho na nyid dang ldan pas seng+ge lta bu ste /
analyzed: de kho na nyid dang ldan pas seng+ge lta bu ste /
translated: Endowed with reality, one is like a lion,

original: byol song lta bu'i rnam par rtog pa la mi 'jigs pas na seng+ge'i gzugs kyis spyod pas /
analyzed: byol song lta bu'i rnam par rtog pa la mi 'jigs pas na seng+ge'i gzugs kyis spyod pas /
translated: not afraid of animal-like thoughts.

original: rnam pa thams cad du 'jigs pa med par spyod pas ni /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad du 'jigs pa med par spyod pas ni /
translated: By acting without fear in every way,

original: de'i rang bzhin nyid kyis yongs su 'gro ba'o //
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin nyid kyis yongs su 'gro ba'o //
translated: one goes to the nature of that.

original: de yang rnal 'byor ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //🔽de yang rnal 'byor ma kun gzugs sna tshogs dang / phyag rgya sna tshogs dang / skad sna tshogs rab tu byed do zhes bya ba la sogs pa la lus kyi brda dang / de'i lan du dag gi brda /
analyzed: de yang rnal 'byor ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so // de yang rnal 'byor ma kun gzugs sna tshogs dang / phyag rgya sna tshogs dang / skad sna tshogs rab tu byed do zhes bya ba la sogs pa la lus kyi brda dang / de'i lan du dag gi brda /
translated: And that is stated by “yoginī” and so forth.🔽And that is the performance of all yoginīs with various forms, various seals, various languages, and so forth.

original: de'i lan dang rim pa bzhin gsungs so //🔽de dang lhan cig gtor ma chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
analyzed: de'i lan dang rim pa bzhin gsungs so // de dang lhan cig gtor ma chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
translated: The bodily gesture and the verbal gesture in reply to that are stated in order.

original: dngos grub rnyed pa'i rgyu yin pas //
analyzed: dngos grub rnyed pa'i rgyu yin pas //
translated: Together with that, the “great bali” and so forth are the cause of attaining power.

original: gtor ma la sogs pa'i cho ga ji lta ba bzhin no //
analyzed: gtor ma la sogs pa'i cho ga ji lta ba bzhin no //
translated: Therefore, the rite of bali and so forth is just as it is.

original: dpal ye shes thig le'i dka' 'grel /
analyzed: dpal ye shes thig le'i dka' 'grel /
translated: The Commentary on the Difficult Points of the Glorious “Sphere of Wisdom”

original: gsang ba'i de kho na nyid ces bya ba le'u dgu pa'i bshad pa'o /
analyzed: gsang ba'i de kho na nyid ces bya ba le'u dgu pa'i bshad pa'o /
translated: The Explanation of the Ninth Chapter, “The Reality of Secrets”

original: // / de nas byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
analyzed: // / de nas byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
translated: Then, the bodhisattva… and so forth.

original: mdor bsdus pa ni yan lag rgyas par bshad pa'i don rigs nas /
analyzed: mdor bsdus pa ni yan lag rgyas par bshad pa'i don rigs nas /
translated: The concise one is the meaning of the extensive explanation of the branches.

original: bcom ldan 'das la dkyil 'khor gyis nges pa'i don zhugs pa ji ltar lags zhes zhus pa'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das la dkyil 'khor gyis nges pa'i don zhugs pa ji ltar lags zhes zhus pa'o //
translated: Having understood, he asks, How is the Bhagavān the lord of the maṇḍala?

original: sngar gsungs pa'i rgyud don las zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
analyzed: sngar gsungs pa'i rgyud don las zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
translated: The meaning of the tantra that was previously taught and so on.

original: gzhal yas khang la sogs pa dang / mngon par byang chub lngas bskyed pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gzhal yas khang la sogs pa dang / mngon par byang chub lngas bskyed pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The celestial mansion and so on are generated by the five manifest awakenings and so on.

original: de lta'i dkyil 'khor rgyal dbang po //🔽zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de lta'i dkyil 'khor rgyal dbang po // zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The maṇḍala is the lord of those.

original: sngar bshad pa'i dkyil 'khor nang gi rim pa dang / phyi'i rim pa ni @242b de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po yin no //
analyzed: sngar bshad pa'i dkyil 'khor nang gi rim pa dang / phyi'i rim pa ni @242b de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po yin no //
translated: The inner and outer sequences of the maṇḍala that were previously explained are the lords of all tathāgatas.

original: de'i dbang po ni bcom ldan 'das yin te /
analyzed: de'i dbang po ni bcom ldan 'das yin te /
translated: The lord of those is the Bhagavān.

original: de bas na bdag po yin no //
analyzed: de bas na bdag po yin no //
translated: Therefore, he is the lord.

original: rgyud kun du ni rnyed dka' ba //🔽zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: rgyud kun du ni rnyed dka' ba // zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Difficult to find in all tantras.

original: rnal 'byor pa thabs dang shes rab rgyud rnams su rnyed par dka' ba de 'dir gsal bar bstan pa'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa thabs dang shes rab rgyud rnams su rnyed par dka' ba de 'dir gsal bar bstan pa'o //
translated: That is difficult to find in the tantras of method and wisdom yogins. Here it is clearly explained.

original: byang chub sems dang bha ga sku //
analyzed: byang chub sems dang bha ga sku //
translated: The bodhicitta, the bhaga, and the body,

original: dkyil 'khor gsum ni rab mchog go //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor gsum ni rab mchog go //
translated: are the three supreme maṇḍalas.

original: zhes bya ba ni sngar ka ba gcig dang / sogs dgu la sogs pa gsungs pa dang / rim pa gnyis bstan pa'i dkyil 'khor dang / 'og nas 'byung ba'i don rnams kyi dkyil 'khor byang chub sems la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sngar ka ba gcig dang / sogs dgu la sogs pa gsungs pa dang / rim pa gnyis bstan pa'i dkyil 'khor dang / 'og nas 'byung ba'i don rnams kyi dkyil 'khor byang chub sems la sogs pa'o //
translated: The maṇḍala of bodhicitta and so on are the maṇḍalas of the single pillar and so on, the maṇḍala of the two stages that have been explained, and the topics that will arise below.

original: de dag gi phyi dang nang dang gnyis so //
analyzed: de dag gi phyi dang nang dang gnyis so //
translated: They are outer, inner, and both.

original: ci'i phyir byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor la sogs pa gsum gyi phyi dang nang yin zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor la sogs pa gsum gyi phyi dang nang yin zhe na /
translated: Why are the outer and inner maṇḍalas of bodhicitta and so on the three?

original: de dag ni phyi dang nang du dbye ste /🔽de skad du /
analyzed: de dag ni phyi dang nang du dbye ste / de skad du /
translated: They are divided into outer and inner.

original: gnyis su med pa'i rgyud las kyang //
analyzed: gnyis su med pa'i rgyud las kyang //
translated: As such, in the Tantra of Nonduality, it also states:

original: sku dang bha ga'i dkyil 'khor dang ; / gsum pa'i byang chub sems brtag pa //🔽phyi dang nang gi rim pa yis //
analyzed: sku dang bha ga'i dkyil 'khor dang ; / gsum pa'i byang chub sems brtag pa // phyi dang nang gi rim pa yis //
translated: The maṇḍala of the body and bhaga, and the third, the bodhicitta,🔽are explained as being all-pervading

original: de dag kun du bshad par brjod //
analyzed: de dag kun du bshad par brjod //
translated: through the stages of outer and inner.

original: ces gsungs pa dang / yang gleng gzhi'i phyi ma'i rgyud las kyang /
analyzed: ces gsungs pa dang / yang gleng gzhi'i phyi ma'i rgyud las kyang /
translated: Also, in the Continuation of the Continuation of the Tantra of the Dialogue with Subāhu, it states:

original: lus kyi dkyil 'khor brjod pa dang // bha ga'i dkyil 'khor zhes pa dang // byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor te //
analyzed: lus kyi dkyil 'khor brjod pa dang // bha ga'i dkyil 'khor zhes pa dang // byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor te //
translated: The body mandala, the bhaga mandala, and the bodhicitta mandala.

original: dkyil 'khor rnam pa gsum du brtag //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor rnam pa gsum du brtag //
translated: These are the three mandalas to be imagined.

original: du ma brtag pa'i rab 'byung ba //
analyzed: du ma brtag pa'i rab 'byung ba //
translated: The arising of the many is imagined.

original: gang lam mnga' bdag kun du sbyong //🔽yang dag rig dang rab brtag pa'i //
analyzed: gang lam mnga' bdag kun du sbyong // yang dag rig dang rab brtag pa'i //
translated: The lord of the path is completely purified.

original: phung po rnam gnyis brjod pa yin //
analyzed: phung po rnam gnyis brjod pa yin //
translated: The two aggregates are described as the perfect knowledge and the imagination.🔽Thus it is said.

original: zhes gsungs pa dang / yang dpal aindra bhu tis mdzad pa'i dga' ba'i me tog gi phreng ba las kyang /
analyzed: zhes gsungs pa dang / yang dpal aindra bhu tis mdzad pa'i dga' ba'i me tog gi phreng ba las kyang /
translated: Also, in the Garland of Flowers of Joy composed by the glorious Indrabhūti, it says:

original: dkyil 'khor sku zhes brjod pa dang // dkyil 'khor bha gar bshad pa dang // dkyil 'khor byang chub sems brjod de //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor sku zhes brjod pa dang // dkyil 'khor bha gar bshad pa dang // dkyil 'khor byang chub sems brjod de //
translated: The mandala is said to be the body, the mandala is explained as the bhaga, and the mandala is said to be bodhicitta.

original: dkyil 'khor gsum du brtag pa'o //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor gsum du brtag pa'o //
translated: These are the three mandalas to be imagined.

original: de lta bu'i man ngag shes pas /
analyzed: de lta bu'i man ngag shes pas /
translated: By knowing such instructions,

original: phyi dang nang gi rim pas spyad par bya'o zhes gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: phyi dang nang gi rim pas spyad par bya'o zhes gsungs pa'o //
translated: one should practice with the outer and inner stages.🔽Therefore,

original: de'i phyir / yang na snying po'i dkyil 'khor ba bstan //
analyzed: de'i phyir / yang na snying po'i dkyil 'khor ba bstan //
translated: the mandala of the essence is taught.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: In this way, and so forth.

original: yang zhes bya ba'i sngar bshad kyang 'dir bstan zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: yang zhes bya ba'i sngar bshad kyang 'dir bstan zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Again, as previously explained, it is also taught here.

original: snying po ni yang dag pa'i thugs rje ye shes /🔽dkyil 'khor ni rdzogs @243a * //
analyzed: snying po ni yang dag pa'i thugs rje ye shes / dkyil 'khor ni rdzogs @243a * //
translated: The essence is the gnosis of authentic compassion.

original: ba'i mtshan nyid /
analyzed: ba'i mtshan nyid /
translated: The maṇḍala is the characteristic of perfection.

original: bstan pa ni bshad par bya'o //
analyzed: bstan pa ni bshad par bya'o //
translated: The teaching is what is to be explained.

original: rang gi bde ba ni mandala zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: rang gi bde ba ni mandala zhes bya ba ste /
translated: One’s own bliss is called maṇḍala.

original: snying po dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: snying po dang ldan pa'o //
translated: It is endowed with an essence.

original: len pa zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: len pa zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The term “taking”

original: sgra'i dbyings la ni len pa'i don te /
analyzed: sgra'i dbyings la ni len pa'i don te /
translated: means the domain of sound.

original: de yang la ti zhes pa'i yi ge la bzhag ste /🔽phyi ma ti phyis pas snying po len pa'i phyir na /
analyzed: de yang la ti zhes pa'i yi ge la bzhag ste / phyi ma ti phyis pas snying po len pa'i phyir na /
translated: Moreover, it is placed in the syllable la.

original: dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: Since the latter ti is removed, it is the maṇḍala of the essence of taking.

original: da ni snying po len pa'i don ston te /
analyzed: da ni snying po len pa'i don ston te /
translated: Now, the meaning of taking the essence is explained.

original: ma yi yig 'bru 'dab mar brjod //
analyzed: ma yi yig 'bru 'dab mar brjod //
translated: The syllable ma is said to be the petal.

original: ces bya ba la sogs pa la mandala zhes pas snying po len pa'i bdag nyid kyi dkyil 'khor du brjod do //
analyzed: ces bya ba la sogs pa la mandala zhes pas snying po len pa'i bdag nyid kyi dkyil 'khor du brjod do //
translated: In this way, and so forth. The maṇḍala is said to be the nature of taking the essence.

original: kha cig na re /
analyzed: kha cig na re /
translated: Some say:

original: ma yi yig 'bru 'dab mar brjod //
analyzed: ma yi yig 'bru 'dab mar brjod //
translated: The syllable ma is said to be the petal.

original: ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: In the phrase the letter of the lotus, etc.,

original: padma zhes bya ba'i yi ge pa dang / da phyis nas ma bzhag pa ni ma'i yig 'bru 'dab mar zhes bya ba'i sgras bshad do //🔽ma yi yig 'bru lte bar bstan //
analyzed: padma zhes bya ba'i yi ge pa dang / da phyis nas ma bzhag pa ni ma'i yig 'bru 'dab mar zhes bya ba'i sgras bshad do // ma yi yig 'bru lte bar bstan //
translated: the letter pa is not placed at the end, and the letter ma is explained by the word petal.🔽The letter ma is taught as the navel.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang /
translated: In the phrase the letter ma is taught as the navel, etc.,

original: sgra'i dbyings gzhug dang sbyar la bshad do zer ro //
analyzed: sgra'i dbyings gzhug dang sbyar la bshad do zer ro //
translated: the sound of the syllable is connected with the insertion and explanation, it is said.

original: kha cig na re mandala padma zhes bya'i sgras dkyil 'khor padma'i 'dab ma dang / lte ba dang / ge sar dang / bde ba kun ldan pa bzhin du gzhan rnams kyang mtshungs so zhes zer ro //
analyzed: kha cig na re mandala padma zhes bya'i sgras dkyil 'khor padma'i 'dab ma dang / lte ba dang / ge sar dang / bde ba kun ldan pa bzhin du gzhan rnams kyang mtshungs so zhes zer ro //
translated: Some say that the word maṇḍala lotus means the lotus mandala with petals, a center, filaments, and all bliss. The others are similar.

original: kha cig na re ma'i yig 'brus zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: kha cig na re ma'i yig 'brus zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: Some say that in the phrase the letter ma, etc.,

original: ma ti zhes bya ba'i ti phyis pa'i ma dang sa ru sbyar ro ;
analyzed: ma ti zhes bya ba'i ti phyis pa'i ma dang sa ru sbyar ro ;
translated: the letter ti of mati is elided, and ma is connected with sa.

original: / na'i yig 'bru chu ni pi na'i dang 'ge'u phyis pa'o //
analyzed: / na'i yig 'bru chu ni pi na'i dang 'ge'u phyis pa'o //
translated: The letter ṇī is water, and the letter ṇī is elided.

original: de bzhin du da ha ni bsreg pa ste /🔽ha phyis pas da'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du da ha ni bsreg pa ste / ha phyis pas da'o //
translated: Likewise, daha is burning,

original: des na da'i yig 'bru ni me zhes bya'o //
analyzed: des na da'i yig 'bru ni me zhes bya'o //
translated: and the letter ha is elided, so the letter da is called fire.

original: la yang de bzhin te /
analyzed: la yang de bzhin te /
translated: The same is true of the other elements.

original: 'byung ba bzhi pos ni phyi nang gi dngos po kun la khyab pa yin no //
analyzed: 'byung ba bzhi pos ni phyi nang gi dngos po kun la khyab pa yin no //
translated: The four elements pervade all outer and inner things.

original: de bzhin du dkyil 'khor lnga po kun la yang sbyar bar bya'o zhes zer ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du dkyil 'khor lnga po kun la yang sbyar bar bya'o zhes zer ro //
translated: The same should be applied to all five maṇḍalas.

original: de'i don bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa ni /
analyzed: de'i don bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa ni /
translated: The Bhagavān taught the meaning of this:

original: yang ni snying po'i dkyil 'khor bstan //
analyzed: yang ni snying po'i dkyil 'khor bstan //
translated: Again, the maṇḍala of the essence is taught.

original: rang gi bde ba len pa'i phyir //
analyzed: rang gi bde ba len pa'i phyir //
translated: In order to take up one’s own bliss,

original: zhes bya ba'i nges tshig dang bcas nas bshad pa dang / yang 'og nas /
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i nges tshig dang bcas nas bshad pa dang / yang 'og nas /
translated: he explained it with an etymology, and again below:

original: ye shes rnyed pa yi ni phyir //
analyzed: ye shes rnyed pa yi ni phyir //
translated: In order to attain gnosis,

original: bde ba yi ni chen po len //
analyzed: bde ba yi ni chen po len //
translated: one takes up the great bliss.

original: zhes gsungs pa'i phyir na /
analyzed: zhes gsungs pa'i phyir na /
translated: Therefore,

original: skabs 'dir sgra'i dbyi gzhug mi dgos la /
analyzed: skabs 'dir sgra'i dbyi gzhug mi dgos la /
translated: in this context, the suffix -i is not necessary.

original: de bzhin du /
analyzed: de bzhin du /
translated: Likewise,

original: bcom ldan 'das ni rnam pa thams cad du yang gdul bya rnams la /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ni rnam pa thams cad du yang gdul bya rnams la /
translated: the Bhagavān, in all ways,

original: log pa'i chos gsungs mi srid pas na /
analyzed: log pa'i chos gsungs mi srid pas na /
translated: could not possibly teach false Dharma to those to be tamed.

original: kho bo ni mi 'dod pas snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: kho bo ni mi 'dod pas snga ma bzhin no //
translated: Therefore, I do not accept this, and it is as before.

original: @243b 'on kyang 'dir bka' stsal pa'i gzhung bzhin bshad pa la ni skyon med do //
analyzed: @243b 'on kyang 'dir bka' stsal pa'i gzhung bzhin bshad pa la ni skyon med do //
translated: However, there is no fault in explaining it here according to the text of the🔽Vajraśekhara Tantra.

original: ma'i yig 'bru zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: ma'i yig 'bru zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: The meaning of the statement “the syllable of the mother” and so on is🔽as follows.

original: rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi snying po len pa'i don gsungs pa ni /
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi snying po len pa'i don gsungs pa ni /
translated: The meaning of “taking the essence of the yoginīs” is stated.

original: ma yi yig 'bru 'dab mar brjod //
analyzed: ma yi yig 'bru 'dab mar brjod //
translated: The syllable of the mother is said to be the petals.

original: ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: ces bya ba ni /
translated: The meaning of this is as follows.

original: 'dab ma drug cu rtsa bzhi dang ldan pa'o ;
analyzed: 'dab ma drug cu rtsa bzhi dang ldan pa'o ;
translated: It has sixty-four petals.

original: / lte bar bstan pa ni 'dab ma brgyad dang bcas pa /
analyzed: / lte bar bstan pa ni 'dab ma brgyad dang bcas pa /
translated: The teaching of the navel is that it has eight petals.

original: ge sar dag ni gsum pa dang bcas pa /
analyzed: ge sar dag ni gsum pa dang bcas pa /
translated: The stamens are the third.

original: la'i yig 'bru lte bar bshad pa ni /
analyzed: la'i yig 'bru lte bar bshad pa ni /
translated: The syllable of the la is explained to be the navel.🔽The essence of the sixty-four, eight, and three navel petals is taken

original: drug cu rtsa bzhi dang / brgyad dang / gsum pa'i lte ba dang bcas pa snying po rnams ni la'i yig 'bru don gyis blangs la ni bde ba'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: drug cu rtsa bzhi dang / brgyad dang / gsum pa'i lte ba dang bcas pa snying po rnams ni la'i yig 'bru don gyis blangs la ni bde ba'i rang bzhin no //
translated: to be the meaning of the syllable la, which is the nature of bliss.🔽The statement “taking the essence of the yogins” is

original: rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi snying po len pa'i phyir gsungs pa ni /
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi snying po len pa'i phyir gsungs pa ni /
translated: as follows.

original: ma yi yig 'bru rin chen grags //
analyzed: ma yi yig 'bru rin chen grags //
translated: The syllable of the mother is renowned as the jewel.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don yon pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don yon pa'o //
translated: The meaning of this and so on is crooked.

original: de dag gi byang chub sems dang ldan pa'i snying po len pa'i phyir don bshad pa ni /
analyzed: de dag gi byang chub sems dang ldan pa'i snying po len pa'i phyir don bshad pa ni /
translated: The explanation of the meaning of the syllables is for the purpose of taking the essence of those endowed with the spirit of awakening.

original: ma yi yig 'bru shukra'i gzugs //
analyzed: ma yi yig 'bru shukra'i gzugs //
translated: The syllable ma is the form of semen.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pas la'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pas la'i don to //
translated: This is the meaning of the syllable la.

original: k'a snang ba bzhi bsgoms pa'i rang gi snying po len pa'i phyir /
analyzed: k'a snang ba bzhi bsgoms pa'i rang gi snying po len pa'i phyir /
translated: Ka is the essence of the meditation on the four appearances.

original: ba ni snang ba'i 'du shes grags //
analyzed: ba ni snang ba'i 'du shes grags //
translated: The syllable ba is renowned as the perception of appearance.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pas len pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pas len pa'o //
translated: This is the meaning of the syllable ba.

original: dga' ba bzhi dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas snying po len pa ni /
analyzed: dga' ba bzhi dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas snying po len pa ni /
translated: The yogin endowed with the four joys takes the essence.

original: ma yi yig 'bru dga' bar grags ;
analyzed: ma yi yig 'bru dga' bar grags ;
translated: The syllable ma is renowned as joy.

original: / zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid gsungs so //
analyzed: / zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid gsungs so //
translated: This is the meaning of the syllable ma.

original: shuksha zhes pa la /
analyzed: shuksha zhes pa la /
translated: With regard to śukṣa,

original: shu ni skye rga na 'chi'o //
analyzed: shu ni skye rga na 'chi'o //
translated: śu is birth, old age, sickness, and death.

original: ksha ni de ksha ka tsa ste sog le ltar gcod cing 'byed la 'jigs par byed pa'i phyir /
analyzed: ksha ni de ksha ka tsa ste sog le ltar gcod cing 'byed la 'jigs par byed pa'i phyir /

original: dga' ba'i rim pas mchog gi dga' ba len pa'o //
analyzed: dga' ba'i rim pas mchog gi dga' ba len pa'o //
translated: It is the supreme joy that is taken through the stages of joy.

original: da ni sa la sogs pa rnams rang gi snying po len pa'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni sa la sogs pa rnams rang gi snying po len pa'i phyir /

original: ma yi yig 'brus zhes bstan zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: ma yi yig 'brus zhes bstan zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: The seed syllables of the mother and so forth.🔽Earth, water, and fire

original: sa dang chu dang me gsum po'i //
analyzed: sa dang chu dang me gsum po'i //
translated: are the three.

original: rang gi snying po ni rlung gis len pa ste /
analyzed: rang gi snying po ni rlung gis len pa ste /

original: sa'i rim pas rlung gi bde ba'i ye shes su 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sa'i rim pas rlung gi bde ba'i ye shes su 'gyur ro //
translated: By the stages of earth, the gnosis of the bliss of wind arises.

original: ye shes rnyed pa yin ni phyir //
analyzed: ye shes rnyed pa yin ni phyir //
translated: Since gnosis is attained,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: and so forth is stated.

original: da ni de kho na nyid kyi mtshan nyid ston to //
analyzed: da ni de kho na nyid kyi mtshan nyid ston to //
translated: Now, the characteristics of reality are taught.

original: dkyil 'khor sangs rgyas rin chen gtso /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor sangs rgyas rin chen gtso /
translated: The mandala is the chief jewel of the buddhas,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: and so forth is stated.

original: bur shing zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i dpes don bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: bur shing zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i dpes don bstan pa yin no //
translated: The meaning is taught by the example of sugarcane and so forth.

original: 'on kyang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /🔽gzhan du gol kyis dgos @244a * //
analyzed: 'on kyang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la / gzhan du gol kyis dgos @244a * //
translated: However, and so forth.

original: pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The purpose of not deviating elsewhere, and so forth.

original: dpal ye shes thig le'i dka' 'grel /
analyzed: dpal ye shes thig le'i dka' 'grel /
translated: The Commentary on the Difficult Points of the Glorious ,🔽the Drop of Gnosis,🔽called the Secret of Thatness,

original: gsang ba'i de kho na nyid ces bya ba las le'u bcu pa'i bshad pa'o /
analyzed: gsang ba'i de kho na nyid ces bya ba las le'u bcu pa'i bshad pa'o /
translated: the explanation of chapter ten.

original: // / rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug gi byang chub sems dpa' la sngags la sogs pa'i don rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: // / rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug gi byang chub sems dpa' la sngags la sogs pa'i don rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: The Lord of Yogins, for the sake of completing the meaning of mantra and so on for the bodhisattvas,

analyzed: yang byang chub sems dpa' chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: again says “great bodhisattva” and so on.

original: sngags kyi bzlas pa'i nges don ni //
analyzed: sngags kyi bzlas pa'i nges don ni //
translated: The definitive meaning of mantra recitation

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: and so on.

original: shes rab snying rje'i bdag nyid de kho na nyid sngags so //
analyzed: shes rab snying rje'i bdag nyid de kho na nyid sngags so //
translated: The essence of wisdom and compassion is mantra.

original: de'i rgyu man ngag gi bzlas pa /
analyzed: de'i rgyu man ngag gi bzlas pa /
translated: The recitation of the intimate instruction of its cause

original: thabs khyad par can ni nges don yin no //
analyzed: thabs khyad par can ni nges don yin no //
translated: is the definitive meaning of the special method.

original: de gsungs pa /
analyzed: de gsungs pa /
translated: That is stated:

original: dga' ba la sogs pa las 'byung //
analyzed: dga' ba la sogs pa las 'byung //

original: yid ni sngags zhes brjod pa yin //
analyzed: yid ni sngags zhes brjod pa yin //
translated: the mind is called “mantra.”

original: zhes pa ni /
analyzed: zhes pa ni /
translated: This

original: yid skyob pa'i don gyis ni /
analyzed: yid skyob pa'i don gyis ni /
translated: is the meaning of “protecting the mind.”

original: kun du bzang po nyid thob par byed pa nyid sngags so //
analyzed: kun du bzang po nyid thob par byed pa nyid sngags so //
translated: The mantra that causes the attainment of the state of Samantabhadra

original: de skad du /
analyzed: de skad du /
translated: is stated:

original: yid kyi gzugs 'di ye shes don //
analyzed: yid kyi gzugs 'di ye shes don //

original: sngags ni ye shes yin par brjod //
analyzed: sngags ni ye shes yin par brjod //

original: gnyis med yid 'di skyob pas na //
analyzed: gnyis med yid 'di skyob pas na //
translated: Since this nondual mind is protected,

original: gal te de lta na yang sngags //
analyzed: gal te de lta na yang sngags //
translated: if it is so, mantra

original: zhes bya'o // bsrub pa ni shes rab las kyi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya'o // bsrub pa ni shes rab las kyi phyag rgya'o //
translated: The “union” is the wisdom consort.

original: bsrubs thabs ni /
analyzed: bsrubs thabs ni /
translated: The “method” is

analyzed: thabs snying rje chen po'i bdag nyid do // sngags ni de kho na dga' ba dang bcas pa'o //
translated: the nature of great compassion.🔽The “mantra” is that reality along with the joy.

original: bdud rtsi ni mchog gi dga' ba sngags de nyid dang bcas pa'o ;
analyzed: bdud rtsi ni mchog gi dga' ba sngags de nyid dang bcas pa'o ;
translated: The “ambrosia” is the supreme joy along with that mantra.

original: / de bzhin du lam ni chad pa'i dga' ba /
analyzed: / de bzhin du lam ni chad pa'i dga' ba /

original: thar pa rang bzhin dga' ba'o //
analyzed: thar pa rang bzhin dga' ba'o //

original: tshig rgyas pa ni de bzhin no //
analyzed: tshig rgyas pa ni de bzhin no //
translated: The “extensive” is just as before.

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: This is the meaning.

original: de rnams kyi bo la dang kakko la rgyas pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi bo la dang kakko la rgyas pa'o //
translated: The “expansion” of the a and the ha is the extensive.

original: phrad pa ni rang bzhin dga' ba ru lnga pa'o //
analyzed: phrad pa ni rang bzhin dga' ba ru lnga pa'o //
translated: The “union” is the natural joy of the fifth.

original: gnyis ni mchog gi dga' ba dang / rang bzhin dga' ba'o ;
analyzed: gnyis ni mchog gi dga' ba dang / rang bzhin dga' ba'o ;
translated: The “two” are the supreme joy and the natural joy.

original: / dbus na gnas pa ni /
analyzed: / dbus na gnas pa ni /
translated: The “middle” is

analyzed: chu skyes kyi dga' ba'i dbus kyi snying por gnas pa'o //
translated: the middle essence of the joy of the lotus.

original: de nas gnas bral ba'i mchog gi rang bzhin mthong ba ni don dam pa'i de kho na nyid 'di ni sngags ni //
analyzed: de nas gnas bral ba'i mchog gi rang bzhin mthong ba ni don dam pa'i de kho na nyid 'di ni sngags ni //
translated: Then, the “supreme” is the vision of the natural joy.

original: de nyid 'bras bu'i bdag nyid yin te /
analyzed: de nyid 'bras bu'i bdag nyid yin te /
translated: That is the nature of the result.

original: de skad du /
analyzed: de skad du /
translated: Thus it is said:

original: rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud las kyang //🔽dus gsum rgyal bas ma byas pa'i //
analyzed: rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud las kyang // dus gsum rgyal bas ma byas pa'i //
translated: In the Great Yoga Tantra:🔽The realization of the indivisibility of the sky,

original: rtogs pa nam mkha' dbyer med sngags //
analyzed: rtogs pa nam mkha' dbyer med sngags //
translated: the mantra not created by the victors of the three times,

original: 'di nyid kho na don dam ste //🔽so so rang rig mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: 'di nyid kho na don dam ste // so so rang rig mtshan nyid do //
translated: is just this, the ultimate,

original: zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes gsungs so //
translated: the characteristic of self-awareness.

original: sngags ni a'a li k'a li yin //
analyzed: sngags ni a'a li k'a li yin //
translated: The mantra is the Alikali.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rtog med ma'i snying gar gnas @244b pa'i mi shigs pa'i thig le'o //🔽a'a li ni chad pa'i dga' ba'i ngo bo'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rtog med ma'i snying gar gnas @244b pa'i mi shigs pa'i thig le'o // a'a li ni chad pa'i dga' ba'i ngo bo'o //
translated: The indestructible drop located at the heart of Nairatmya is the Alikali.🔽A is the nature of the interrupted bliss.

original: k'a li ni mchog gi dga' ba'i ngo bo brjod pa ni /
analyzed: k'a li ni mchog gi dga' ba'i ngo bo brjod pa ni /
translated: Kali is the nature of the supreme bliss.

original: dang po dga' ba'i rang bzhin bzlas pa ni bsdus pa'i don to //🔽skyed pa ni /
analyzed: dang po dga' ba'i rang bzhin bzlas pa ni bsdus pa'i don to // skyed pa ni /
translated: The recitation of the nature of the first bliss is the condensed meaning.

original: las kyi phyag rgya ma'i mtshan nyid do //🔽rdzogs pa ni /
analyzed: las kyi phyag rgya ma'i mtshan nyid do // rdzogs pa ni /
translated: Generation is the characteristic of the karmamudra.

original: dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: Completion is the characteristic of the samayamudra.

original: bye brag ni mi gcig pa'i rim pa'o //
analyzed: bye brag ni mi gcig pa'i rim pa'o //
translated: Distinction is the different stages.

original: de dag las byung bas na /
analyzed: de dag las byung bas na /
translated: Since they arise from those,

original: sngags kyi bzlas pa rab tu grags //🔽zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: sngags kyi bzlas pa rab tu grags // zhes gsungs so //
translated: The mantra recitation is well known.

original: de nyid rtogs pa'i yul ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de nyid rtogs pa'i yul ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is not the object of realization of that.

original: gang du ske dang rkan zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gang du ske dang rkan zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: Where the throat and palate, etc.

original: srog gi rtsa yi nang yod pa //
analyzed: srog gi rtsa yi nang yod pa //
translated: Exist in the middle of the life channel.

original: zhes bya ba ni gsum pa bdag nyid byang chub sems kyis rgyas pa'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni gsum pa bdag nyid byang chub sems kyis rgyas pa'i rang bzhin no //
translated: The third is the nature of the swelling of the bodhicitta.

original: lugs ni bskyed pa'i rim pa'i lugs su 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: lugs ni bskyed pa'i rim pa'i lugs su 'byung ba'o //
translated: The system is the forward system of the creation stage.

original: lugs min ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i lugs las bzlog pa'o //
analyzed: lugs min ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i lugs las bzlog pa'o //
translated: The non-system is the reverse system of the completion stage.

original: rgyu mi 'chad pa ni /
analyzed: rgyu mi 'chad pa ni /
translated: The cause is uninterrupted.

original: bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin du gnas pa'o //
analyzed: bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin du gnas pa'o //
translated: It abides as the nature of great bliss.

original: thig le gsum ni byang chub kyi sems bde ba'i thig le gnas gsum dang ldan pa /
analyzed: thig le gsum ni byang chub kyi sems bde ba'i thig le gnas gsum dang ldan pa /
translated: The three bindus are the three places endowed with the bindu of the bliss of bodhicitta.

original: yi ge gsum ni /
analyzed: yi ge gsum ni /
translated: The three syllables are

analyzed: dbyangs dang / gsal byed dang / ma ning gi mtshan nyid do //
translated: the characteristics of vowels, consonants, and the neutral.

original: dag pa ni mi shigs pa'i thig le mchog gi yi ge'i rang bzhin 'di ni mtshan ma la sogs pa'i dbang gis ma yin no //
analyzed: dag pa ni mi shigs pa'i thig le mchog gi yi ge'i rang bzhin 'di ni mtshan ma la sogs pa'i dbang gis ma yin no //
translated: The pure bindu is the supreme bindu of the indestructible nature of the syllables. This is not due to the power of signs, and so on.

original: rang 'od rig bcas ni /
analyzed: rang 'od rig bcas ni /
translated: The self-effulgence and the awareness are

original: phyag rgya de dag gi mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: phyag rgya de dag gi mtshan nyid do //
translated: the characteristics of those seals.

original: de yang bcas pa ni gzhan yod pa bsdu'o //
analyzed: de yang bcas pa ni gzhan yod pa bsdu'o //
translated: Moreover, the “prescribed” is the inclusion of the existence of another.

original: brjod par bya ba ni /
analyzed: brjod par bya ba ni /
translated: The “object of expression” is

original: dga' ba dang / snang ba dang / phyag rgya la sogs pas de kho na nyid mtshon pa'o //
analyzed: dga' ba dang / snang ba dang / phyag rgya la sogs pas de kho na nyid mtshon pa'o //
translated: the indication of reality by means of the joy, the light, the seal, and so forth.

original: da ni sngags la sogs pa la gzhan bshad pa de gsal bar ston te ;
analyzed: da ni sngags la sogs pa la gzhan bshad pa de gsal bar ston te ;
translated: Now, in order to clarify the explanation of the mantra and so forth,

original: rkang gi nang du lce bcug pa //
analyzed: rkang gi nang du lce bcug pa //
translated: “the tongue is placed in the foot”

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa rtsa bzhi nye bar rnyed pa la sogs pa'i man ngag go //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa rtsa bzhi nye bar rnyed pa la sogs pa'i man ngag go //
translated: and so forth are the esoteric instructions for the attainment of the four channels.

original: mchog sbyin gyi nges pa'i don to /
analyzed: mchog sbyin gyi nges pa'i don to /
translated: The definitive meaning of the boon-granting [mudra].

original: sprul ba'i rim pa'i bye brag tu //
analyzed: sprul ba'i rim pa'i bye brag tu //
translated: “The emanation is the particular stage”

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa sprul pa ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa sprul pa ni /
translated: and so forth. The emanation is

original: lte ba'i 'khor lo drug cu rtsa 'dab ma dang bcas pa'o ;
analyzed: lte ba'i 'khor lo drug cu rtsa 'dab ma dang bcas pa'o ;
translated: the navel chakra with sixty petals.

original: / rim pa ni chos kyi 'khor lo la sogs pa gsum pa'o //
analyzed: / rim pa ni chos kyi 'khor lo la sogs pa gsum pa'o //
translated: The stage is the third, the dharma chakra, and so forth.

original: bye brag tu ni dkyil 'khor dang lus la sbyar ba'o //
analyzed: bye brag tu ni dkyil 'khor dang lus la sbyar ba'o //
translated: The particular is the application to the mandala and the body.

original: thig ler grags pa ni bskyed pa'i rim pa'i don dang / byang chub sems kyi don thig le dbyer med pa'o //
analyzed: thig ler grags pa ni bskyed pa'i rim pa'i don dang / byang chub sems kyi don thig le dbyer med pa'o //
translated: The meaning of the term bindu is the meaning of the generation stage, and the meaning of bodhicitta is the indivisibility of the bindu.

original: bde ba'i sku ni /🔽ye shes kyi sku'i mtshan nyid @245a * //
analyzed: bde ba'i sku ni / ye shes kyi sku'i mtshan nyid @245a * //
translated: The bliss body

original: can yin no //
analyzed: can yin no //
translated: has the characteristic of the gnosis body.

original: mchod sbyin dkyil 'khor gyis brgyad pa //
analyzed: mchod sbyin dkyil 'khor gyis brgyad pa //
translated: The mandala of the eight offerings

original: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje legs dgyes ma la sogs pa'i lha mo kun dang / de bzhin du la la n'a la sogs pa'i bdag nyid dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la bskor zhing brgyan pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje legs dgyes ma la sogs pa'i lha mo kun dang / de bzhin du la la n'a la sogs pa'i bdag nyid dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la bskor zhing brgyan pa'o //
translated: means that the goddesses such as Vajra Suṃbhaṇi and so forth, and likewise Lalitā and so forth, together with their lords, surround and adorn the Bhagavān.

original: de yi bskyed rim bdag gis bshad ;
analyzed: de yi bskyed rim bdag gis bshad ;
translated: I will explain its generation stage

original: / ces bya ba ni ji lta ba bzhin du 'og nas bshad par gsungs so //
analyzed: / ces bya ba ni ji lta ba bzhin du 'og nas bshad par gsungs so //
translated: means that it will be explained just as it is below.

original: dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin pa yis //
analyzed: dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin pa yis //
translated: The glorious Vajra Holder

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la //
translated: and so forth.

original: dgyes pa'i gnas ni au rgyan dang / dz'a lndha ra dang / pulli ra ma dang / k'a ma r'u pa la sogs pa sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / de bzhin du mgo bo dang / spyi gtsug la sogs pa yang sbyar la de bzhin du rgyud kyi gzhung ngo //
analyzed: dgyes pa'i gnas ni au rgyan dang / dz'a lndha ra dang / pulli ra ma dang / k'a ma r'u pa la sogs pa sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / de bzhin du mgo bo dang / spyi gtsug la sogs pa yang sbyar la de bzhin du rgyud kyi gzhung ngo //
translated: The places of delight are the thirty-two places such as Oddiyana, Jalandhara, Pullīramalaya, and Kāmarūpa, and likewise the head, crown of the head, and so forth.

original: yang sum cu rtsa drug gi bdag nyid kyis gnas brgyad dang sbyar ba'o //
analyzed: yang sum cu rtsa drug gi bdag nyid kyis gnas brgyad dang sbyar ba'o //
translated: And likewise, the thirty-six places are applied to the eight places.

original: mchod sbyin ni lha mo rnams dang bcas pa'i mchod sbyin no //
analyzed: mchod sbyin ni lha mo rnams dang bcas pa'i mchod sbyin no //
translated: The sacrifice is the sacrifice with the goddesses.

original: dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin pa yis //🔽zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin pa yis // zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The glorious Vajra Holder🔽is the Bhagavān, the nondual gnosis of all tathāgatas.

original: bcom ldan 'das 'de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ngo bo gnyis su med pa'i ye shes grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das 'de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ngo bo gnyis su med pa'i ye shes grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: He is accomplished.

original: mchog dga' 'byung ba'i mchod sbyin bya //
analyzed: mchog dga' 'byung ba'i mchod sbyin bya //
translated: The sacrifice that arises from supreme joy

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: and so forth.

original: mchog gi dga' ba ni /
analyzed: mchog gi dga' ba ni /
translated: Supreme joy

original: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid de /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid de /
translated: is the Bhagavān Vajradhara himself,

original: mchog gi dga' ba'i mtshan nyid can no //
analyzed: mchog gi dga' ba'i mtshan nyid can no //
translated: who has the characteristic of supreme joy.

original: 'byung ba ni sgrub pa po nyid de de bzhin du 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: 'byung ba ni sgrub pa po nyid de de bzhin du 'byung ba'o //
translated: The elements are the adept himself, and they arise in that way.

original: mchod sbyin ni 'byung bar byed pa la rgyur bshad do //
analyzed: mchod sbyin ni 'byung bar byed pa la rgyur bshad do //
translated: Sacrifice is explained as the cause of the arising.

original: mchog dga' ba ni 'khor bar bstan //🔽zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: mchog dga' ba ni 'khor bar bstan // zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Supreme joy is taught as cyclic existence.🔽This is the characteristic of cyclic existence, the relative, the method of conceptualization.

original: rnam par rtog pa'i thabs kun rdzob 'khor ba'i mtshan nyid de de nyid shes nas mya ngan las 'das pa'o //🔽de skad du /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa'i thabs kun rdzob 'khor ba'i mtshan nyid de de nyid shes nas mya ngan las 'das pa'o // de skad du /
translated: Having understood that, there is nirvāṇa.

original: 'khor ba yongs su shes pa ni //
analyzed: 'khor ba yongs su shes pa ni //
translated: It is said, “The thorough understanding of cyclic existence

original: mya ngan las 'das par bshad pa'o //
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das par bshad pa'o //
translated: is explained as nirvāṇa.”

original: yang na 'khor ba mchog gi dga' ba /
analyzed: yang na 'khor ba mchog gi dga' ba /
translated: Alternatively, supreme joy is cyclic existence,

original: mya ngan las 'das pa chad pa'i dga' ba'o //
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa chad pa'i dga' ba'o //
translated: and joy is nirvāṇa.

original: de dag 'brel pa mchod pa dang mchod sbyin no //
analyzed: de dag 'brel pa mchod pa dang mchod sbyin no //
translated: Their connection is sacrifice.

original: k'a li ye shes mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: k'a li ye shes mtshan nyid do //
translated: The kālī is the characteristic of gnosis.

original: zhes bya ba ni ;
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ;
translated: This is

original: k'a li dkyil 'khor lus dang ldan pa'i mtshan nyid ye shes so //
analyzed: k'a li dkyil 'khor lus dang ldan pa'i mtshan nyid ye shes so //
translated: the kālī maṇḍala, the characteristic of the gnosis that possesses the body.

original: sku brgyad bdag nyid mchog sbyin ni //🔽zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: sku brgyad bdag nyid mchog sbyin ni // zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The supreme gift is the nature of the eight bodies.

original: gnas kyi rim pas dbye bas sku'i bdag nyid ston te /
analyzed: gnas kyi rim pas dbye bas sku'i bdag nyid ston te /
translated: The nature of the body is taught by the division of the stages of the places.

original: de'i phyir / gnas brgyad par ni mchod sbyin bya //
analyzed: de'i phyir / gnas brgyad par ni mchod sbyin bya //
translated: Therefore,

original: zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes gsungs so //
translated: the sacrifice is performed in the eighth abode.

original: gnas dang nye ba'i @245b gnas la sogs pa'i dngos po can rnams so //
analyzed: gnas dang nye ba'i @245b gnas la sogs pa'i dngos po can rnams so //
translated: The abode and the neighboring abode, etc.

original: ji bzhin zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: ji bzhin zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Just as means

original: de ji ltar bzhin du rnal 'byor pa rnams kyang 'byung ste /
analyzed: de ji ltar bzhin du rnal 'byor pa rnams kyang 'byung ste /
translated: just as they are, the yogis also arise.

original: tha mi dad par gcig pa'i mtshan nyid kyis 'byung zhing gnas pa'o //
analyzed: tha mi dad par gcig pa'i mtshan nyid kyis 'byung zhing gnas pa'o //
translated: They arise and abide by the characteristic of non-difference and oneness.

original: sum cu rtsa gnyis yid gzugs kyi //
analyzed: sum cu rtsa gnyis yid gzugs kyi //
translated: The thirty-two mental forms,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: and so on.

original: yi ge ni mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yi ge ni mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The syllable is unchanging.

original: gzugs ni byang chub kyi sems kun rdzob las don dam pa /
analyzed: gzugs ni byang chub kyi sems kun rdzob las don dam pa /
translated: Form is the ultimate from the conventional bodhicitta.

original: k'a li ni ka kha la sogs pa sum cu rtsa gnyis yang na aom nas sv'a h'i bar du rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi sngags sum cu rtsa drug gi ngo bo /
analyzed: k'a li ni ka kha la sogs pa sum cu rtsa gnyis yang na aom nas sv'a h'i bar du rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi sngags sum cu rtsa drug gi ngo bo /
translated: The kālī is the thirty-two [letters] beginning with ka kha, or the nature of the thirty-six mantras of the yoginīs from oṃ to svāhā.

original: thig le zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: thig le zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The drop

original: lus la gnas pa'i yi ge'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: lus la gnas pa'i yi ge'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'o //
translated: is endowed with the characteristic of the syllable residing in the body.

original: gtso bo zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla ba'o //
analyzed: gtso bo zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla ba'o //
translated: The principal, etc. are easy to understand.

original: yang na ni /
analyzed: yang na ni /
translated: Or else,

original: sprul pa'i rim pa'i bye brag tu //
analyzed: sprul pa'i rim pa'i bye brag tu //
translated: the emanation is the particular stage.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: In this and the following verses,

original: sprul pa ni lte ba'i gnas drug cu rtsa bzhi'i 'dab ma dang bcas pa'o //
analyzed: sprul pa ni lte ba'i gnas drug cu rtsa bzhi'i 'dab ma dang bcas pa'o //
translated: the emanation is the navel together with the sixty-four petals.

original: rim pa ni brgyad pa'i padma reg bya'i gzugs can dang / gsum pa re bya dang po'o //
analyzed: rim pa ni brgyad pa'i padma reg bya'i gzugs can dang / gsum pa re bya dang po'o //
translated: The stage is the lotus of the eighth petal, which has the form of a tactile sensation, and the third is the first tactile sensation.

original: thig le ni kun rdzob kyi byang chub sems kyi ngo bo'o //
analyzed: thig le ni kun rdzob kyi byang chub sems kyi ngo bo'o //
translated: The drop is the essence of the relative bodhicitta.

original: grangs pa ni mchod sbyin gyi skur bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: grangs pa ni mchod sbyin gyi skur bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'o //
translated: The number is the body of the sacrifice, which the Lord has taught.

original: bde ba'i sku ni ye shes kyi sku'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: bde ba'i sku ni ye shes kyi sku'i rang bzhin no //
translated: The body of bliss is the nature of the body of gnosis.

original: mchod sbyin dkyil 'khor gyis brgyan pa //
analyzed: mchod sbyin dkyil 'khor gyis brgyan pa //
translated: The body of sacrifice is adorned with the mandala.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
translated: In this and the following verses,

original: bde ba'i sku'i bdag po nyid la rtsa'i mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyis bskor ba'o //
analyzed: bde ba'i sku'i bdag po nyid la rtsa'i mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyis bskor ba'o //
translated: the Lord of the body of bliss is surrounded by the ḍākinīs of the channels.

original: bcom ldan rdo rje'i 'dzin pa yis //
analyzed: bcom ldan rdo rje'i 'dzin pa yis //
translated: The Blessed One, the vajra holder,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni sngar bstan par byas so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni sngar bstan par byas so //
translated: and so forth, have been explained above.

original: mchog dga' 'byung ba mchog sbyin no //🔽zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: mchog dga' 'byung ba mchog sbyin no //🔽zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: The supreme joy arises, bestowing the supreme.

original: mchod sbyin gyi 'bras bu mchog gi dga' ba'i don yang na mchog las chad pa'i dga' ba dang / rang bzhin dga' ba rten dang bcas pa dang bral ba'i phyir na /
analyzed: mchod sbyin gyi 'bras bu mchog gi dga' ba'i don yang na mchog las chad pa'i dga' ba dang / rang bzhin dga' ba rten dang bcas pa dang bral ba'i phyir na /
translated: The result of the sacrifice is the meaning of supreme joy, or the joy that is cut off from the supreme, because natural joy is free from the support and that which is supported.

original: rab kyi dkyil 'khor du gsungs so //
analyzed: rab kyi dkyil 'khor du gsungs so //
translated: It is taught in the mandala of the supreme.

original: der ni bya zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: der ni bya zhes bya ba ni /
translated: There, “one should do”

original: gnas brgyad pa'i dbus kyi lte bar bya'o //
analyzed: gnas brgyad pa'i dbus kyi lte bar bya'o //
translated: means that one should do it in the center of the navel, the eighth place.

original: mchog gi dga' ba 'khor bar bstan //🔽zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: mchog gi dga' ba 'khor bar bstan // zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: Supreme joy is taught to be samsara.

original: mchog gi dga' ba 'khor ba thabs kyi bdag nyid can k'a li'i ye shes te /
analyzed: mchog gi dga' ba 'khor ba thabs kyi bdag nyid can k'a li'i ye shes te /
translated: Supreme joy is samsara, which has the nature of method, the gnosis of kāli.

original: gsang ba'i pho brang mdud pa'i skor ro //
analyzed: gsang ba'i pho brang mdud pa'i skor ro //
translated: The secret palace is the binding circle.

original: chad pa'i dga' ba mya ngan las 'das pa'i shes rab kyi mtshan nyid can la /🔽a'a li'i ye shes rig @246a * //
analyzed: chad pa'i dga' ba mya ngan las 'das pa'i shes rab kyi mtshan nyid can la / a'a li'i ye shes rig @246a * //
translated: The joy that is cut off is the characteristic of nirvana, the wisdom of ālī.

original: pa'i pho brang gi gnas so //
analyzed: pa'i pho brang gi gnas so //
translated: The palace of vidyā is the place of gnosis.

original: des ni mchod pa'i 'bras bu'o //
analyzed: des ni mchod pa'i 'bras bu'o //
translated: That is the result of the sacrifice.

original: sku brgyad ces bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla bsam bshad do //
analyzed: sku brgyad ces bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla bsam bshad do //
translated: The eight bodies and so on are easy to understand and therefore are not explained.

original: 'on kyang 'di'i don ni //
