analyzed: 'on kyang 'di'i don ni //
translated: However, the meaning of this is as follows.

original: gnas ni bdag la sogs pa dgyes //
analyzed: gnas ni bdag la sogs pa dgyes //
translated: The place is the self and so forth.🔽This is the meaning of what was not explained in detail in the section beginning with “the three corners in the middle.

original: zhes bya ba'i skabs su rgyas par ma bshad pa'i don to //🔽gru gsum dbus su bcom ldan 'das //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i skabs su rgyas par ma bshad pa'i don to // gru gsum dbus su bcom ldan 'das //
translated: This is the meaning of the passage that was not explained in detail.🔽In the center of the triangle is the Bhagavān.🔽

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
translated: The Blessed One in the middle of the three corners and so forth.

original: dngos po la sogs pa bzhi'i bdag nyid dang dga' ba bzhi'i rang bzhin nyid kyis bstan par bya'o //
analyzed: dngos po la sogs pa bzhi'i bdag nyid dang dga' ba bzhi'i rang bzhin nyid kyis bstan par bya'o //
translated: This should be taught by the nature of the four things and so forth and the nature of the four joys.

original: de lta bu'i nang gi 'phar ma bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo na yod pa'i rtsa sum cu rtsa gcig gnyis rnam par dag pas zhes bya ba ni ;
analyzed: de lta bu'i nang gi 'phar ma bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo na yod pa'i rtsa sum cu rtsa gcig gnyis rnam par dag pas zhes bya ba ni ;
translated: In that way, the inner extension is the thirty-one channels that exist in the cakra of great bliss.

original: / sngar bstan pa'i ye shes sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor dang / mchod sbyin gyis dkyil 'khor gcig pa'i phyir nang gi 'phar ma'o //
analyzed: / sngar bstan pa'i ye shes sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor dang / mchod sbyin gyis dkyil 'khor gcig pa'i phyir nang gi 'phar ma'o //
translated: The inner extension is the single maṇḍala of the wisdom-being maṇḍala taught previously and the maṇḍala of the offering substances.

original: de yang 'khor lo bzhi rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: de yang 'khor lo bzhi rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: That is the great-bliss cakra, the nature of the four pure cakras.

original: phyi ma'i rgyud ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: phyi ma'i rgyud ces bya ba ni /
translated: The latter tantra is

original: rtsa ba'i rgyud sngar yod pa'i phyag rgya chen po'i thig le'o //
analyzed: rtsa ba'i rgyud sngar yod pa'i phyag rgya chen po'i thig le'o //
translated: the mahāmudrā drop that existed previously in the root tantra.

original: yang na sngar gsang ba 'dus pa'i de las phyi ma la sogs pa'i rim pa'o //
analyzed: yang na sngar gsang ba 'dus pa'i de las phyi ma la sogs pa'i rim pa'o //
translated: Or else, the former is the Guhyasamaja, and the latter is the sequence of the later tantras, and so on.

original: go rims kyis ni rgyud kyi rim pa rtsa ba dang brtag pa dang / phyi ma dang phyi ma'i phyi ma la sogs pa la le'u nyi shu'i gzhung bzhin du bshad do //
analyzed: go rims kyis ni rgyud kyi rim pa rtsa ba dang brtag pa dang / phyi ma dang phyi ma'i phyi ma la sogs pa la le'u nyi shu'i gzhung bzhin du bshad do //
translated: By the sequence, the sequence of the tantras, the root, the explanatory, the later, the later of the later, and so on, is explained according to the text of twenty chapters.

original: rnal 'byor ma rnams nang gi rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma rnams nang gi rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The inner purity of the yoginis

original: sgrub pa po rnams kyis lus kyi rtsa dang / bskyed rim gyi don mkha' 'gro ma'i mtshan nyid du shes par bya zhing nan tan bya'o //
analyzed: sgrub pa po rnams kyis lus kyi rtsa dang / bskyed rim gyi don mkha' 'gro ma'i mtshan nyid du shes par bya zhing nan tan bya'o //
translated: is to be known and practiced by the adepts as the characteristics of the dakinis, the channels of the body, and the meaning of the creation stage.

original: da ni mchod pa'i dkyil 'khor bstan par phyir /
analyzed: da ni mchod pa'i dkyil 'khor bstan par phyir /
translated: Now, in order to teach the mandala of offerings,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i dbang phyug gi phyi rol du mtshan dang / dpe byed dang ldan pa rnams dang bcas pa brgyad gnyis kyi lo //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i dbang phyug gi phyi rol du mtshan dang / dpe byed dang ldan pa rnams dang bcas pa brgyad gnyis kyi lo //
translated: the Bodhisattva Mahasattva Devesvara, together with the twelve who possess the major and minor marks, for two years

original: byad gzugs rgyas pa chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni mchod pa'i dkyil 'khor 'dir bstan pa dang / sngar dam tshig sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor rnam pa dang bcas pa tha dad pa ma yin te dbyer med pa'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: byad gzugs rgyas pa chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni mchod pa'i dkyil 'khor 'dir bstan pa dang / sngar dam tshig sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor rnam pa dang bcas pa tha dad pa ma yin te dbyer med pa'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: The greatly expanded body and so forth are taught in this mandala of offerings, and are not different in aspect from the mandala of the pledge beings taught previously, but have the characteristic of inseparability.

original: 'di yi rnam par dag pa ni //
analyzed: 'di yi rnam par dag pa ni //
translated: Its purity

original: longs spyod kyi 'khor lo nang na yod pa'i rtsa zhes bya ba la sogs pas bstan to //
analyzed: longs spyod kyi 'khor lo nang na yod pa'i rtsa zhes bya ba la sogs pas bstan to //
translated: is taught by the words the channel that exists in the enjoyment chakra, and so forth.

original: gzhan yang dga' ba bcu drug nang gi dag pa dang / phyi rol gyi yul lnga dang / 'byung ba lnga dang / dbyings dang / ye shes @246b dang ; 'dod chags dang / gti mug dang / nga rgyal dang / phrag dog rnam par dag pa zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: gzhan yang dga' ba bcu drug nang gi dag pa dang / phyi rol gyi yul lnga dang / 'byung ba lnga dang / dbyings dang / ye shes @246b dang ; 'dod chags dang / gti mug dang / nga rgyal dang / phrag dog rnam par dag pa zhes gsungs so //
translated: Moreover, it is said that the sixteen joys are pure internally, and the five external objects, the five elements, the dhātu, gnosis, desire, ignorance, pride, and jealousy are pure.

original: de bzhin du gtso bo yang snga ma'i ni zhal bcu drug pa yin la /
analyzed: de bzhin du gtso bo yang snga ma'i ni zhal bcu drug pa yin la /
translated: Similarly, the former principal one has sixteen faces,

original: phyi ma'i ni brgyad par gsungs so //
analyzed: phyi ma'i ni brgyad par gsungs so //
translated: and the latter is said to have eight.

original: mchod pa dang mchod sbyin dbyer med par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: mchod pa dang mchod sbyin dbyer med par bstan pa ni /
translated: The inseparability of offerings and sacrifice is taught.

original: nyi ma'i thig le ye shes shar //
analyzed: nyi ma'i thig le ye shes shar //
translated: The sun-drop is the arising of intuition.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: Thus it is said.

original: de dag rgyu 'bras kyi don 'di nyid yin /
analyzed: de dag rgyu 'bras kyi don 'di nyid yin /
translated: This is the meaning of cause and effect.

original: nyi ma'i dbus nas zla ba 'byung //
analyzed: nyi ma'i dbus nas zla ba 'byung //
translated: From the center of the sun, the moon arises.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: Thus it is said.

original: 'o na bde ba'i rang bzhin chags pa chen po dngos po med pa snang med pa zhig yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na bde ba'i rang bzhin chags pa chen po dngos po med pa snang med pa zhig yin nam zhe na /
translated: Now, is the nature of bliss, great passion, a non-entity, non-appearance?

original: de bzhin ma yin te /
analyzed: de bzhin ma yin te /
translated: It is not so.

original: chags pa chen po dngos med na //
analyzed: chags pa chen po dngos med na //
translated: Great passion is not a non-entity.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: Thus it is said.

original: 'jig rten pa'i 'dod chags la zhen du dogs pa de gsal ba'i phyir /
analyzed: 'jig rten pa'i 'dod chags la zhen du dogs pa de gsal ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to clarify that fear of attachment to worldly passion,

original: tha mal pa yi bde ba min //
analyzed: tha mal pa yi bde ba min //
translated: It is not ordinary bliss.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pas bstan to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pas bstan to //
translated: Thus it is said.

original: bde ba'i cha yin nang du ni //
analyzed: bde ba'i cha yin nang du ni //
translated: The aspect of bliss is within.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la //
translated: Thus it is said.

original: dpal aindra bh'u ti rgyal po'i zhal snga nas bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: dpal aindra bh'u ti rgyal po'i zhal snga nas bka' stsal pa /
translated: The glorious Indrabhūti, the royal sage, said:

original: 'khor gsum tha dad gnas su ni //
analyzed: 'khor gsum tha dad gnas su ni //
translated: In the abode of the three different wheels,

original: cha dang thig le dang ni tshul //
analyzed: cha dang thig le dang ni tshul //
translated: The parts, the drops, and the modes,

original: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i bye brag gis //
analyzed: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i bye brag gis //
translated: By the distinctions of cause and effect,

original: kun rdzob rnam pa'i gzugs kyis so //
analyzed: kun rdzob rnam pa'i gzugs kyis so //
translated: By the form of the relative aspect.

original: brgyad brgyad pa yi pad lte'i nang //
analyzed: brgyad brgyad pa yi pad lte'i nang //
translated: In the center of the lotus of the eight and eight,

original: de min lhag ma'i rim par ni //
analyzed: de min lhag ma'i rim par ni //
translated: The rest in the order of the remainder.

original: tshul tsam mchog dang gzhan mchog 'di //🔽bskyed dang rdzogs pa'i rim pa yi //
analyzed: tshul tsam mchog dang gzhan mchog 'di // bskyed dang rdzogs pa'i rim pa yi //
translated: This is the supreme method and the supreme other.🔽By the six applications of the generation and completion stages,

original: sbyor ba drug gis rnams par shes //
analyzed: sbyor ba drug gis rnams par shes //
translated: Consciousness.

original: rnam shes ye shes la thim nas //
analyzed: rnam shes ye shes la thim nas //
translated: When consciousness dissolves into wisdom,

original: rang rig brjod bral ba bde ba che //
analyzed: rang rig brjod bral ba bde ba che //
translated: Self-awareness, inexpressible, is great bliss.

original: rtag tu goms pa yis ni shar //
analyzed: rtag tu goms pa yis ni shar //
translated: Always through familiarity, it arises.

original: zhes gsungs pa'i don bla ma bar ma chad pa'i rim pas mdzad do //
analyzed: zhes gsungs pa'i don bla ma bar ma chad pa'i rim pas mdzad do //
translated: The meaning of this is explained by the uninterrupted lineage of gurus.

original: slob dznya' na k'i rti'i zhal snga nas 'di ltar bshad de //🔽rgyu yi bdag nyid tshogs pa yi //
analyzed: slob dznya' na k'i rti'i zhal snga nas 'di ltar bshad de // rgyu yi bdag nyid tshogs pa yi //
translated: The one with the face of the scholar Jñānaka explains it like this:

original: rim pa yis ni bstan pa kun //
analyzed: rim pa yis ni bstan pa kun //
translated: All the teachings by the stages🔽Of the assembly of the nature of the cause

original: rgyu dang // 'bras bu'i khyad par gyis //
analyzed: rgyu dang // 'bras bu'i khyad par gyis //
translated: By the distinction of cause and effect,

original: drug gi rang bzhin rin po che //
analyzed: drug gi rang bzhin rin po che //
translated: The six natures are the jewel.

original: bsam gtan ye shes spangs pa 'di //
analyzed: bsam gtan ye shes spangs pa 'di //
translated: This concentration, wisdom, and abandonment

original: de yis shes par 'gyur ba yin //🔽'on kyang bla ma'i zhal nas ni //
analyzed: de yis shes par 'gyur ba yin // 'on kyang bla ma'i zhal nas ni //
translated: Is to be known by that.🔽However, it is obtained

original: de ni thob par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: de ni thob par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: From the face of the guru.

original: zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes gsungs so //
translated: Thus it is said.

original: de skad du gsungs pa'o tshig rnams kyis bla ma mnyes bar bya zhing de las blang bar bya dgos pa yin no //
analyzed: de skad du gsungs pa'o tshig rnams kyis bla ma mnyes bar bya zhing de las blang bar bya dgos pa yin no //
translated: By these words, one should please the guru and receive from him.

original: dpal ye shes thig le'i bka' 'grel /🔽gsang ba'i de kho na nyid ces bya ba las le'u bcu gcig pa'i @247a * //
analyzed: dpal ye shes thig le'i bka' 'grel / gsang ba'i de kho na nyid ces bya ba las le'u bcu gcig pa'i @247a * //
translated: Commentary on the glorious Essence of Pristine Awareness🔽From the Secret Suchness called “The Eleven Chapters”

original: bshad pa'o / //
analyzed: bshad pa'o / //
translated: The explanation of the eleventh chapter.

original: / de nas mchod pa'i cho ga ni //
analyzed: / de nas mchod pa'i cho ga ni //
translated: Then, the rite of worship

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la //
translated: and so forth.

original: mchod sbyin dang 'bral bar mchod pa'i rim pa gsungs so //
analyzed: mchod sbyin dang 'bral bar mchod pa'i rim pa gsungs so //
translated: The stage of worship is taught without sacrifice.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: sngar bstan pa bzhin du 'dir yang bshad de /
analyzed: sngar bstan pa bzhin du 'dir yang bshad de /
translated: As previously taught, here also it is explained:

original: g-yas g-yon yan lag gnyis por ni //
analyzed: g-yas g-yon yan lag gnyis por ni //
translated: The two limbs, right and left,

original: zhes bya ba la ;
analyzed: zhes bya ba la ;
translated: and so forth.

original: g-yas ni mchod sbyin gyi dkyil 'khor thabs kyi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: g-yas ni mchod sbyin gyi dkyil 'khor thabs kyi rang bzhin no //
translated: The right is the mandala of sacrifice, the nature of method.

original: g-yon ni mchod pa'i dkyil 'khor thabs las byung ba'i bdag nyid /
analyzed: g-yon ni mchod pa'i dkyil 'khor thabs las byung ba'i bdag nyid /
translated: The left is the mandala of worship, the nature of that which arises from method.

original: yan lag ni phyi ma la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: yan lag ni phyi ma la sogs pa'o //
translated: The limbs are the subsequent ones and so forth.

original: gnyis po ni thabs dang thabs las byung ba'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: gnyis po ni thabs dang thabs las byung ba'i rang bzhin no //
translated: The two are the nature of method and that which arises from method.

original: de'i phyir / bla ma'i zhal snga'i bka' drin las //
analyzed: de'i phyir / bla ma'i zhal snga'i bka' drin las //
translated: Therefore, it is said:

original: gnyis su med pa'i bde ba shes //
analyzed: gnyis su med pa'i bde ba shes //
translated: The bliss of nonduality is known🔽through the kindness of the guru's instruction.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don gsungs pa yin no //
translated: The meaning of this and so forth is stated.

original: bcu drug gi ni yig 'bru'i gzugs //
analyzed: bcu drug gi ni yig 'bru'i gzugs //
translated: The form of the sixteen syllables

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la //
translated: and so forth.

original: lha mo bcu drug gi sngags a'a li bcu drug dang ldan pa'i bde ba'i ye shes kyi cha'i rang bzhin /
analyzed: lha mo bcu drug gi sngags a'a li bcu drug dang ldan pa'i bde ba'i ye shes kyi cha'i rang bzhin /
translated: The mantra of the sixteen goddesses endowed with the sixteen vowels is the nature of the portion of the gnosis of bliss.

original: dga' ba bcu drug dang bcas pa dpral ba nas bde ba'i nor bu'i bar du'o //🔽ka sogs yig 'bru'i cha ru 'gyur //
analyzed: dga' ba bcu drug dang bcas pa dpral ba nas bde ba'i nor bu'i bar du'o // ka sogs yig 'bru'i cha ru 'gyur //
translated: Together with the sixteen joys, it is from the forehead to the jewel of bliss.🔽The portion of the syllables ka and so forth

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa cha ni //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa cha ni //
translated: and so forth.

original: lha mo sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi sngags dang bcas pa'i ye shes kyi mgo la sogs par 'byung zhing gnas so //
analyzed: lha mo sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi sngags dang bcas pa'i ye shes kyi mgo la sogs par 'byung zhing gnas so //
translated: The portion is together with the mantra of the thirty-two goddesses, arising and abiding in the head of gnosis and so forth.

original: a'a li k'a li gnyis sbyor las //
analyzed: a'a li k'a li gnyis sbyor las //
translated: From the union of the vowels and consonants,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la mchod sbyin gyis dkyil 'khor dang phyi'i 'phar mchod pa'i dkyil 'khor gnyis su dbyer med pa las rang bzhin dga' ba'i don 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la mchod sbyin gyis dkyil 'khor dang phyi'i 'phar mchod pa'i dkyil 'khor gnyis su dbyer med pa las rang bzhin dga' ba'i don 'byung ba'o //
translated: In this and other passages, the meaning of natural joy arises from the indivisibility of the two mandalas of offering and the outer mandala.

original: yang na a'a li ni shes rab ye shes kyi dbang /
analyzed: yang na a'a li ni shes rab ye shes kyi dbang /
translated: Alternatively, āli is the wisdom initiation of wisdom.

original: ye shes de nyid chad pa'i dga' ba'o /
analyzed: ye shes de nyid chad pa'i dga' ba'o /
translated: That wisdom itself is the joy of the continuum.

original: k'a li ni gsang ba'i bdag nyid ye shes mchog gi dga' ba'o //
analyzed: k'a li ni gsang ba'i bdag nyid ye shes mchog gi dga' ba'o //
translated: Kāli is the supreme joy of the secret nature.

original: de nas sbyor ba ni /
analyzed: de nas sbyor ba ni /
translated: Then, the union is

original: rang bzhin dga' ba'i bzhi ba'i 'bras bu'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin dga' ba'i bzhi ba'i 'bras bu'o //
translated: the result of the fourth, natural joy.

original: de yang bskyed pa'i rim pa dang / rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i bdag nyid do //
analyzed: de yang bskyed pa'i rim pa dang / rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i bdag nyid do //
translated: Moreover, it is the nature of the creation stage and the perfection stage.

original: de skad du /
analyzed: de skad du /
translated: Thus it is said:

original: dpal phyag rgya chen po'i thig le las /
analyzed: dpal phyag rgya chen po'i thig le las /
translated: In the Drop of the Great Seal,

original: k'a li bde ba gsang dbang yin //
analyzed: k'a li bde ba gsang dbang yin //
translated: Kāli is the secret initiation of bliss.

original: a'a li shes rab ye shes dbang //
analyzed: a'a li shes rab ye shes dbang //
translated: Āli is the wisdom initiation of wisdom.

original: de gnyis su dbus sbyor bde chen pa //
analyzed: de gnyis su dbus sbyor bde chen pa //
translated: The union of those two in the middle is great bliss.

original: rang bzhin dga' ba de ltar 'ong //🔽zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: rang bzhin dga' ba de ltar 'ong // zhes gsungs so //
translated: Natural joy arises in that way.

original: rim pa gnyis kyi don gsungs pa ni /
analyzed: rim pa gnyis kyi don gsungs pa ni /
translated: The meaning of the two stages is stated:

original: gsangs ba'i de nyid gsum zhes bya //
analyzed: gsangs ba'i de nyid gsum zhes bya //
translated: The three secrets are called the three realities.

original: zhes pa la sogs @247b pa gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes pa la sogs @247b pa gsungs so //
translated: And so on.

original: de yid dbus su de nyid bzhugs //
analyzed: de yid dbus su de nyid bzhugs //
translated: The reality of the mind is in the middle.

original: zhes bya ba ni de dag gi 'bras bu'i don bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni de dag gi 'bras bu'i don bstan pa yin no //
translated: This teaches the meaning of the result of those.

original: mchod pa'i dam tshig dus su ni //
analyzed: mchod pa'i dam tshig dus su ni //
translated: At the time of the pledge of worship,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni //
translated: and so on.

original: mchod pa dang / gtor ma dang / tshogs kyi 'khor lo la sogs pa'i dus su rnal 'byor pas gsang ba'i skad kyis brda rnams smra na ni mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa dam can rnams dgyes pa dang / rnal 'byor pa'i dam tshig yin pas myur pas myur bar 'grub par byed pa'o //
analyzed: mchod pa dang / gtor ma dang / tshogs kyi 'khor lo la sogs pa'i dus su rnal 'byor pas gsang ba'i skad kyis brda rnams smra na ni mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa dam can rnams dgyes pa dang / rnal 'byor pa'i dam tshig yin pas myur pas myur bar 'grub par byed pa'o //
translated: When the yogi speaks the secret language of signs at the time of worship, bali offerings, gaṇacakra, and so on, the ḍākinīs and so on are pleased, and since it is the pledge of the yogi, it will quickly bring about accomplishment.

original: dpal ye shes thig le'i dka' 'grel /
analyzed: dpal ye shes thig le'i dka' 'grel /
translated: The Commentary on the Glorious Wisdom-Essence

original: gsang ba'i de kho na nyid ces bya ba le'u bcu gnyis pa'i bshad pa'o /
analyzed: gsang ba'i de kho na nyid ces bya ba le'u bcu gnyis pa'i bshad pa'o /
translated: The explanation of the twelfth chapter called “The Secret Thatness.”

original: // / dbang bskur la sogs nges bstan na /
analyzed: // / dbang bskur la sogs nges bstan na /
translated: If the consecration and so on are taught,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la //
translated: and so on.

original: dbang ni bum pa'i dbye ba dang // gsang ba dang / shes rab ye shes dang / bzhi pa'i don gyis so //
analyzed: dbang ni bum pa'i dbye ba dang // gsang ba dang / shes rab ye shes dang / bzhi pa'i don gyis so //
translated: the secret, the wisdom-knowledge, and the fourth.

original: bskur lus la sog spa'i dri ma 'khru ba dang / bskur ba'i don te ;
analyzed: bskur lus la sog spa'i dri ma 'khru ba dang / bskur ba'i don te ;
translated: The meaning of the empowerment is the washing of the stains of the body, and so on.

original: 'di skad du //🔽gtsug tor gsang ba'i padma yi //
analyzed: 'di skad du // gtsug tor gsang ba'i padma yi //
translated: It is said:🔽The empowerment is called the empowerment🔽because of the empowerment and the washing

original: bskur dang 'khrud phyir dbang zhes bya //🔽zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: bskur dang 'khrud phyir dbang zhes bya // zhes gsungs so //
translated: of the crown, the secret, and the lotus.

original: la sogs nges bstan ni bdag nyid la thams cad kyi mtshan nyid rdzogs pa de rgyud dang 'bral bu dang / ngo bo la sogs pa'i rang bzhin rdzogs pa'o //
analyzed: la sogs nges bstan ni bdag nyid la thams cad kyi mtshan nyid rdzogs pa de rgyud dang 'bral bu dang / ngo bo la sogs pa'i rang bzhin rdzogs pa'o //
translated: The explanation of the “and so on” is that the nature of all is complete in oneself, free from the continuum of the tantra, and the nature of the essence, and so on, is complete.

original: de yang skabs kha cig tu 'bras bu me long lta bu'i ye shes la sogs pa'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: de yang skabs kha cig tu 'bras bu me long lta bu'i ye shes la sogs pa'i rang bzhin no //
translated: Also, in some contexts, the nature of the result is the mirror-like pristine consciousness, and so on.

original: ngo bo mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'o bdag nyid /
analyzed: ngo bo mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'o bdag nyid /
translated: The essence is the nature of Akṣobhya, and so on.

original: rgyu ni bskyod pa yab yum gyi rgyu las byung ba'o //
analyzed: rgyu ni bskyod pa yab yum gyi rgyu las byung ba'o //
translated: The cause is the arising from the cause of the father and mother.

original: ji skad du /🔽chu ye dbang bskur ngo bo yis //
analyzed: ji skad du / chu ye dbang bskur ngo bo yis //
translated: As is said:🔽The essence of the empowerment of the water

original: spyi bor mi bskyod gzugs rgyas 'dab //
analyzed: spyi bor mi bskyod gzugs rgyas 'dab //
translated: is the form of Akṣobhya in the crown.

original: de 'bras me long ye shes nyid //
analyzed: de 'bras me long ye shes nyid //
translated: Its result is the mirror-like pristine awareness itself.

original: ces bya ba la sogs pas gsungs so //
analyzed: ces bya ba la sogs pas gsungs so //
translated: Thus it is said.

original: yang la lar ni 'bras bu sa'i rim pa bzhin du sbyar te bstan to //
analyzed: yang la lar ni 'bras bu sa'i rim pa bzhin du sbyar te bstan to //
translated: Moreover, in some places, the result is taught as being connected with the stages of the grounds.

original: de yang 'di skad du //
analyzed: de yang 'di skad du //
translated: And it is said in this way:

original: dbang re la ni sa re ste //
analyzed: dbang re la ni sa re ste //
translated: Each empowerment is a ground,

original: de rnams / sa yi dbang phyug bdag //
analyzed: de rnams / sa yi dbang phyug bdag //
translated: and they are the lord of the grounds.

original: ces gsungs so //
analyzed: ces gsungs so //
translated: Thus it is said.

original: de bzhin du gnas skabs kha cig tu //
analyzed: de bzhin du gnas skabs kha cig tu //
translated: Similarly, in some contexts,

original: dbang re la 'bras bu dga' ba re dang sbyar ba dang / ngo bo yang de nyid do //
analyzed: dbang re la 'bras bu dga' ba re dang sbyar ba dang / ngo bo yang de nyid do //
translated: each empowerment is connected with each joy as a result, and its essence is that itself.

original: rgyu ni bdud rtsi byang chub kyi sems kyi chu bo'o //
analyzed: rgyu ni bdud rtsi byang chub kyi sems kyi chu bo'o //
translated: The cause is the river of the elixir of bodhicitta.

original: 'di skad du //🔽chu la sogs pa bcu gcig gi //
analyzed: 'di skad du // chu la sogs pa bcu gcig gi //
translated: It is said:🔽The eleven divisions of water and so forth

original: dbye bas dga' ba bcu gcig ldan //
analyzed: dbye bas dga' ba bcu gcig ldan //
translated: are endowed with the eleven joys.

original: de bzhin lhag ma yang yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin lhag ma yang yin no //
translated: The same is true of the rest.

original: ngo bo 'bras bu tha mi dang // ces gsungs so //🔽rgyud gsum @248a * //
analyzed: ngo bo 'bras bu tha mi dang // ces gsungs so // rgyud gsum @248a * //
translated: The essence and the result are not different.

original: gyi ni rim pa yis //
analyzed: gyi ni rim pa yis //
translated: In the sequence of the three continuums,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la //
translated: and so forth.

original: 'brel ba'i phyir dang 'phel ba'i phyir rgyud do //
analyzed: 'brel ba'i phyir dang 'phel ba'i phyir rgyud do //
translated: The continuum is so called because it is connected and because it increases.

original: bya ba'i rgyud dang / spyod pa'i rgyud dang / rnal 'byor gyi rgyud gsum mo //
analyzed: bya ba'i rgyud dang / spyod pa'i rgyud dang / rnal 'byor gyi rgyud gsum mo //
translated: Action Tantra, Performance Tantra, and Yoga Tantra.

original: rnal 'byor bla ma dang / rnal 'byor bla na med pa'i rgyud man chad ni rim pa yin no //
analyzed: rnal 'byor bla ma dang / rnal 'byor bla na med pa'i rgyud man chad ni rim pa yin no //
translated: The Yoga Tantra, the Highest Yoga Tantra, and so on, are the stages.

original: 'dir yang dbang gi grangs dang // mtshan nyid 'di rnams gsungs kyi gzhan du ni de lta ma yin no //
analyzed: 'dir yang dbang gi grangs dang // mtshan nyid 'di rnams gsungs kyi gzhan du ni de lta ma yin no //
translated: Here, the number of initiations and their characteristics are taught, but not elsewhere.

original: des ni thun mong dang / thun mong ma yin pa'i dbang gi mtshan nyid pa bstan pa'o //
analyzed: des ni thun mong dang / thun mong ma yin pa'i dbang gi mtshan nyid pa bstan pa'o //
translated: This teaches the characteristics of the common and uncommon initiations.

original: da ni thun mong ma yin pa'i dbang bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni thun mong ma yin pa'i dbang bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: Now, in order to teach the uncommon initiations, it says:

original: dga' ba lus su grags pa ste //
analyzed: dga' ba lus su grags pa ste //
translated: Joy is renowned as the body.

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: Here,

original: nang gi bum pa'i dbang bskur bas ni lus kyi dri ma rnam par rtog pa dag par byed pa dang / 'bras bu ni dga' ba'i mtshan nyid skye ba dang ldan no //
analyzed: nang gi bum pa'i dbang bskur bas ni lus kyi dri ma rnam par rtog pa dag par byed pa dang / 'bras bu ni dga' ba'i mtshan nyid skye ba dang ldan no //
translated: by the inner vase initiation, the stains of the body are purified, and the result is the arising of the characteristics of joy.

original: bskur ba'i gnas gsungs pa /
analyzed: bskur ba'i gnas gsungs pa /
translated: The place of initiation is taught:

original: lus kyi mgo bo'i gnas su dga' //🔽zhes bstan to //
analyzed: lus kyi mgo bo'i gnas su dga' //🔽zhes bstan to //
translated: Joy is in the place of the head of the body.

original: gsum pa'i rgyur yang 'gyur ba ni skabs 'di nyid du gsungs so //
analyzed: gsum pa'i rgyur yang 'gyur ba ni skabs 'di nyid du gsungs so //
translated: The cause of the third is also stated in this very context.

original: mchog tu dga' ba 'dir ni ngag //
analyzed: mchog tu dga' ba 'dir ni ngag //
translated: Here, supreme joy is speech.

original: ces bya ba ni //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni //
translated: This is stated.

original: de bzhin du gsang ba dang / shes rab ye shes dang / bzhi pa'i dbang gis rnam par rtog pa'i dri ma 'joms pa dang / 'bras bu dang gnas dang / rgyu 'bras kyi don bstan to //
analyzed: de bzhin du gsang ba dang / shes rab ye shes dang / bzhi pa'i dbang gis rnam par rtog pa'i dri ma 'joms pa dang / 'bras bu dang gnas dang / rgyu 'bras kyi don bstan to //
translated: Similarly, the secret, the wisdom-knowledge, and the fourth initiations are taught to destroy the stains of conceptualization, the meaning of result, place, and cause and effect.

original: 'bras bu nyid nan tan bya bar gsungs pa ni //
analyzed: 'bras bu nyid nan tan bya bar gsungs pa ni //
translated: The result itself is taught to be practice.

original: de nyid gsum bdag nye shes gang //
analyzed: de nyid gsum bdag nye shes gang //
translated: That very self of the three realities is the knowledge.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pas bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pas bstan pa yin no //
translated: This is taught by that and so forth.

original: bdun gnyis bye brag tu ni bzhugs //
analyzed: bdun gnyis bye brag tu ni bzhugs //
translated: The seven pairs are distinctly present.

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: This is stated.

original: chu dang / gsang ba dang / shes rab ye shes kyi don dang / bzhi pas ni dbang bcu bzhi dang / de'i 'bras bu dga' ba bcu bzhi'i don bshad do //
analyzed: chu dang / gsang ba dang / shes rab ye shes kyi don dang / bzhi pas ni dbang bcu bzhi dang / de'i 'bras bu dga' ba bcu bzhi'i don bshad do //
translated: The meaning of the water, the secret, and the wisdom-knowledge initiations and the fourth is explained to be the meaning of the fourteen initiations and the fourteen joys that are their result.

original: yang ye shes 'di nyid 'bras bu don 'di nyid yin par bstan pa /
analyzed: yang ye shes 'di nyid 'bras bu don 'di nyid yin par bstan pa /
translated: This very wisdom is taught to be the meaning of the result.

original: yan lag rab mdor bsdus pa //
analyzed: yan lag rab mdor bsdus pa //
translated: The branches are well summarized.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: Thus it is said.

original: da ni gsang ba'i don gyis dbang gi dbang gi nges pa gsungs pa ni //
analyzed: da ni gsang ba'i don gyis dbang gi dbang gi nges pa gsungs pa ni //
translated: Now, the ascertainment of the secret empowerment is stated by the meaning of the empowerment:

original: chu yi dbang bskur mdoms su ste //
analyzed: chu yi dbang bskur mdoms su ste //
translated: The water empowerment is in the navel,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la rgyu dang 'bras bu la sogs pa'i don gyis bstan pa ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la rgyu dang 'bras bu la sogs pa'i don gyis bstan pa ste /
translated: and so forth. The meaning of cause and effect, and so on, is explained.

original: 'on kyang gnas kyi bye brag gis gsang ba'i chu la sogs pa'i khyad par bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang gnas kyi bye brag gis gsang ba'i chu la sogs pa'i khyad par bshad pa yin no //
translated: However, the secret water, and so on, are explained by the distinctions of the locations.

original: de nyid la yang rdzogs pa'i tshul ni /
analyzed: de nyid la yang rdzogs pa'i tshul ni /
translated: The complete method in that is:

original: mdud pa'i gnas su @248b rim pa yis //
analyzed: mdud pa'i gnas su @248b rim pa yis //
translated: In the location of the knot,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: and so on.

original: rang bzhin dga' ba nas mchog gi dga' ba la sogs pa'i gnas rim par bstan par bya ste /
analyzed: rang bzhin dga' ba nas mchog gi dga' ba la sogs pa'i gnas rim par bstan par bya ste /
translated: The natural joy, supreme joy, and so on, are explained in stages.

original: bde ba chen po'i snying po'i 'khor lo'i gnas man chad du rang bzhin dga' ba /
analyzed: bde ba chen po'i snying po'i 'khor lo'i gnas man chad du rang bzhin dga' ba /
translated: The natural joy is below the location of the wheel of the essence of great bliss.

original: dga' ba gzhan dang mi mnyam pa'i rtog pa kun dang bral ba dpe med par nyed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dga' ba gzhan dang mi mnyam pa'i rtog pa kun dang bral ba dpe med par nyed par 'gyur ro //
translated: Joy is incomparable, free from all concepts, and inexpressible.

original: rgyud 'di rmad du byung ba'i phyir //
analyzed: rgyud 'di rmad du byung ba'i phyir //
translated: Because this Tantra is marvelous,

original: 'di nyid du sbas pa'i don thams cad gsungs te /
analyzed: 'di nyid du sbas pa'i don thams cad gsungs te /
translated: all the hidden meanings are taught in it.

original: rdo rje ka ba de bzhin gsang //
analyzed: rdo rje ka ba de bzhin gsang //
translated: The vajra pillar is likewise secret,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: and so forth.

original: de skad du yang /
analyzed: de skad du yang /
translated: And thus:

original: rnal 'byor ma dang lhan cig tu //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma dang lhan cig tu //
translated: Together with the yoginis,

original: du ma'i rgyud du bshad na yang ;
analyzed: du ma'i rgyud du bshad na yang ;
translated: although explained in many Tantras,

original: / de lta mod kyi 'di yi rgyud //
analyzed: / de lta mod kyi 'di yi rgyud //
translated: nevertheless, this Tantra

original: bcu drug char yang mi phod do //
analyzed: bcu drug char yang mi phod do //
translated: does not reach even a sixteenth part.

original: zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes gsungs so //
translated: And thus.

original: da ni dbang dang 'bras bur bcas bshad de /
analyzed: da ni dbang dang 'bras bur bcas bshad de /
translated: Now, the empowerment and its result are explained.

original: aa yi yig 'bru dga' ba yin //
analyzed: aa yi yig 'bru dga' ba yin //
translated: The syllable A is joy,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
translated: and so forth.

original: aa bhi she ka'i sgras ni dbang yin te /
analyzed: aa bhi she ka'i sgras ni dbang yin te /
translated: The word abhisheka means empowerment.

original: dbang ni chu dang / gsang ba dang ; shes rab ye shes dang / bzhi pa'i aa bhi she ka ka la sh'a/ zhes bya ba'i yi ge drug ces bya ste /
analyzed: dbang ni chu dang / gsang ba dang ; shes rab ye shes dang / bzhi pa'i aa bhi she ka ka la sh'a/ zhes bya ba'i yi ge drug ces bya ste /
translated: Empowerment is the water empowerment, the secret empowerment, the wisdom-knowledge empowerment, and the fourth empowerment.

original: aa tsam zhig las pa dang / bum pa'i dbang gi ye shes dang po smos pas /
analyzed: aa tsam zhig las pa dang / bum pa'i dbang gi ye shes dang po smos pas /
translated: The syllable A is the first of the six syllables, and the wisdom of the vase empowerment.

original: rgyu de las 'bras bu dang dga' ba'o //
analyzed: rgyu de las 'bras bu dang dga' ba'o //
translated: From that cause, the result and joy.

original: de bzhin du /
analyzed: de bzhin du /
translated: And thus:

original: sgra'i dbyi gzhug byas pa las gsang ba dang // shes rab ye shes dang / bzhi pa'i dbang gi rgyu dang 'bras bu'i rnam pa yang bshad par bya'o //
analyzed: sgra'i dbyi gzhug byas pa las gsang ba dang // shes rab ye shes dang / bzhi pa'i dbang gi rgyu dang 'bras bu'i rnam pa yang bshad par bya'o //
translated: The secret initiation, the initiation of pristine awareness through wisdom, and the fourth initiation should be explained in terms of their causes and results, as well.

original: yang sngon bzhin du 'dir yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' log par mi gsung zhes bya bas bstan to //
analyzed: yang sngon bzhin du 'dir yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' log par mi gsung zhes bya bas bstan to //
translated: Moreover, just as before, here also it is taught that the Transcendent Conqueror does not speak in a contradictory manner.

original: da ni dbang gi 'bras bu dga' brgyud de rang bzhin 'bral par dgos par bstan pa'i phyir //
analyzed: da ni dbang gi 'bras bu dga' brgyud de rang bzhin 'bral par dgos par bstan pa'i phyir //
translated: Now, in order to teach that the result of the initiation, the sequence of joys, is necessarily free from intrinsic existence,🔽it is said:

original: gang du yang ni mi dmigs phyir //🔽zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: gang du yang ni mi dmigs phyir // zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: ...because it is not observed anywhere.🔽Moreover, it is taught together with its derivation of the term because it is the cause of the arising of the utterly non-arisen and because it is the proximate cause of the fourth.

original: de yang dag par skye ba dang / skye ba med pa'i mtshan nyid las skye ba'i rgyu mtshan yin pa'i phyir dang bzhi ba'i nye ba'i rgyur 'gyur bas nges tshig dang bcas nas bstan ba dang ; byang chub kyi sems bcom ldan 'das mchog gi dga' bar grags pa nyid rgyur 'gyur ba dgos pa'i phyir dang /
analyzed: de yang dag par skye ba dang / skye ba med pa'i mtshan nyid las skye ba'i rgyu mtshan yin pa'i phyir dang bzhi ba'i nye ba'i rgyur 'gyur bas nges tshig dang bcas nas bstan ba dang ; byang chub kyi sems bcom ldan 'das mchog gi dga' bar grags pa nyid rgyur 'gyur ba dgos pa'i phyir dang /
translated: The bodhicitta is renowned as the supreme joy of the Transcendent Conqueror himself. It is the cause and the necessity.

original: de dag la dang po'i dga' ba'i rgyu dgos pa'i phyir na /
analyzed: de dag la dang po'i dga' ba'i rgyu dgos pa'i phyir na /
translated: Since the cause of the joy of the first is necessary for them,

original: aa yi yig 'bru mchog gi gnas //
analyzed: aa yi yig 'bru mchog gi gnas //
translated: the syllable A is the supreme place.

original: zhes gsungs so //🔽de ni 'bras bur grags pa bzhi la @249a * //
analyzed: zhes gsungs so // de ni 'bras bur grags pa bzhi la @249a * //
translated: Thus it is said.🔽That is taught as the two,🔽the four well-known results.

original: gnyis su phe nas ston to //
analyzed: gnyis su phe nas ston to //
translated: It is taught by the words

original: mngon par dga' dang chad dgar grags //🔽zhes bya ba la sogs pas bstan te /
analyzed: mngon par dga' dang chad dgar grags // zhes bya ba la sogs pas bstan te /
translated: manifest joy and the joy of cessation.

original: de yang 'di skad du /
analyzed: de yang 'di skad du /
translated: And that is as follows:🔽The one who experiences

original: ska ; ldan mi gang nyams su myong //
analyzed: ska ; ldan mi gang nyams su myong //
translated: the one endowed with the two

original: de ni rdzogs pa'i rim bzhin no //
analyzed: de ni rdzogs pa'i rim bzhin no //
translated: is according to the completion stage.

original: nyams su myongs min rdzogs pa ni //
analyzed: nyams su myongs min rdzogs pa ni //
translated: The completion that is not experienced

original: gang du sus kyang mi shes so //
analyzed: gang du sus kyang mi shes so //
translated: is not known by anyone anywhere.

original: zhes des ni gnas dang bcas pa dang / gnas bral bar bshad pa'o //🔽dpal ye shes thig le'i dka' 'grel ba'i de kho na nyid ces bya ba le'u bcu gsum pa'i bshad pa'o /
analyzed: zhes des ni gnas dang bcas pa dang / gnas bral bar bshad pa'o // dpal ye shes thig le'i dka' 'grel ba'i de kho na nyid ces bya ba le'u bcu gsum pa'i bshad pa'o /
translated: Thus, it explains the one with a place and the one without a place.🔽This concludes the explanation of chapter thirteen, called “The Reality,”

original: // / de kho yang ni bshad bya ba //🔽zhes bya ba la sogs pa la ;
analyzed: // / de kho yang ni bshad bya ba // zhes bya ba la sogs pa la ;
translated: of the commentary on the glorious Wisdom-Essence Tantra.🔽Now, the explanation of the certainty of this

original: / dbang gi rim pa'i rjes thogs su 'di'i nges pa bshad ces bya'o //
analyzed: / dbang gi rim pa'i rjes thogs su 'di'i nges pa bshad ces bya'o //
translated: is said to be immediately after the stage of empowerment.

original: nang gi dga' bar bya ba ste ltos pa'i chos so //
analyzed: nang gi dga' bar bya ba ste ltos pa'i chos so //
translated: The inner joy is the dependent phenomenon.

original: mtshan nyid sbyin sreg ni bdag nyid dang 'brel bas 'bad mi dgos par 'grub par 'gyur ba'i don gyis na //
analyzed: mtshan nyid sbyin sreg ni bdag nyid dang 'brel bas 'bad mi dgos par 'grub par 'gyur ba'i don gyis na //
translated: The characteristic fire offering is accomplished without effort by being connected with oneself.

original: sbyin sreg ma yin pas dngos grub ring bar byed pa'i phyir na 'di nyid bsgrub bo //
analyzed: sbyin sreg ma yin pas dngos grub ring bar byed pa'i phyir na 'di nyid bsgrub bo //
translated: Since it is not a fire offering, it is accomplished because it makes the siddhi distant.

original: rang bzhin gyis sbyin sreg gi las rnams rdzogs pa'i mtshan nyid ni //
analyzed: rang bzhin gyis sbyin sreg gi las rnams rdzogs pa'i mtshan nyid ni //
translated: The characteristic of the completion of the natural fire offering is

original: kha ni hom khung zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i //
analyzed: kha ni hom khung zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i //
translated: the mouth is the fire pit, and so on.

original: de yang ri drug la sogs pa'i mchod rdzas la longs spyod pa'i sbyin sreg 'dir ni /
analyzed: de yang ri drug la sogs pa'i mchod rdzas la longs spyod pa'i sbyin sreg 'dir ni /
translated: Moreover, the fire offering that enjoys the offering substances of the six mountains, and so on, is

original: mchod pa'i gsang ba'i brda'i skabs su nga rgyal 'dir ni sha chen po la sogs pa'i don gyis //
analyzed: mchod pa'i gsang ba'i brda'i skabs su nga rgyal 'dir ni sha chen po la sogs pa'i don gyis //
translated: the secret sign of the offering. Here, the meaning of the great flesh, and so on, is the pride.

original: sna tshogs pa'i bza' ba rnams dang / tshod ma dang / chu la sogs te btung ba ji snyed yod pa dang / mdor na zas skom ro drug gis bsdus pa'i sreg rdzas kun gyis mchod par bya ba nyid ni bdag nyid rang bzhin gyis gnas pa'i lha la mchod do //
analyzed: sna tshogs pa'i bza' ba rnams dang / tshod ma dang / chu la sogs te btung ba ji snyed yod pa dang / mdor na zas skom ro drug gis bsdus pa'i sreg rdzas kun gyis mchod par bya ba nyid ni bdag nyid rang bzhin gyis gnas pa'i lha la mchod do //
translated: With all the various foods, vegetables, water, and so forth, in short, with all the burnt offerings subsumed by the six tastes of food and drink, one should make offerings to the deity who naturally abides.

original: yang na dang por bdag gis lus lha'i dkyil 'khor du byin gyis brlabs la /
analyzed: yang na dang por bdag gis lus lha'i dkyil 'khor du byin gyis brlabs la /
translated: Alternatively, first one should bless one’s body as the deity’s maṇḍala.

original: de'i 'og tu bdud rtsi byin gyis brlabs pa'i rim pas kha zas dag par byas la //
analyzed: de'i 'og tu bdud rtsi byin gyis brlabs pa'i rim pas kha zas dag par byas la //
translated: Then, after purifying the food through the stages of consecrating the elixir,

original: de yang sha chen dang // sha dang // zan dang / tshod ma dang / mar dang / mdor na bza' btung ji snyed pa thams cad sbyangs la /
analyzed: de yang sha chen dang // sha dang // zan dang / tshod ma dang / mar dang / mdor na bza' btung ji snyed pa thams cad sbyangs la /
translated: one should purify all the food and drink, such as great meat, meat, rice, vegetables, and butter.

original: de nas sku gsung thugs kyi sa bon dang / sngar bdud rtsi lnga ye shes bdud rtsir byin gyis brlabs pa'i rim pas kyang yang dag par byas te /
analyzed: de nas sku gsung thugs kyi sa bon dang / sngar bdud rtsi lnga ye shes bdud rtsir byin gyis brlabs pa'i rim pas kyang yang dag par byas te /
translated: Then, having purified it with the seed syllables of body, speech, and mind, and the stages of consecrating the five elixirs as the elixir of timeless awareness,

original: bdag rol pas lha rnams dang tha mi dad par 'gyur ba yin te /
analyzed: bdag rol pas lha rnams dang tha mi dad par 'gyur ba yin te /
translated: By the self-consecration, one becomes non-different from the deities.

original: lte ba'i me @249b rlung gis bskyod cing 'bar bas zhi ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid do //🔽yang na rdo gsum ye shes sa bon gyis //
analyzed: lte ba'i me @249b rlung gis bskyod cing 'bar bas zhi ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid do // yang na rdo gsum ye shes sa bon gyis //
translated: The characteristics of pacification, etc. are by the stirring and blazing of the fire-wind at the navel.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la //
translated: Again, “the three vajras with the seed of exalted wisdom” and so forth.

original: sku rdo rje'i gnas spyi bor /
analyzed: sku rdo rje'i gnas spyi bor /
translated: In the place of the vajra body at the crown of the head,

original: de bzhin mgrin pa dang / lte ba'i gnas so //
analyzed: de bzhin mgrin pa dang / lte ba'i gnas so //
translated: and likewise in the place of the throat and the navel.

original: dga' ba ni sku /
analyzed: dga' ba ni sku /
translated: Joy is the body,

original: mchog gi dga' ba dang chad pa'i dga' ba dang / rang bzhin dga' ba dang / gsung dang / thugs dang // ye shes kyi rim pa bzhin no //
analyzed: mchog gi dga' ba dang chad pa'i dga' ba dang / rang bzhin dga' ba dang / gsung dang / thugs dang // ye shes kyi rim pa bzhin no //
translated: and supreme joy, the joy of cessation, natural joy, speech, mind, and exalted wisdom, respectively.

original: sa bon yi ge gsum gyis 'dir bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: sa bon yi ge gsum gyis 'dir bshad par bya ste /
translated: The three seed syllables are explained here.

original: las kyi rlung gis ye shes kyi me 'bar bas /
analyzed: las kyi rlung gis ye shes kyi me 'bar bas /
translated: The fire of exalted wisdom blazes by the wind of karma.

original: byang chub kyi sems 'bab dang / gnas kyi bye brag gis bstan par 'gyur ba ni //
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems 'bab dang / gnas kyi bye brag gis bstan par 'gyur ba ni //
translated: The falling of the bodhicitta is taught by the distinctions of the places.

original: sku rdo rje'i sa bon aom dang / thugs rdo rje'i sa bon h'um dang // gsung rdo rje'i sa bon a'a: dang / bar ba la sogs pa'i rim pa bzhin no //
analyzed: sku rdo rje'i sa bon aom dang / thugs rdo rje'i sa bon h'um dang // gsung rdo rje'i sa bon a'a: dang / bar ba la sogs pa'i rim pa bzhin no //
translated: The seed of the vajra body is OM, the seed of the vajra mind is HUM, and the seed of the vajra speech is AH, in the order of the middle and so forth.

original: de ni / rdor gsum ye shes sa bon gyis //
analyzed: de ni / rdor gsum ye shes sa bon gyis //
translated: That is explained as:

original: 'bar byas dkar byas dge byas so //
analyzed: 'bar byas dkar byas dge byas so //
translated: The blazing, the whitening, and the purifying,🔽by the seed of the gnosis of the three vajras.

original: zhes bshad do //
analyzed: zhes bshad do //
translated: And:

original: phyi nang rtag tu rab tshim byas //
analyzed: phyi nang rtag tu rab tshim byas //
translated: Always satiate the outer and inner.

original: zhes bya ba la ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la ni /
translated: In this,

original: lus kyi dkyil 'khor dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor dag pa bskyed rim rdzogs rim gyis phye ba'i lha nyid bdud rtsis tshim par byas te /
analyzed: lus kyi dkyil 'khor dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor dag pa bskyed rim rdzogs rim gyis phye ba'i lha nyid bdud rtsis tshim par byas te /
translated: the deity itself, which is the generation stage and perfection stage divisions of the pure body mandala and concentration mandala, is satiated with nectar.

original: rnam par rtog pa bsreg cing lha rnams la dbul zhing sbyin no //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa bsreg cing lha rnams la dbul zhing sbyin no //
translated: Imagining burns and offers to the deities.

original: de'i phyir / de ltar sbyin sreg las kyis ni //
analyzed: de'i phyir / de ltar sbyin sreg las kyis ni //
translated: Therefore,

original: zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes gsungs te /
translated: it is said:🔽By the rite of the fire sacrifice,

original: las ni rnam pa zhes la sogs pa'i don te thun mong gi dngos grub /
analyzed: las ni rnam pa zhes la sogs pa'i don te thun mong gi dngos grub /
translated: The rite is the common powers and so forth,🔽or the supreme power.

original: yang na mchog gi dngos grub gsungs pa /
analyzed: yang na mchog gi dngos grub gsungs pa /
translated: It is said:

original: lha yi skur ni nges par 'gyur //
analyzed: lha yi skur ni nges par 'gyur //
translated: One will certainly become the body of the deity.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: and so on.

original: dga' ba gnyis kyi mnyam sbyor ba //
analyzed: dga' ba gnyis kyi mnyam sbyor ba //
translated: The union of the two joys

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la ;
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la ;
translated: and so on.

original: / dga' ba gnyis pa ni //
analyzed: / dga' ba gnyis pa ni //
translated: The second joy

original: mchog gi dga' ba 'khor ba'i bdag nyid dang / chad pa'i dga' ba mya ngan las 'das pa'i bdag nyid do //
analyzed: mchog gi dga' ba 'khor ba'i bdag nyid dang / chad pa'i dga' ba mya ngan las 'das pa'i bdag nyid do //
translated: is the supreme joy, which is the nature of cyclic existence, and the joy of cessation, which is the nature of nirvana.

original: de dag mnyam sbyor ba ni /
analyzed: de dag mnyam sbyor ba ni /
translated: Their union

original: rang bzhin dga' ba mtha' gnyis la mi gnas so //
analyzed: rang bzhin dga' ba mtha' gnyis la mi gnas so //
translated: is the natural joy, which does not abide in the two extremes.

original: de skad du /
analyzed: de skad du /
translated: Thus it is said:

original: mchog gi dga' ba 'khor bar bshad //
analyzed: mchog gi dga' ba 'khor bar bshad //
translated: The supreme joy is said to be cyclic existence.

original: mya ngan las 'das chad pa'i dga' //
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das chad pa'i dga' //
translated: The joy of cessation is nirvana.

original: rang bzhin dga' ba nyid dang bral //
analyzed: rang bzhin dga' ba nyid dang bral //
translated: The natural joy is free from both.

original: rang rig brjod du med pa'o //🔽zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: rang rig brjod du med pa'o // zhes gsungs so //
translated: It is self-awareness, inexpressible.

original: dus ni bzang ba dang / ngan pa dang bral ba bsam du med pa'i dus so //
analyzed: dus ni bzang ba dang / ngan pa dang bral ba bsam du med pa'i dus so //
translated: Time is the inconceivable time, free from good and bad.🔽By means of

original: kyis zhes bya ba ni bsam du med pa'i byed pa'i don to //
analyzed: kyis zhes bya ba ni bsam du med pa'i byed pa'i don to //
translated: means the meaning of inconceivable activity.

original: rtsa'i mkha' 'gro ma rnams byang @250a * //
analyzed: rtsa'i mkha' 'gro ma rnams byang @250a * //
translated: The dakinis of the channels

original: chub kyi sems bde ba dang bcas pas gang ba'o //
analyzed: chub kyi sems bde ba dang bcas pas gang ba'o //
translated: are filled with the bodhicitta of bliss.

original: rnal 'byor dang ldan zhing brtson pas rnyed kyi //
analyzed: rnal 'byor dang ldan zhing brtson pas rnyed kyi //
translated: It is attained by one who is endowed with yoga and effort.

original: sems can kun gyi thun mong ma yin pa'i phyir te dbang ngo //
analyzed: sems can kun gyi thun mong ma yin pa'i phyir te dbang ngo //
translated: Because it is not common to all sentient beings, it is the empowerment.

original: yang rang bzhin dga' ba bdag mi snang ba dang longs spyod gzhan dbang ngo //
analyzed: yang rang bzhin dga' ba bdag mi snang ba dang longs spyod gzhan dbang ngo //
translated: Moreover, the natural joy is the self that is not manifest, and the enjoyment is the other that is dependent.

original: de'i don ni /
analyzed: de'i don ni /
translated: The meaning of that is

original: lte snying bde ba'i padma yi //
analyzed: lte snying bde ba'i padma yi //
translated: The lotus of the heart is bliss.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pas gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pas gsungs so //
translated: It is taught by the lotus of the heart is bliss and so forth.

original: rgyu'i ming 'bras bu la btags pa ni skyin med do //
analyzed: rgyu'i ming 'bras bu la btags pa ni skyin med do //
translated: The name of the cause is designated to the result, which is the interest-free loan.

original: 'on kyang ye shes kyi 'od la sogs pa'i don gyis bshad do //
analyzed: 'on kyang ye shes kyi 'od la sogs pa'i don gyis bshad do //
translated: However, it is explained by the meaning of the light of wisdom and so forth.

original: da ni las kyi phyag rgya la brten nas sbyin sreg ston te /
analyzed: da ni las kyi phyag rgya la brten nas sbyin sreg ston te /
translated: Now, the fire offering based on the karma consort is taught:

original: kun rdzob rnam pa'i gzugs su ni //
analyzed: kun rdzob rnam pa'i gzugs su ni //
translated: In the form of the aspect of the relative,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pas //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pas //
translated: and so forth.

original: hom khung dang / hom zhing dang / me lha dang / sreg rdzas dang / blugs gzar dang / dgang gzar dang / mar dang / de bzhin snod la sogs pa'i rgyus 'bras bu thob pa yan chad bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: hom khung dang / hom zhing dang / me lha dang / sreg rdzas dang / blugs gzar dang / dgang gzar dang / mar dang / de bzhin snod la sogs pa'i rgyus 'bras bu thob pa yan chad bshad pa yin no //
translated: The hearth, the fire pit, the fire god, the burnt substances, the ladle, the funnel, the ghee, and so forth, and the vessel, and so forth, are explained as far as the attainment of the result.

original: rigs ni mtshan ma rnams las shes //🔽zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: rigs ni mtshan ma rnams las shes // zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The family is known from the signs.

original: 'dod pa dang / dad pa dang / snying rje la sogs pa'o yon tan rnams las de bzhin gshegs pa rigs lnga'i rgyu yin par bshad par shes te /
analyzed: 'dod pa dang / dad pa dang / snying rje la sogs pa'o yon tan rnams las de bzhin gshegs pa rigs lnga'i rgyu yin par bshad par shes te /
translated: This is the explanation of the cause of the five families of Tathagatas from the qualities of desire, faith, compassion, and so on.

original: de yang 'dir rdo rje rigs kyi khongs su bsdu ba yin no //
analyzed: de yang 'dir rdo rje rigs kyi khongs su bsdu ba yin no //
translated: And that is included here in the Vajra family.

original: de bzhin du /
analyzed: de bzhin du /
translated: And likewise,

original: rang bzhin dga' ba rnyed ba'i don gyi phyir //🔽zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: rang bzhin dga' ba rnyed ba'i don gyi phyir // zhes bya ba ni /
translated: for the sake of attaining natural joy.

original: rigs kyi mtshan ma'i don bstan pa bzhin //
analyzed: rigs kyi mtshan ma'i don bstan pa bzhin //
translated: This is the explanation of the meaning of the signs of the family,

original: rang bzhin dga' ba'i don 'di la yang bla ma'i man ngag thabs kyi rnam pa'i mtshan mas shes par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rang bzhin dga' ba'i don 'di la yang bla ma'i man ngag thabs kyi rnam pa'i mtshan mas shes par 'gyur ro //
translated: and this meaning of natural joy is to be known by the signs of the method of the guru's instruction.

original: de yang shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba'i dus na /
analyzed: de yang shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba'i dus na /
translated: And that is at the time of the initiation of the wisdom-knowledge,

original: bla ma'i bka' stsal pa la sogs pa la yid ches nas /
analyzed: bla ma'i bka' stsal pa la sogs pa la yid ches nas /
translated: when one has confidence in the guru's words and so on,

original: de ma thag tu yi shes skye bar 'gyur ba ni /
analyzed: de ma thag tu yi shes skye bar 'gyur ba ni /
translated: and immediately the wisdom arises.

original: skyabs sbyin gyi ngo bor bshad do //
analyzed: skyabs sbyin gyi ngo bor bshad do //
translated: That is explained as the essence of the gift of refuge.

original: de'i dus su nyams su myong ba de'i phyis bsgoms pa de yang nas yang du goms pa'i dbang gis ye shes tshor bar yongs su shes pa nyid do //
analyzed: de'i dus su nyams su myong ba de'i phyis bsgoms pa de yang nas yang du goms pa'i dbang gis ye shes tshor bar yongs su shes pa nyid do //
translated: At that time, the experience of that is the full knowledge of the intuition that is the result of the repeated cultivation of that meditation.

original: nges par yang nas yang du chad pa'i dga' ba'i ye shes la blo dpyod cing goms par 'gyur bas /
analyzed: nges par yang nas yang du chad pa'i dga' ba'i ye shes la blo dpyod cing goms par 'gyur bas /
translated: The mind is analyzed and becomes familiar with the intuition of pleasure that is repeatedly interrupted.

original: rang bzhin dga' ba gsal bar 'gyur na ni //
analyzed: rang bzhin dga' ba gsal bar 'gyur na ni //
translated: If the natural joy becomes clear,

original: dpyod pa'i bdag nyid kyi thabs so //
analyzed: dpyod pa'i bdag nyid kyi thabs so //
translated: it is the method of the nature of analysis.

original: de ni ye shes su bdag gis bshad do zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de ni ye shes su bdag gis bshad do zhes bya ba ni /
translated: I have explained that as intuition.

original: rtags nas ye shes su bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so //
analyzed: rtags nas ye shes su bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so //
translated: The intuition is taught by the Bhagavān as the sign.

original: bla ma'i snga nas rten dang bcas pa la dpyod @250b pas rten med pa'i rang bzhin dga' ba rnyed par gyur zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: bla ma'i snga nas rten dang bcas pa la dpyod @250b pas rten med pa'i rang bzhin dga' ba rnyed par gyur zhes gsungs so //
translated: The natural joy without a basis is attained by analyzing the basis that is previously taught by the guru.

original: de bzhin du mun nag tu rin po che'i phrag mo'i phra mo yod pa de zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
analyzed: de bzhin du mun nag tu rin po che'i phrag mo'i phra mo yod pa de zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
translated: In the same way, the fine jewel necklace that exists in the darkness, etc.

original: yang dang yang du dpe yis mtshon nas gsal ba'i rgyu'i rang bzhin dga' ba chen po yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po rnyed par 'gyur zhing mthong bar bya'o //
analyzed: yang dang yang du dpe yis mtshon nas gsal ba'i rgyu'i rang bzhin dga' ba chen po yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po rnyed par 'gyur zhing mthong bar bya'o //
translated: Again and again, illustrated by examples, the cause-nature of clarity is the great joy, the king of wish-fulfilling jewels, which is to be found and seen.

original: de ni bar gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs gnyis su med pa'i ye shes de rnal 'byor pas 'grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ni bar gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs gnyis su med pa'i ye shes de rnal 'byor pas 'grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: That is the non-dual wisdom of the mind of all the Tathagatas, which the yogi will accomplish.

original: dpal ye shes thig le'i dka' 'grel ba'i de kho na nyid ces bya ba le'u bcu bzhi pa'i bshad pa'o /
analyzed: dpal ye shes thig le'i dka' 'grel ba'i de kho na nyid ces bya ba le'u bcu bzhi pa'i bshad pa'o /
translated: This concludes the explanation of chapter fourteen of the commentary called “The Truth,” of the glorious Wisdom-Essence Tantra.

original: // / de nas gtor ma chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: // / de nas gtor ma chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: Now, beginning with “the great bali,”

original: le'u bco lnga pa 'dis gtor ma'i nges pa'i don ston ti zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: le'u bco lnga pa 'dis gtor ma'i nges pa'i don ston ti zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: this fifteenth chapter teaches the definitive meaning of bali.

original: sems can thams cad bsrung don du //
analyzed: sems can thams cad bsrung don du //
translated: For the sake of protecting all sentient beings,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: and so forth.

original: phyi'i don gyis 'gro ba rigs drug yin la //
analyzed: phyi'i don gyis 'gro ba rigs drug yin la //
translated: The outer meaning is the six classes of migrating beings.

original: 'dir byang chub kyi sems ga pur 'byung ba ni sems can //
analyzed: 'dir byang chub kyi sems ga pur 'byung ba ni sems can //
translated: Here, the bodhicitta camphor is sentient beings.

original: de yang ye shes kyi snying po can 'di rnam par rtog pa 'byung ba bsrung ba'i phyir gtor ma sbyin no //
analyzed: de yang ye shes kyi snying po can 'di rnam par rtog pa 'byung ba bsrung ba'i phyir gtor ma sbyin no //
translated: Moreover, this essence of pristine consciousness is offered as a torma in order to protect the arising of concepts.

original: de skad di /
analyzed: de skad di /
translated: Thus it is said:

original: 'byung ba rnams ni bsrung ba'i phyir //
analyzed: 'byung ba rnams ni bsrung ba'i phyir //
translated: In order to protect the elements,

original: der ni gtor ma sbyin par bya //
analyzed: der ni gtor ma sbyin par bya //
translated: the torma is offered there.

original: 'byung ba ga pur du ni grags //
analyzed: 'byung ba ga pur du ni grags //
translated: The elements are renowned as camphor,

original: ga pur sems can 'dir ni bstan //🔽sems can snying po ye shes bde //
analyzed: ga pur sems can 'dir ni bstan // sems can snying po ye shes bde //
translated: and camphor is taught as sentient beings here.

original: zhes gsungs pa dang / yang /
analyzed: zhes gsungs pa dang / yang /
translated: The essence of sentient beings is the bliss of pristine consciousness.

original: 'byung ba bsrung don gtor ma gtang //
analyzed: 'byung ba bsrung don gtor ma gtang //
translated: In order to protect the elements, offer the torma.

original: de ni srog chags bsad pa'o //
analyzed: de ni srog chags bsad pa'o //
translated: That is killing living beings.

original: gcad pa de ni mchog gnas su //
analyzed: gcad pa de ni mchog gnas su //
translated: That cutting is the supreme place

original: 'gro ba 'gog par byed pa'o //🔽zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: 'gro ba 'gog par byed pa'o // zhes gsungs so //
translated: that stops the movement of beings.

original: dga' ba gsum gyi don thabs dang shes rab kyis 'bad la bsgrub pa ni /
analyzed: dga' ba gsum gyi don thabs dang shes rab kyis 'bad la bsgrub pa ni /
translated: The meaning of the three joys is accomplished through the effort of method and wisdom.

original: 'bad pa yis ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'bad pa yis ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “With effort” is as follows.

original: ba yi yig 'bru bha gar brjod //🔽ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: ba yi yig 'bru bha gar brjod // ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: The syllable va is called the bhaga.🔽In the statement “the syllable ba is the path,”

original: ba lam gi sgras gtor ma ste /
analyzed: ba lam gi sgras gtor ma ste /
translated: the word “path” is the torma,

original: de yang bha ga'i phyis pas 'grub po //
analyzed: de yang bha ga'i phyis pas 'grub po //
translated: and that is accomplished by wiping the bhaga.

original: de nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid bcom ldan 'das ma'o ;
analyzed: de nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid bcom ldan 'das ma'o ;
translated: That is the definition of the perfection of wisdom, the Blessed Lady.

original: / lim gi yang de bzhin te /
analyzed: / lim gi yang de bzhin te /
translated: The syllable LIM is also like that,

original: bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po'i bdag nyid dpal ye shes thig le'i mtshan ma /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po'i bdag nyid dpal ye shes thig le'i mtshan ma /
translated: the sign of the glorious essence of the bliss of the Blessed One, the Drop of Wisdom.

original: de dag sbyor bar mtshon pa can //
analyzed: de dag sbyor bar mtshon pa can //
translated: They are endowed with the sign of union.

original: 'on kyang rnal 'byor pa de dag phyag rgya bzhi las gang yang rung ba cig kyang sbyor ba byas pa las dga' ba gsum po'i @251a * //
analyzed: 'on kyang rnal 'byor pa de dag phyag rgya bzhi las gang yang rung ba cig kyang sbyor ba byas pa las dga' ba gsum po'i @251a * //
translated: However, the yogi/nis, having practiced any one of the four seals,

original: dngos po'i 'byung ba de nyid bsrungs pas ni phyag rgya chen po nyid thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dngos po'i 'byung ba de nyid bsrungs pas ni phyag rgya chen po nyid thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: by protecting the arising of the three joys, will attain the Great Seal.

original: mtshan dang bha gar mnyam sbyor las //
analyzed: mtshan dang bha gar mnyam sbyor las //
translated: From the union of the sign and the bhaga,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: and so forth.

original: dur khrod yang na chu bo'i ngogs //
analyzed: dur khrod yang na chu bo'i ngogs //
translated: In a charnel ground, or on the bank of a river,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pas gnas bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pas gnas bstan pa yin no //
translated: and so forth, he teaches the place.

original: rnal 'byor ba'i mtshan nyid gsungs pa /
analyzed: rnal 'byor ba'i mtshan nyid gsungs pa /
translated: He teaches the characteristics of the yogi/nis:

original: ye shes dang ldan pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
analyzed: ye shes dang ldan pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
translated: Endowed with wisdom, and so forth.

original: bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru ka'i sku ye shes kyi phyag rgyas gtor ma byin gyis brlab par bya zhing sbyin pa dang gtang bar bya'o //
analyzed: bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru ka'i sku ye shes kyi phyag rgyas gtor ma byin gyis brlab par bya zhing sbyin pa dang gtang bar bya'o //
translated: One should consecrate the sacrificial cake with the gnosis seal of the body of the Bhagavān Śrī Heruka, and give and offer it.

original: dur khrod dang dbugs dbyung gi gnas //
analyzed: dur khrod dang dbugs dbyung gi gnas //
translated: The charnel ground and the place of exhalation,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la ;
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la ;
translated: and so forth.

original: skye ba gsum pa dum bu brgyad par bya //
analyzed: skye ba gsum pa dum bu brgyad par bya //
translated: The third birth is to be made into eight pieces.

original: dur khrod chen po'i dbus su 'gyel //
analyzed: dur khrod chen po'i dbus su 'gyel //
translated: It falls in the middle of the great charnel ground,🔽and so forth.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sa bstan te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sa bstan te /
translated: The place is taught.

original: gsang ba ni snod dang mi ldan pa rnams kyi spyod yul du mi 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: gsang ba ni snod dang mi ldan pa rnams kyi spyod yul du mi 'gyur ba'o //
translated: Secret means that it is not the domain of those who are not suitable vessels.

original: padma'i bya dgongs ngo zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: padma'i bya dgongs ngo zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The lotus is the intention of the bird.

original: dur khrod gsang ba'i gnas kyi sna la rtsa ba'i nang du'o ;
analyzed: dur khrod gsang ba'i gnas kyi sna la rtsa ba'i nang du'o ;
translated: The nose of the secret place of the charnel ground is inside the root.

original: / de'i dbus ni snying po 'bab pa lan gsum skye ba'i byang chub kyi ro dbugs dang bral ba'i gnas rin po che gtsug gtor nang na /
analyzed: / de'i dbus ni snying po 'bab pa lan gsum skye ba'i byang chub kyi ro dbugs dang bral ba'i gnas rin po che gtsug gtor nang na /
translated: The middle of that is the place of the falling essence, the three-times-born bodhicitta flavor, the place free of breath, inside the precious diadem.

original: de yang mar ngo'i brgyad kyi dus su'i don ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: de yang mar ngo'i brgyad kyi dus su'i don ni 'di yin te /
translated: Moreover, the meaning of the eighth of the waning phase is this.

original: mar ngo'i sgras ni mtshan mo nyid rtog med ma'o //
analyzed: mar ngo'i sgras ni mtshan mo nyid rtog med ma'o //
translated: The word “waning” is understood as the night.

original: brgyad ni 'dab ma brgyad pa'i padma'i lte ba dang gser  du bcas pa'i dus kyi gnas su'o //
analyzed: brgyad ni 'dab ma brgyad pa'i padma'i lte ba dang gser  du bcas pa'i dus kyi gnas su'o //
translated: The “eight” are the center of the eight-petaled lotus, together with the golden ground, the place of time.🔽The meaning of that is as follows:

original: de yi don ni 'di lta ste / sha yi yig 'bru padma dag / ces bya ba la sogs pa la //
analyzed: de yi don ni 'di lta ste / sha yi yig 'bru padma dag / ces bya ba la sogs pa la //
translated: The syllables of the flesh are the lotus, and so on.

original: sgra'i dbye ba dang / gzhug pa ni shuddha padma zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: sgra'i dbye ba dang / gzhug pa ni shuddha padma zhes bya ba la /
translated: The classification of the terms and the introduction are in the term “pure lotus.”

original: 'on yang sngon du bshad pa bzhin du shes par bya ste /
analyzed: 'on yang sngon du bshad pa bzhin du shes par bya ste /
translated: However, it should be understood as explained previously.

original: 'dir padma'i lte ba dang bcas pa'i don gyis 'dab ma brgyad par du ma bu brgyad kyi mtshan nyid dang ldan pa /
analyzed: 'dir padma'i lte ba dang bcas pa'i don gyis 'dab ma brgyad par du ma bu brgyad kyi mtshan nyid dang ldan pa /
translated: Here, the meaning of “together with the center of the lotus” is endowed with the characteristics of the eight daughters of King Brahma, who are the eight petals.

original: de bzhin lan gsum 'bab pa gsum pa'i don dang / de'i 'og tu padma'i snod dum bu gcig pa nyid du ro chen po'i bdud rtsis gang zhing rgyas pa'i don ni //
analyzed: de bzhin lan gsum 'bab pa gsum pa'i don dang / de'i 'og tu padma'i snod dum bu gcig pa nyid du ro chen po'i bdud rtsis gang zhing rgyas pa'i don ni //
translated: Likewise, the meaning of “three times” is that below that, the great taste of the elixir fills and expands the single-piece vessel of the lotus.

original: gtor ma sbyin pa'i gnas dang ldan pa nyid do //
analyzed: gtor ma sbyin pa'i gnas dang ldan pa nyid do //
translated: The meaning of “endowed with the place of giving the bali offering” is

original: des na rang bzhin dga' ba nyams su myong ba las /
analyzed: des na rang bzhin dga' ba nyams su myong ba las /
translated: the experience of natural joy.

original: nyams su myong ba dang bral ba rnyed pas phyag rgya chen po zhes bshad do //
analyzed: nyams su myong ba dang bral ba rnyed pas phyag rgya chen po zhes bshad do //
translated: and is called the Great Seal because it is free from experience.

original: de nyid la chu'i ngogs zhes kyang bshad do //
analyzed: de nyid la chu'i ngogs zhes kyang bshad do //
translated: It is also called the bank of the river.

original: chu yi ngogs ni rin chen kha //🔽zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: chu yi ngogs ni rin chen kha // zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The bank of the river is the jewel mine.

original: byang chub kyi sems chu bo chen po 'bab pa'i ngogs te /
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems chu bo chen po 'bab pa'i ngogs te /
translated: The bank of the river is the bank of the great river of the spirit of enlightenment.

original: rnam par @251b rtog pa bzlog pa'i don bde ba chen po'i chung ngogs dga' ba'i rim gyis rin po che'i gnas su nyams su myong nas yang bde ba chen por gshegs pa la chu po'i ngogs zhes bya'o //
analyzed: rnam par @251b rtog pa bzlog pa'i don bde ba chen po'i chung ngogs dga' ba'i rim gyis rin po che'i gnas su nyams su myong nas yang bde ba chen por gshegs pa la chu po'i ngogs zhes bya'o //
translated: Having experienced the jewel mine of the stage of joy through the stages of joy, which is the meaning of the reversal of conceptual thought, which is the bank of the great river of the spirit of enlightenment, one again enters the great bliss, and this is called the bank of the river.

original: yang na de ni rtog med ma //🔽zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: yang na de ni rtog med ma // zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Or else, it is the nonconceptual.

original: bde ba byang chub kyi sems kyi chu bo'i rgyun mi 'chad par dus rtag tu phra ba'i yang phra ba 'bab pa las /
analyzed: bde ba byang chub kyi sems kyi chu bo'i rgyun mi 'chad par dus rtag tu phra ba'i yang phra ba 'bab pa las /
translated: The nonconceptual is the uninterrupted flow of the river of the spirit of enlightenment, which is bliss.

original: 'on yang skal ba dang mi ldan pa rnams kyis rtogs par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir //
analyzed: 'on yang skal ba dang mi ldan pa rnams kyis rtogs par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir //
translated: But because it is not realized by those who are unfortunate,

original: ye shes dang ldan pas gtor ma sbyin zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: ye shes dang ldan pas gtor ma sbyin zhes gsungs so //
translated: it is said that the offering should be given by one who has knowledge.

original: de bsrung ba yi don du ni //🔽zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de bsrung ba yi don du ni // zhes bya ba ni /
translated: For the sake of protecting that,

original: bde ba'i ye shes rang bzhin dga' ba la glo bur ba'i rnam par rtog pa 'byung ba'i gdon gyi dngos po ste /
analyzed: bde ba'i ye shes rang bzhin dga' ba la glo bur ba'i rnam par rtog pa 'byung ba'i gdon gyi dngos po ste /
translated: The nature of the bliss of gnosis is the essence of the demon of conceptual thoughts that arise.

original: de yang rlung gi dbang gis 'byung ba la /
analyzed: de yang rlung gi dbang gis 'byung ba la /
translated: Moreover, it arises by the power of the vāyu.

original: rang bzhin dga' ba'o srog gi rlung gis bsrung bar bya ste sbyin pa'i don to //
analyzed: rang bzhin dga' ba'o srog gi rlung gis bsrung bar bya ste sbyin pa'i don to //
translated: The nature of the bliss of the life-force vāyu is the meaning of “to be protected.”

original: gtor ma kun du 'bab sbyin no //🔽zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: gtor ma kun du 'bab sbyin no // zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The bali is the gift of the descent of the great bliss of the nature.

original: gtor ma'i rgyu dang / gnas dang / rnal 'byor pa la sogs pa kun gyis rang bzhin dga' chen po'i rgyal po kho na la 'bad par bya /
analyzed: gtor ma'i rgyu dang / gnas dang / rnal 'byor pa la sogs pa kun gyis rang bzhin dga' chen po'i rgyal po kho na la 'bad par bya /
translated: The cause of the bali, the place, the yogin, and so on, all strive in the king of the great bliss of the nature alone.

original: nan tan du bsgrub par bya /
analyzed: nan tan du bsgrub par bya /
translated: One should practice it earnestly.

original: de nyid phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs yang dag pa'i ye shes yin zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgya cher sbyar ro //
analyzed: de nyid phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs yang dag pa'i ye shes yin zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgya cher sbyar ro //
translated: That is the utterly pure gnosis mind of all buddhas of the ten directions.

original: dpal ye shes thig le'i dka' 'grel ;
analyzed: dpal ye shes thig le'i dka' 'grel ;
translated: The Commentary on the Difficult Points of the Śrī-jñānatilaka

original: gsang ba'i de kho na nyid ces bya ba le'u bco lnga pa'i bshad pa'o /
analyzed: gsang ba'i de kho na nyid ces bya ba le'u bco lnga pa'i bshad pa'o /
translated: The Explanation of the Fifteenth Chapter, “The Reality of the Secret”

original: // / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa zhes bya ba las sogs pa la /
analyzed: // / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa zhes bya ba las sogs pa la /
translated: The Blessed One said, In the beginning, the bodhisattva mahāsattva should practice the perfection of generosity.

original: mtshan nyid las skyes zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: mtshan nyid las skyes zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The perfection of generosity is the perfection of generosity that is born from the characteristics.

original: de kho na nyid la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid las chos nyid kyis mtshan nyid skyes pa ste /
analyzed: de kho na nyid la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid las chos nyid kyis mtshan nyid skyes pa ste /
translated: The perfection of generosity that is born from the characteristics of reality and so on is the perfection of generosity that is born from the characteristic of dharmatā.

original: stong pa nyid las stong pa nyid skye ba'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid las stong pa nyid skye ba'o //
translated: Emptiness is born from emptiness.

original: de rang gnyis su med pa'i bde ba chen po nyid yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de rang gnyis su med pa'i bde ba chen po nyid yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Because that is the great bliss of non-dual self,

original: de kho na nyid ces bya'o //
analyzed: de kho na nyid ces bya'o //
translated: it is called reality.

original: de ltar min na mi mthun no //🔽zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de ltar min na mi mthun no // zhes bya ba ni /
translated: If it were not so, it would be incompatible.

original: kun rdzob kyi thabs khyad par can las don dam pa'i de kho na nyid 'byung ba ma yin na /
analyzed: kun rdzob kyi thabs khyad par can las don dam pa'i de kho na nyid 'byung ba ma yin na /
translated: If the ultimate reality did not arise from the special relative method,

original: dris pa dang mthun par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: dris pa dang mthun par mi 'gyur te /
translated: it would not be in accord with the question.

original: sngon bzhin no //
analyzed: sngon bzhin no //
translated: It is as before.

original: ci'i phyir snyam pa la /
analyzed: ci'i phyir snyam pa la /
translated: Why is that?

original: de'i don ni /
analyzed: de'i don ni /
translated: The meaning of that is:

original: rang rig pa yi bdag nyid phyir //🔽zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: rang rig pa yi bdag nyid phyir //🔽zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Because it is the nature of self-awareness.

original: stong pa nyid kyi ye shes tshig dang ye shes las 'das pa rtag tu shar ba'i rang bzhin thams cad du khyab na yang /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyi ye shes tshig dang ye shes las 'das pa rtag tu shar ba'i rang bzhin thams cad du khyab na yang /
translated: The pristine wisdom of emptiness, whose nature is always arising beyond words and pristine wisdom, pervades everything.

original: de skad du yang /
analyzed: de skad du yang /
