translated: The meaning of the name Śrī Jñānatilaka explains the meaning of the six unions: part, bindu, method, mere method, supreme, and supreme of others.

original: gug pa'i rnam pa'i kha ru ni //
analyzed: gug pa'i rnam pa'i kha ru ni //
translated: The mouth is the place of the hook.🔽

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i man ngag ni bla ma brgyud pa'i rim pa bar ma chad pas 'dir bshad pa kha las rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i man ngag ni bla ma brgyud pa'i rim pa bar ma chad pas 'dir bshad pa kha las rtogs par bya'o //
translated: The instruction on the form of the hook, etc., should be understood from the mouth of the guru, who has received the unbroken lineage of gurus.

original: yang don ni 'dir bshad pa cha'i rang bzhin ma skyes ba'i ngo bo spros pa thams cad dang bral ba'i mtshan nyid bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin nyid bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs gnyis su med pa'i ye shes to //
analyzed: yang don ni 'dir bshad pa cha'i rang bzhin ma skyes ba'i ngo bo spros pa thams cad dang bral ba'i mtshan nyid bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin nyid bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs gnyis su med pa'i ye shes to //
translated: The meaning here is the nature of the ultimate, the essence of the unborn, the nature of great bliss, which is free from all elaborations, the gnosis of the nondual accumulation of merit and wisdom.

original: dpal dang cha'i don to //
analyzed: dpal dang cha'i don to //
translated: It is the meaning of the glorious ultimate.

original: de nyid ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid kyi phyir na /
analyzed: de nyid ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid kyi phyir na /
translated: Since that is the nature of the five gnoses,

original: dzny'a n'i sgra'i bshad pa'o //
analyzed: dzny'a n'i sgra'i bshad pa'o //
translated: it is the explanation of the term jñāna.

original: de nyid ni yi ge dang bral ba'i phyir thig le ste /
analyzed: de nyid ni yi ge dang bral ba'i phyir thig le ste /
translated: Since that is free from syllables, it is the bindu,

original: spros pa'i mtshan mas stong pa zlum pa'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: spros pa'i mtshan mas stong pa zlum pa'i rang bzhin no //
translated: the nature of the circle, empty of the signifiers of elaborations.

original: de nyid ni chos kyi dbyings kyi yi ge'i rang bzhin kyi  phyir na dang / gzhan rnam par 'gegs pa'i sgra'i ni na'i yi ge ste /
analyzed: de nyid ni chos kyi dbyings kyi yi ge'i rang bzhin kyi  phyir na dang / gzhan rnam par 'gegs pa'i sgra'i ni na'i yi ge ste /
translated: Since that is the nature of the syllable of the dharmadhātu, and since it is the negation of other, it is the syllable ni.

original: dzny'a na'o // de nyid glo bur ba'i sprin gyi mtshan ma rnams kyis ma gos pa'i phyir bdag nyid nam mkha'i tshul lo //
analyzed: dzny'a na'o // de nyid glo bur ba'i sprin gyi mtshan ma rnams kyis ma gos pa'i phyir bdag nyid nam mkha'i tshul lo //
translated: Since it is not sullied by the signs of adventitious clouds, it is the nature of space.

original: de nyid ni ti la ka'i sgra'i bshad pas de rang du bshad par byas pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid ni ti la ka'i sgra'i bshad pas de rang du bshad par byas pa'o //
translated: It is explained by the word tilaka as that itself.

original: de nyid kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i bden pa gnyis su med pa'i tshul tsam mo //
analyzed: de nyid kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i bden pa gnyis su med pa'i tshul tsam mo //
translated: It is the mere mode of the non-duality of the two truths, the conventional and the ultimate.

original: de nyid ni gzhan rnams kun gyi spyod yul du 'gyur ba ma yin pa'i phyir ni mchog go //
analyzed: de nyid ni gzhan rnams kun gyi spyod yul du 'gyur ba ma yin pa'i phyir ni mchog go //
translated: It is supreme because it is not the domain of experience of others.

original: de nyid ni gsang ba'i gsang ba rmad du byung ba'i rang bzhin mchog tu gsang ba'i don gyi phyir na gzhan mchog tu gsungs te bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin 'di chos thams cad kyi ngo bo mtshan nyid kun spangs pa zhes dgongs ba'o //
analyzed: de nyid ni gsang ba'i gsang ba rmad du byung ba'i rang bzhin mchog tu gsang ba'i don gyi phyir na gzhan mchog tu gsungs te bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin 'di chos thams cad kyi ngo bo mtshan nyid kun spangs pa zhes dgongs ba'o //
translated: It is said to be supreme to others because it is the supreme secret of the secret of secrets, the nature of the supreme secret, which is the nature of great bliss, the essence of all phenomena, free from all characteristics.

original: de skad du yang /
analyzed: de skad du yang /
translated: Thus it is said:

original: bde ba chen po'i ngo bor grags //
analyzed: bde ba chen po'i ngo bor grags //
translated: It is renowned as the nature of great bliss.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: And so forth.

original: dpal ye shes thig le 'di zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: dpal ye shes thig le 'di zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: This is the glorious Essence of Wisdom, etc.

original: 'dir rtsa'i mkha' 'gro ma'i mtshan nyid stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyi gtso bo brgya nyi shu rtsa dgu /
analyzed: 'dir rtsa'i mkha' 'gro ma'i mtshan nyid stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyi gtso bo brgya nyi shu rtsa dgu /
translated: Here, the characteristics of the 72,000 channels are the 129 principal ones.

original: de las kyang sum cu rtsa gnyis rab bo //
analyzed: de las kyang sum cu rtsa gnyis rab bo //
translated: Among them, the 32 are the best.

original: de dag rnams kyi lte ba dang bcas pa'i rtsas dbang sgyur ba yis ni /
analyzed: de dag rnams kyi lte ba dang bcas pa'i rtsas dbang sgyur ba yis ni /
translated: By the power of those channels, together with their centers,

original: 'bras bu'i rang bzhin bcom ldan 'das su 'gyur bar the tshom mi bya'o //
analyzed: 'bras bu'i rang bzhin bcom ldan 'das su 'gyur bar the tshom mi bya'o //
translated: one should have no doubt that the nature of the result is the Bhagavat.

original: de bas na rtsa'i gnas kyi don 'di yin te /
analyzed: de bas na rtsa'i gnas kyi don 'di yin te /
translated: Therefore, this is the meaning of the term “channel”:

original: 'jug pa gnas pa longs spyod yin //🔽zhes bya ba la sogs pa la 'jug pa ni /
analyzed: 'jug pa gnas pa longs spyod yin // zhes bya ba la sogs pa la 'jug pa ni /
translated: The entry, the abiding, and the enjoyment.

original: g-yon gyi phyogs kyi 'dzin ma /
analyzed: g-yon gyi phyogs kyi 'dzin ma /
translated: The entry is the one on the left, the one who holds.

original: de bzhin du rtog med ma dbus su gnas pa'i bdag nyid kyi byed pa dang / @258a * //
analyzed: de bzhin du rtog med ma dbus su gnas pa'i bdag nyid kyi byed pa dang / @258a * //
translated: Similarly, the one in the middle, the one who is nonconceptual, is the one who is the nature of the agent.

original: g-yas kyi phyogs kyi ro can ma 'gro ba'i bdag nyid do //
analyzed: g-yas kyi phyogs kyi ro can ma 'gro ba'i bdag nyid do //
translated: The one on the right, the one who is the enjoyer, is the one who is the nature of the goer.

original: longs spyod mchog gi gnas pa'i rang bzhin mgrin pa'i gnas su //
analyzed: longs spyod mchog gi gnas pa'i rang bzhin mgrin pa'i gnas su //
translated: The one who is the nature of the abiding of the supreme enjoyment is in the throat.

original: dbang dang mi snad ba kha'i gnas su zhes bstan te //
analyzed: dbang dang mi snad ba kha'i gnas su zhes bstan te //
translated: The place is the place of the consecration and the non-appearance.

original: de yang sbyor ba drug la sogs pa'i gnas bgyid pa ni /
analyzed: de yang sbyor ba drug la sogs pa'i gnas bgyid pa ni /
translated: And that is the place of the six unions and so forth.

original: rang bzhin de ni mchog gzhan mchog / ces gsungs so //
analyzed: rang bzhin de ni mchog gzhan mchog / ces gsungs so //
translated: And that nature is the supreme, the other supreme.

original: dpal ye shes thig le'i dka' 'grel gsang ba'i de kho na nyid ces bya ba la bcom brgyad pa'i bshad pa'o /
analyzed: dpal ye shes thig le'i dka' 'grel gsang ba'i de kho na nyid ces bya ba la bcom brgyad pa'i bshad pa'o /
translated: The commentary on the glorious Essence of Pristine Awareness called The Secret Thatness has been explained in eight chapters.

original: // / bla ma'i yon tan tha ma la dngos dang bral //🔽zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: // / bla ma'i yon tan tha ma la dngos dang bral // zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: The guru's qualities are free from the ordinary and the ultimate.

original: 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug la sogs pa'i tha mal par 'dzin pa dang / gzung ba'i skyon spangs te gnyis pos dben pa che ba'i yon tan gyi sku la sogs pa brgyan nas gnas pa can no //
analyzed: 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug la sogs pa'i tha mal par 'dzin pa dang / gzung ba'i skyon spangs te gnyis pos dben pa che ba'i yon tan gyi sku la sogs pa brgyan nas gnas pa can no //
translated: Here, ordinary refers to the apprehension of desire, hatred, ignorance, and so on, and the abandonment of the faults of the apprehended. The ultimate is the body and so on, adorned with the great qualities, isolated from the two.

original: de bzhin du rab kyi dbang rnams kyi thob pa dang ldan pa'i don ni mchog gi dbang bskur ba'i sku yin te /
analyzed: de bzhin du rab kyi dbang rnams kyi thob pa dang ldan pa'i don ni mchog gi dbang bskur ba'i sku yin te /
translated: Similarly, the meaning of possessing the attainment of the supreme initiations is the body of the supreme initiation.

original: nang gi don dang bcas pa bzhi pa mthar thug pa'o //
analyzed: nang gi don dang bcas pa bzhi pa mthar thug pa'o //
translated: The fourth, which has the inner meaning, is the ultimate.

original: thugs rje dang ldan zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don gsungs so //
analyzed: thugs rje dang ldan zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don gsungs so //
translated: The meaning of endowed with compassion and so forth is stated.

original: de yang 'dir bshad par ma zad de /
analyzed: de yang 'dir bshad par ma zad de /
translated: Moreover, this is not only explained here,

original: gzhan las kyang /🔽dbang bskur thob dang de nyid mkhyen //
analyzed: gzhan las kyang / dbang bskur thob dang de nyid mkhyen //
translated: but also in other [texts]:🔽Empowered, knowing reality,

original: ye shes gnyis dang thugs rje che //
analyzed: ye shes gnyis dang thugs rje che //
translated: with the two intuitions and great compassion,

original: rang bzhin bzang dang ser sna med //
analyzed: rang bzhin bzang dang ser sna med //
translated: good nature, and free of avarice,🔽truly great, heroic,🔽filled with the marks of good fortune,

original: yang dag rlabs chen dpa' bo dang ; / skal ldan mtshan gyis gang ba dang // phrag dog yul ni rnam par bral //
analyzed: yang dag rlabs chen dpa' bo dang ; / skal ldan mtshan gyis gang ba dang // phrag dog yul ni rnam par bral //
translated: free from the domain of envy,

original: rtag tu dga' ba'i yid ldan pa //
analyzed: rtag tu dga' ba'i yid ldan pa //
translated: always with a joyful mind,

original: 'dod chags chen po gcig pu'i yid //
analyzed: 'dod chags chen po gcig pu'i yid //
translated: with a mind of great passion alone,

original: sdom pa la sogs mkhyen pa yin //
analyzed: sdom pa la sogs mkhyen pa yin //
translated: knowing the vows and so forth,

original: bla ma de lta bus ni bya //🔽zhes gsungs so //🔽phung po la sogs skye mched khams dang bral //
analyzed: bla ma de lta bus ni bya // zhes gsungs so // phung po la sogs skye mched khams dang bral //
translated: such a guru should be served.

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Free from the aggregates and so forth, the sense bases and elements,

original: lha'i sku dang ye shes las grub pa'i lus su gnas pa'i rang bzhin te /
analyzed: lha'i sku dang ye shes las grub pa'i lus su gnas pa'i rang bzhin te /
translated: the nature of abiding in a body formed from the deity's body and intuition,

original: de yang nam mkha' la 'ja' tshon bzhin zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: de yang nam mkha' la 'ja' tshon bzhin zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa lta bu'o //
translated: like a rainbow in the sky and so forth.

original: slob ma khrims ldan dul ba dad pa can //
analyzed: slob ma khrims ldan dul ba dad pa can //
translated: The disciple is disciplined, faithful, and has the vows.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa bzhin du /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa bzhin du /
translated: And so on.

original: bla ma lnga bcu pa dang ; rgyud la sogs pa gzhan dag las kyang /
analyzed: bla ma lnga bcu pa dang ; rgyud la sogs pa gzhan dag las kyang /
translated: In the Fifty Verses on the Guru and other tantras,

original: rgyas par bshad pas na 'di'i don ni go sla'o //
analyzed: rgyas par bshad pas na 'di'i don ni go sla'o //
translated: it is explained in detail. Therefore, the meaning of this is easy to understand.

original: dpal ye shes thig le'i dka' 'grel gsang ba'i de kho na nyid ces bya ba le'u bcu dgu pa'i bshad pa'o /
analyzed: dpal ye shes thig le'i dka' 'grel gsang ba'i de kho na nyid ces bya ba le'u bcu dgu pa'i bshad pa'o /
translated: This is the explanation of chapter 19 of the commentary on the glorious Wisdom Essence Tantra called the Secret Thatness.

original: // / slob dpon dang slob ma'i mtshan nyid kyi rjes thogs la 'di gsungs pa /
analyzed: // / slob dpon dang slob ma'i mtshan nyid kyi rjes thogs la 'di gsungs pa /
translated: Following the characteristics of the master and disciple, it is stated:

original: @258b de nas gzhan nyon zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sgras gsungs so //
analyzed: @258b de nas gzhan nyon zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sgras gsungs so //
translated: Then listen to something else, and so on.

original: ji ltar rgyud kyi rim pa bzhugs //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: ji ltar rgyud kyi rim pa bzhugs // zhes bya ba la /
translated: How is the sequence of the tantra?

original: de'i rim pa ni 'di nyid kyi 'og nas rgyas par bshad pa'i phyir zhes dgongs so //
analyzed: de'i rim pa ni 'di nyid kyi 'og nas rgyas par bshad pa'i phyir zhes dgongs so //
translated: It is thought that the sequence is explained in detail below.

original: 'o na yang rgyud ni 'brel ba yod pa'i phyir na rgyud do //
analyzed: 'o na yang rgyud ni 'brel ba yod pa'i phyir na rgyud do //
translated: However, since the tantra has a connection, it is a tantra.

original: de yang rgyu'i rgyu dang / 'bras bu dang ; thabs kyi 'bras bu 'brel pa'o //
analyzed: de yang rgyu'i rgyu dang / 'bras bu dang ; thabs kyi 'bras bu 'brel pa'o //
translated: Moreover, it is a connection of the causal cause, the result, and the method result.

original: de yang // rgyud ces bya ba rab 'brel te //
analyzed: de yang // rgyud ces bya ba rab 'brel te //
translated: the tantra is called the supreme connection.

original: de yang rab 'brel rnam gsum yin //
analyzed: de yang rab 'brel rnam gsum yin //
translated: And that is the supreme connection in three ways.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: Thus it is said.

original: rim pa ni rtsa ba'i rgyud la sogs pa'i byung tshul 'di dang gzhan rnams su gsungs pa'i rim pas so //
analyzed: rim pa ni rtsa ba'i rgyud la sogs pa'i byung tshul 'di dang gzhan rnams su gsungs pa'i rim pas so //
translated: The stages are the stages of the origin of the root tantra and so forth, as taught in this and other tantras.

original: gzhan dag na re dpal de kho na nyid bsdus pa la sogs pa'i rim pa'i 'byung tshul zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i rim pa bzhin zer ro //
analyzed: gzhan dag na re dpal de kho na nyid bsdus pa la sogs pa'i rim pa'i 'byung tshul zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i rim pa bzhin zer ro //
translated: Others say that the origin of the stages is according to the stages of the Shri Paramadya and so forth.

original: 'dir bdag gi bla ma'i gzhung ni /
analyzed: 'dir bdag gi bla ma'i gzhung ni /
translated: Here, my guru's text says:

original: 'di'i rim bzhin du dpal bde mchog 'khor lo sdom pa la sogs par yang rim pa bshad pa yod gsungs so //
analyzed: 'di'i rim bzhin du dpal bde mchog 'khor lo sdom pa la sogs par yang rim pa bshad pa yod gsungs so //
translated: In the same stages as this, there are also explanations of the stages in Shri Chakrasamvara and so forth.

original: de'i rim pa ni 'di lta ste /
analyzed: de'i rim pa ni 'di lta ste /
translated: The stages of that are as follows.

original: dpal dang ldan pa'i rigs chen rgyud //
analyzed: dpal dang ldan pa'i rigs chen rgyud //
translated: The glorious great lineage tantra

original: ces bya ba la sogs pa'i rim pas gsungs so //
analyzed: ces bya ba la sogs pa'i rim pas gsungs so //
translated: and so forth, it is said according to the stages.

original: de skad du yang 'di nyid las /
analyzed: de skad du yang 'di nyid las /
translated: And in this very tantra it is said:

original: de ltar rim pa thams cad dul //
analyzed: de ltar rim pa thams cad dul //
translated: Thus all stages are disciplined.

original: lha mo de khros shes par bya /
analyzed: lha mo de khros shes par bya /
translated: The goddess should be known as wrathful.

original: zhes gsungs pa'i phyir /
analyzed: zhes gsungs pa'i phyir /
translated: Thus it is said.

original: zhes dgos pa'o //
analyzed: zhes dgos pa'o //
translated: This is the purpose.

original: sa bon las ni myu gu bzhin ;
analyzed: sa bon las ni myu gu bzhin ;
translated: Like a sprout from a seed,

original: / zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: / zhes bya ba ni /
translated: This is the explanation.

original: phyi rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba brgyad kyi rim pa sa bon dang mya gu la sogs pa'i rim pa 'byung ba'i dpe bstan pa bzhin du /
analyzed: phyi rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba brgyad kyi rim pa sa bon dang mya gu la sogs pa'i rim pa 'byung ba'i dpe bstan pa bzhin du /
translated: Just as the sequence of the eight outer dependent originations arises in the sequence of a seed, sprout, and so on,

original: don ni rtsa ba'i rgyud la sogs pa'i rim pa brgyad po'i 'byung ba'i tshul gyi rgyud do //
analyzed: don ni rtsa ba'i rgyud la sogs pa'i rim pa brgyad po'i 'byung ba'i tshul gyi rgyud do //
translated: the meaning is the way the eight stages of the root tantra, and so on, arise.

original: dpal 'khor lo sdom pa la sogs pa'i rgyud la sogs pa bstan pa rnams ni rgyud kun no //
analyzed: dpal 'khor lo sdom pa la sogs pa'i rgyud la sogs pa bstan pa rnams ni rgyud kun no //
translated: All tantras are the tantras that are explained, such as the Shri Kalachakra, and so on.

original: dpe rten 'brel brgyad kyi rim pa bshad pas //
analyzed: dpe rten 'brel brgyad kyi rim pa bshad pas //
translated: The explanation of the sequence of the eight examples of dependent origination

original: rgyud kun shes par bya ba ni rim pas rigs so zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: rgyud kun shes par bya ba ni rim pas rigs so zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: is the knowledge of all tantras.

original: yang na ye shes 'khor rgyud yin //
analyzed: yang na ye shes 'khor rgyud yin //
translated: Or, the wheel of pristine consciousness is the tantra.

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: This is the explanation.

original: gang gi don gyis dga' ba dang // ye shes kyi rim pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid kho na yang nas yang du bsnan cing rtsa ba dang bshad pa'i rgyud la sogs pa 'dir ni gsal bar ston pas na /
analyzed: gang gi don gyis dga' ba dang // ye shes kyi rim pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid kho na yang nas yang du bsnan cing rtsa ba dang bshad pa'i rgyud la sogs pa 'dir ni gsal bar ston pas na /
translated: The meaning of which is the nature of the non-dual pristine consciousness, which is the meaning of the root and explanatory tantras, and so on, is clearly explained here.

original: ye shes 'khor rgyud do //
analyzed: ye shes 'khor rgyud do //
translated: The tantra is the retinue of pristine consciousness.

original: yang na don gyi rgyud yin no //🔽zhes bya ba ni //
analyzed: yang na don gyi rgyud yin no // zhes bya ba ni //
translated: Or, it is the meaning tantra.

original: gnyis su med pa'i ye shes skye ba med pa'i aa'i rang bzhin nyid don yin @259a * //
analyzed: gnyis su med pa'i ye shes skye ba med pa'i aa'i rang bzhin nyid don yin @259a * //
translated: The meaning is the nature of the non-arising a of nondual pristine consciousness.

original: te ; 'di'i 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid du yang dag par grub pa'i don dang / tshig dang / yi ge la sogs par 'brel pa'i phyir rgyud do //
analyzed: te ; 'di'i 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid du yang dag par grub pa'i don dang / tshig dang / yi ge la sogs par 'brel pa'i phyir rgyud do //
translated: Since the meaning is connected to the words, syllables, and so on, that are the characteristics of the result of that, it is a tantra.

original: yang na thabs dang thabs las byung ba'i phyir 'brel pa'o //
analyzed: yang na thabs dang thabs las byung ba'i phyir 'brel pa'o //
translated: Or, it is a connection because it is the method and the result of the method.

original: de yang 'dir rang nas rgyas par ston pa'i phyir zhes bya bas so //
analyzed: de yang 'dir rang nas rgyas par ston pa'i phyir zhes bya bas so //
translated: Moreover, since it is extensively explained here, it is called “the tantra.”

original: yang na rim pa gnyis ni rgyud //🔽ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: yang na rim pa gnyis ni rgyud // ces bya ba ni /
translated: Or, the two stages are the tantra.

original: bskyed rim dang rdzogs rim 'brel pa'o //
analyzed: bskyed rim dang rdzogs rim 'brel pa'o //
translated: The two stages are connected to the generation stage and the completion stage.

original: de yang bskyed pa'i rim pa la ma brten par ni /
analyzed: de yang bskyed pa'i rim pa la ma brten par ni /
translated: Moreover, without relying on the stage of generation,

original: rdzogs pa'i rim pa mi rnyed do zhes 'brel pa'o //
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i rim pa mi rnyed do zhes 'brel pa'o //
translated: one does not attain the stage of completion.

original: de'i phyir dpal ye shes thig le'i rgyud kyi skabs su bskyed pa'i rim pa sngon du 'gro dgos pa yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir dpal ye shes thig le'i rgyud kyi skabs su bskyed pa'i rim pa sngon du 'gro dgos pa yin te /
translated: Therefore, in the context of the glorious Drop of Wisdom Tantra, the stage of generation must come first.

original: ltos pa'i dbang gis bskyed pa dang / rdzogs pa ste /
analyzed: ltos pa'i dbang gis bskyed pa dang / rdzogs pa ste /
translated: The generation and completion are generated by the power of dependence.

original: bskyed pa ni thabs kyi dngos po'i bdag nyid /
analyzed: bskyed pa ni thabs kyi dngos po'i bdag nyid /
translated: The generation is the nature of the entity of the method.

original: rdzogs pa ni /
analyzed: rdzogs pa ni /
translated: The completion

original: thabs las byung ba'i rang bzhin gyi phyir rgyud do //
analyzed: thabs las byung ba'i rang bzhin gyi phyir rgyud do //
translated: is the nature that arises from the method. Therefore, it is a tantra.

original: gzhan dag ni rgyu dang 'bras bu'i bdag nyid ces kyang zer ro //
analyzed: gzhan dag ni rgyu dang 'bras bu'i bdag nyid ces kyang zer ro //
translated: Others say it is the nature of cause and effect.

original: lha mo gang du skal ldan mo //
analyzed: lha mo gang du skal ldan mo //
translated: The goddess, wherever she is fortunate,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: and so on.

original: shes rab ni /
analyzed: shes rab ni /
translated: Wisdom

original: las kyi phyag rgya la sogs pa'i dbye bas bstan te /
analyzed: las kyi phyag rgya la sogs pa'i dbye bas bstan te /
translated: is taught by the divisions of the karmamudra, and so on.

original: mya ngan las 'das pa'i mtshan nyid can chad pa'i dga' ba dang ldan pa'i gtum mo gzugs kyi 'od kyi rang bzhin ni padma can zhes bya'o //
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa'i mtshan nyid can chad pa'i dga' ba dang ldan pa'i gtum mo gzugs kyi 'od kyi rang bzhin ni padma can zhes bya'o //
translated: The candali that possesses the joy of annihilation, which has the characteristic of nirvana, is the nature of the light of the form of the flame, called the padmini.

original: de ni thabs kyi bdag nyid mgon po dang bcas pa ste /
analyzed: de ni thabs kyi bdag nyid mgon po dang bcas pa ste /
translated: That is the nature of method, along with the protector.

original: dbye bas rang la thabs dang shes rab gnyis dbye ba'i rim pas ni thabs bcom ldan 'das mchog gi gzugs kyis gnas so //
analyzed: dbye bas rang la thabs dang shes rab gnyis dbye ba'i rim pas ni thabs bcom ldan 'das mchog gi gzugs kyis gnas so //
translated: By the division, the division into method and wisdom is the method, abiding in the form of the Bhagavān.

original: phrag pa'i sa ni /
analyzed: phrag pa'i sa ni /
translated: The shoulder is

original: shes rab dang thabs de bzhin du rdo rje dang / padma dang / kun rdzob dang don dam pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don gyis /
analyzed: shes rab dang thabs de bzhin du rdo rje dang / padma dang / kun rdzob dang don dam pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don gyis /
translated: wisdom and method, likewise, the vajra and lotus, the conventional and the ultimate, and so on.

original: rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i thabs dang shes rab kyi sgo nas rang bzhin dga' ba'i bde ba chen po'i rgyal po gnyis kyi bdag nyid gnyis su med pa rten can gyi dngos po la rten dang bral ba'i don btsal bar bya ba 'di ni rgyud ces bya'o //🔽yang na shes rab las byung ba /
analyzed: rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i thabs dang shes rab kyi sgo nas rang bzhin dga' ba'i bde ba chen po'i rgyal po gnyis kyi bdag nyid gnyis su med pa rten can gyi dngos po la rten dang bral ba'i don btsal bar bya ba 'di ni rgyud ces bya'o // yang na shes rab las byung ba /
translated: This is the search for the meaning of freedom from support in the supported entity, the nondual nature of the two kings of great bliss of natural joy by means of the various methods and wisdoms. This is called a tantra.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pas rgyud kyi sgra'i don bshad de /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pas rgyud kyi sgra'i don bshad de /
translated: Or, “arising from wisdom” and so on explain the meaning of the term tantra.

original: tantra'i sgras ni 'di'i don to //
analyzed: tantra'i sgras ni 'di'i don to //
translated: The meaning of the term tantra is this:

original: ye shes ni chad pa'i dga' ba ste /
analyzed: ye shes ni chad pa'i dga' ba ste /
translated: Wisdom is the joy of cessation.

original: chad pa las ni sems can skye ba'i rim pas zla ba dang nyi ma dang / sa bon la sogs pa'i mngon par byang chub pa lnga'i rim pas /
analyzed: chad pa las ni sems can skye ba'i rim pas zla ba dang nyi ma dang / sa bon la sogs pa'i mngon par byang chub pa lnga'i rim pas /
translated: From the cessation of the five lights, the five manifest awakenings of the moon, sun, seed, and so on, arise in the sequence of the birth of sentient beings.

original: shes rab dang / thabs mnyam par sbyor ba las mi snang ba dang / longs @259b spyod dang rang gi snying ga'i padma'i lte ba'i nang du sku mdog dang phyag mtshan la sogs pa'i lha'i rnam par 'byung ba nyid do //
analyzed: shes rab dang / thabs mnyam par sbyor ba las mi snang ba dang / longs @259b spyod dang rang gi snying ga'i padma'i lte ba'i nang du sku mdog dang phyag mtshan la sogs pa'i lha'i rnam par 'byung ba nyid do //
translated: From the union of wisdom and method, the form of the deity arises in the aspect of color, faces and hands, and so on, in the nonappearing and the enjoyment [bodies] and in the center of the lotus of the heart.

original: de yang sam skri ta'i sgra la sogs pa'i don to //
analyzed: de yang sam skri ta'i sgra la sogs pa'i don to //
translated: That is also the meaning of the Sanskrit word samskṛta.

original: dga' ba bzhi'i don gyis ni dri ma med pa'i sgrar gsungs pas ni /
analyzed: dga' ba bzhi'i don gyis ni dri ma med pa'i sgrar gsungs pas ni /
translated: The meaning of the four joys is taught in the word nirmala.

original: a'a nanta'i sgras so //
analyzed: a'a nanta'i sgras so //
translated: The word ananta.

original: yang ni sgra'i dbyi gzhug mi dgos pa ni sngon bshad pa bzhin no //
analyzed: yang ni sgra'i dbyi gzhug mi dgos pa ni sngon bshad pa bzhin no //
translated: The suffix is not necessary, as explained previously.

original: de la ye shes kyi dga' ba chad pa'i dga' ba gsum gyi ye shes kyi bdag nyid dngos po //
analyzed: de la ye shes kyi dga' ba chad pa'i dga' ba gsum gyi ye shes kyi bdag nyid dngos po //
translated: The joy of the gnosis of the three joys of the cessation of the gnosis of joy is the nature of the entity.

original: de las 'byung ba'i rang bzhin dga' ba'i ngo bo rdzogs pa'i gzugs /
analyzed: de las 'byung ba'i rang bzhin dga' ba'i ngo bo rdzogs pa'i gzugs /
translated: The form of the complete nature of joy arises from that.

original: sku gsum gyi rgyu byed pa'i dngos po'am /
analyzed: sku gsum gyi rgyu byed pa'i dngos po'am /
translated: The meaning of the three syllables is explained as follows:

original: yang na sku gsum nyid mi snad ba dang ; longs spyod dang / dbang gi mtshan nyid kyis bshad do //
analyzed: yang na sku gsum nyid mi snad ba dang ; longs spyod dang / dbang gi mtshan nyid kyis bshad do //
translated: The syllable ta is the cause of the three bodies, or else the three bodies themselves, by the characteristics of non-dissipation, enjoyment, and power.

original: de bas na /
analyzed: de bas na /
translated: Therefore,

original: ta yi yig 'bru sku ru grags //
analyzed: ta yi yig 'bru sku ru grags //
translated: The syllable ta is renowned as the body.

original: zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes gsungs so //
translated: Thus it is said.

original: na ni de nyid dri ma med //
analyzed: na ni de nyid dri ma med //
translated: Na is that itself, stainless.

original: ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: ces bya ba ni /
translated: This is saying,

original: rang bzhin dga' ba'i 'bras bu der rang nyid las bde ba chen po'i sku ste /
analyzed: rang bzhin dga' ba'i 'bras bu der rang nyid las bde ba chen po'i sku ste /
translated: The result of natural joy is the body of great bliss from itself.

original: sku gsum gyi bdag nyid gsum po spangs pa'i sku gnyis su med pa'i brjod pa dang bral ba la sogs pa'i don to //
analyzed: sku gsum gyi bdag nyid gsum po spangs pa'i sku gnyis su med pa'i brjod pa dang bral ba la sogs pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning of the three bodies is the three natures, the two bodies free from the third, non-dual, free from expression, and so forth.

original: de ni de la rang la rgyu'i dngos po'i rang bzhin bstan te /
analyzed: de ni de la rang la rgyu'i dngos po'i rang bzhin bstan te /
translated: That is the teaching of the nature of the cause in itself.

original: ta yi yig 'bru khu ba yab //
analyzed: ta yi yig 'bru khu ba yab //
translated: The syllable ta is the semen, the father.

original: ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: And so forth is said.

original: de rnams ni 'brel pa dang ldan pa la sogs pa'i don dang bcas pa'i phyir rgyud do ;
analyzed: de rnams ni 'brel pa dang ldan pa la sogs pa'i don dang bcas pa'i phyir rgyud do ;
translated: Those are the tantra because they have the meaning of being related and so forth.

original: / yang de'i don bshad pa /
analyzed: / yang de'i don bshad pa /
translated: The meaning of that is explained:

original: ta yig dang ni ra yig 'bru //
analyzed: ta yig dang ni ra yig 'bru //
translated: The syllables ta and ra

original: tshul tsam gyis ni gnyis ka ldan //
analyzed: tshul tsam gyis ni gnyis ka ldan //
translated: By the mere manner, both are possessed.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: In this and other [verses],🔽the word aṭ

original: aa ta'i sgras ni rgyud kyi de nas kyi don la sbyor bar byas ba bshad de /
analyzed: aa ta'i sgras ni rgyud kyi de nas kyi don la sbyor bar byas ba bshad de /
translated: is applied to the meaning of 'after that' in the continuum.

original: 'on kyang bsdus te bstan pa /
analyzed: 'on kyang bsdus te bstan pa /
translated: However, the summary explanation is as follows:

original: ta'i yig 'bru ni shes rab kyi ngo bo gzugs rtsa 'dzin ma'i mtshan nyid can chad pa'i dga' ba mya ngan las 'das pa'i phyogs so //
analyzed: ta'i yig 'bru ni shes rab kyi ngo bo gzugs rtsa 'dzin ma'i mtshan nyid can chad pa'i dga' ba mya ngan las 'das pa'i phyogs so //
translated: The syllable ṭa is the nature of wisdom, characterized by the form of the avadhūti nāḍī, the bliss of cessation, the side of nirvāṇa.

original: ra'i yig 'bru ni thabs kyi ngo bo'i gzugs ro ma'i mtshan nyid can mchog gi dga' ba srid pa'i bdag nyid kun rdzob bo //
analyzed: ra'i yig 'bru ni thabs kyi ngo bo'i gzugs ro ma'i mtshan nyid can mchog gi dga' ba srid pa'i bdag nyid kun rdzob bo //
translated: The syllable ra is the nature of method, characterized by the form of the rasanā, supreme bliss, the side of existence, the relative.

original: tshul tsam ni phyogs gnyis pa'i mtshan nyid thams cad 'gegs pa'i phyir tsam mo ;
analyzed: tshul tsam ni phyogs gnyis pa'i mtshan nyid thams cad 'gegs pa'i phyir tsam mo ;
translated: The mere manner is mere because it refutes all characteristics of the two sides.

original: /'o na yang ldan pa'i don gyis ni ye shes rgya che ba dang ye shes kyi phyogs kun dang ldan pa'i rang bzhin bstan pa ste /
analyzed: /'o na yang ldan pa'i don gyis ni ye shes rgya che ba dang ye shes kyi phyogs kun dang ldan pa'i rang bzhin bstan pa ste /
translated: Moreover, the meaning of 'possessed' is the nature of possessing both the vast pristine consciousness and all aspects of pristine consciousness.

original: 'dzin ma dang ro ma la sogs pa'i de rnams dang ldan pa'i mtshan nyid rtog med ma'i rang bzhin dga' ba'i rten can dang / brten pa gnyis su med @260a * //
analyzed: 'dzin ma dang ro ma la sogs pa'i de rnams dang ldan pa'i mtshan nyid rtog med ma'i rang bzhin dga' ba'i rten can dang / brten pa gnyis su med @260a * //
translated: The characteristics of those, such as the lalanā, rasanā, and so on, are the support of the joy that is the nature of nonconceptuality and the supported nonduality.🔽

original: pa'i bde ba chen po dang ldan pa mchog tu gyur pa yang dbang po'i yul ma yin pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don gyis bstan to //
analyzed: pa'i bde ba chen po dang ldan pa mchog tu gyur pa yang dbang po'i yul ma yin pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don gyis bstan to //
translated: The nature of non-conceptual intuition, which is endowed with the characteristics of the channels such as the lalana and rasana, and so on, is the basis of the joys, and the supreme, which is endowed with the great bliss of the non-duality of the basis and the supported, is taught by the meaning of the words not an object of the sense faculties, and so on.🔽Therefore, it is said:

original: de'i phyir / de ni rab mchog aa yig 'bru //
analyzed: de'i phyir / de ni rab mchog aa yig 'bru //
translated: That is the supreme syllable A.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: And so on.

original: de skad du /
analyzed: de skad du /
translated: Thus it is said:

original: snying gi dbus na mi shes pa //
analyzed: snying gi dbus na mi shes pa //
translated: In the center of the heart,

original: gsal zhing mar mi bzhin du 'bar //
analyzed: gsal zhing mar mi bzhin du 'bar //
translated: it shines like a lamp,

original: mi 'gyur mchog tu phra ba ste //
analyzed: mi 'gyur mchog tu phra ba ste //
translated: unmoving, supreme, subtle,

original: yig 'bru dam pa aar zhes bya //
analyzed: yig 'bru dam pa aar zhes bya //
translated: the holy syllable called A.

original: zhes gsungs pa dang / de bzhin du yang /
analyzed: zhes gsungs pa dang / de bzhin du yang /
translated: And likewise:🔽A is the best of all syllables,

original: aa ni yig 'bru kun gyi mchog / don chen yi ge dam pa ste //
analyzed: aa ni yig 'bru kun gyi mchog / don chen yi ge dam pa ste //
translated: the holy syllable of great meaning,

original: khong nas 'byung ba skye ba med //
analyzed: khong nas 'byung ba skye ba med //
translated: arisen from within, unborn,

original: tshig tu brjod pa spangs pa ste //
analyzed: tshig tu brjod pa spangs pa ste //
translated: free from verbal expression.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa'i don gyis /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa'i don gyis /
translated: The meaning of this and so forth is taught.

original: rgyud kyi don la sogs pa bstan te //
analyzed: rgyud kyi don la sogs pa bstan te //
translated: The meaning of the tantra and so forth is taught.

original: ta'i yig 'bru dang / ra gnyis sbrel bas /
analyzed: ta'i yig 'bru dang / ra gnyis sbrel bas /
translated: The two syllables ta and ra are connected.

original: aa'i yig 'brur gyur pa ste /
analyzed: aa'i yig 'brur gyur pa ste /
translated: They become the syllable ai.

original: kun rdzob tsam du don sna tshogs pa'i mtshan nyid tsam gyis skye ba med pa'i rang bzhin gyi don rnyed do //
analyzed: kun rdzob tsam du don sna tshogs pa'i mtshan nyid tsam gyis skye ba med pa'i rang bzhin gyi don rnyed do //
translated: The meaning of the nature of non-arising is found merely by the characteristics of the mere relative, the mere variety of meanings.

original: dpal ye shes thig le'i dka' 'grel gsang ba'i de kho na nyid ces bya ba le'u nyi shu pa'i bshad pa'o /
analyzed: dpal ye shes thig le'i dka' 'grel gsang ba'i de kho na nyid ces bya ba le'u nyi shu pa'i bshad pa'o /
translated: The commentary on the twenty chapters of the Shri-jñana-bindu-panjika-guhya-tattvanama.

original: // / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das mo nyid kyi don zhu bar 'dod pa'i phyir na /
analyzed: // / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das mo nyid kyi don zhu bar 'dod pa'i phyir na /
translated: Then, in order to request the meaning of the Bhagavati,

original: 'dir gsungs pa /
analyzed: 'dir gsungs pa /
translated: it is said here:

original: bcom ldan ye shes thig le lags //
analyzed: bcom ldan ye shes thig le lags //
translated: The Bhagavati is the bindu of wisdom.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: And so forth.

original: zhus pa'i lan gsungs pa ni /
analyzed: zhus pa'i lan gsungs pa ni /
translated: The reply to the request is:

original: ye shes kyis rnyed gsang ba po ;
analyzed: ye shes kyis rnyed gsang ba po ;
translated: The secret finders of wisdom.

original: / zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: / zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: And so forth.

original: ye shes ni me long lta bu'i ye shes la sogs pa lnga pos de rnyed par 'gyur ba'i thab so //
analyzed: ye shes ni me long lta bu'i ye shes la sogs pa lnga pos de rnyed par 'gyur ba'i thab so //
translated: Wisdom is the five such as the mirror-like wisdom. That is found by the finders.

original: gsungs ba ni gnyis su med pa ye shes drug pa'i 'og byed pa'i rang bzhin nyid brjod par mi nus pa dang / snod ma yin pa rnams la mi bstan pa'i phyir gsang ba'o //
analyzed: gsungs ba ni gnyis su med pa ye shes drug pa'i 'og byed pa'i rang bzhin nyid brjod par mi nus pa dang / snod ma yin pa rnams la mi bstan pa'i phyir gsang ba'o //
translated: who are not suitable vessels.🔽Alternatively, here, the appearance, the increase of appearance, the culmi

original: yang na 'dir snang ba dang / snang ba mched pa dang / snang ba thob pa dang / 'od rab kyi ye shes kyis rnyed pa'o //
analyzed: yang na 'dir snang ba dang / snang ba mched pa dang / snang ba thob pa dang / 'od rab kyi ye shes kyis rnyed pa'o //
translated: nation of appearance, and the pristine awareness of the light are attained.

original: snang ba'i rim pas dga' ba rnams kyi ngo bor bshad pa yin te /
analyzed: snang ba'i rim pas dga' ba rnams kyi ngo bor bshad pa yin te /
translated: The stages of appearance are explained as the nature of the joys.🔽As

original: de skad du /
analyzed: de skad du /
translated: is said:

original: snang ba dga' bar bshad pa ste //
analyzed: snang ba dga' bar bshad pa ste //
translated: Appearance is explained as joy.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: And so forth.

original: lha mo ni bcom ldan 'das yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid yin te /
analyzed: lha mo ni bcom ldan 'das yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid yin te /
translated: The goddess is the mother of the transcendent conquerors, the perfection of wisdom,

original: rang bzhin gyi 'od rab de kho na nyid bde ba chen bo kun gyi gnas su 'gyur ba'o //🔽'byung ba ma yin pa ni /
analyzed: rang bzhin gyi 'od rab de kho na nyid bde ba chen bo kun gyi gnas su 'gyur ba'o // 'byung ba ma yin pa ni /
translated: the light of the nature, the reality of great bliss, which becomes the abode of all.🔽Not arising means that the nature of the nondual

original: gnyis su med pa'i bdag nyid kyi rang bzhin ni skye ba dang / 'gag pa dang / bral ba brjod du med pa /
analyzed: gnyis su med pa'i bdag nyid kyi rang bzhin ni skye ba dang / 'gag pa dang / bral ba brjod du med pa /
translated: self is inexpressible, free from arising and ceasing.

original: yi ge dang bral ba dpyad pas @260b mi rnyed pa /🔽mi zad pa /
analyzed: yi ge dang bral ba dpyad pas @260b mi rnyed pa / mi zad pa /
translated: It is equal to space because it is not found by analysis, is not a letter, is inexhaustible,

original: chos thams cad kyis mi gos pa med pa'i phyir nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad kyis mi gos pa med pa'i phyir nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'o //
translated: and is not sullied by any phenomenon.

original: de bas na /
analyzed: de bas na /
translated: Therefore,

original: skye ba nang gi 'pho med rab //
analyzed: skye ba nang gi 'pho med rab //
translated: birth is inner, without transition,

original: ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pas ni /
analyzed: ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pas ni /
translated: and so forth.

original: gang nas kyang ma skyes pa'i don to //
analyzed: gang nas kyang ma skyes pa'i don to //
translated: This means that it does not arise from anywhere.

original: da ni bcom ldan mo'i ngo bo bstan pa /
analyzed: da ni bcom ldan mo'i ngo bo bstan pa /
translated: Now, the essence of the Bhagavatī is explained:

original: rang gi ngo bo ye shes 'od //🔽ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo ye shes 'od // ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: Her own nature is the light of pristine consciousness.

original: bcom ldan 'das dpal ye shes thig le'i yum nyid rang 'od kyi bdag nyid /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das dpal ye shes thig le'i yum nyid rang 'od kyi bdag nyid /
translated: The mother of the glorious Bhagavatī Sphere of Pristine Consciousness is the nature of one’s own light.

original: phyag rgya chen po'i rang nyid ni bde ba chen po'i sku la sogs pa'i dbye bas dbye bar bya ste /
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po'i rang nyid ni bde ba chen po'i sku la sogs pa'i dbye bas dbye bar bya ste /
translated: She is to be differentiated by the divisions of the great seal, the great bliss body, and so on.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: gdul bya'i bsam pa'i dbang gis drang ba dang nges pa'i don gyis rang gi ngo bo dbye ba'o //
analyzed: gdul bya'i bsam pa'i dbang gis drang ba dang nges pa'i don gyis rang gi ngo bo dbye ba'o //
translated: Her own nature is differentiated by the provisional and definitive meanings in accordance with the thoughts of those to be tamed.

original: da ni skyon dang yon tan ston te /
analyzed: da ni skyon dang yon tan ston te /
translated: Now, the faults and qualities are explained:

original: gzhan min bdag dang khyod med na //
analyzed: gzhan min bdag dang khyod med na //
translated: If there is no other, no self, and no you,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: Thus it is said.

original: da ni 'byung ba dang skye ba med pa yin yang gdul bya'i mos pa'i dbang dang / thugs rje'i byin gyi rlabs kyis gshegs pa bstan te /
analyzed: da ni 'byung ba dang skye ba med pa yin yang gdul bya'i mos pa'i dbang dang / thugs rje'i byin gyi rlabs kyis gshegs pa bstan te /
translated: Now, although there is no emergence or birth, the coming is taught by the power of the disciples' devotion and the blessing of compassion.

original: mchog ni nam mkha'i gnas nas byon //
analyzed: mchog ni nam mkha'i gnas nas byon //
translated: The supreme one comes from the abode of space.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: Thus it is said.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das yum phyag rgya chen po dang bcas pa /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das yum phyag rgya chen po dang bcas pa /
translated: The Bhagavān, the nature of all tathāgatas, together with the great mother,

original: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs gnyis dang ldan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs gnyis dang ldan pa'i phyir /
translated: possesses the two accumulations of merit and wisdom.

original: mtha' gnyis la mi gnas pa'i phyir /
analyzed: mtha' gnyis la mi gnas pa'i phyir /
translated: Because he does not abide in the two extremes,

original: don gyi rang bzhin nyid kyi ngo bo las ma 'das par /
analyzed: don gyi rang bzhin nyid kyi ngo bo las ma 'das par /
translated: without transcending the essence that is the nature of reality,

original: gdul bya'i dbang gis sku bzhir snang ba dang / de bzhin du ji ltar 'dul ba'i gzugs kyis bzhugs so //
analyzed: gdul bya'i dbang gis sku bzhir snang ba dang / de bzhin du ji ltar 'dul ba'i gzugs kyis bzhugs so //
translated: he appears as the four bodies for the sake of disciples, and likewise abides in forms that are to be tamed.

original: 'di skad du /
analyzed: 'di skad du /
translated: In this way it is said:

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje yis /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje yis /
translated: By the compassion of the tathāgatas,

original: ji ltar 'dul ba bzhin du snang //
analyzed: ji ltar 'dul ba bzhin du snang //
translated: they appear according to the disciples to be tamed.

original: zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes gsungs so //
translated: Thus it is said.

original: mchog ni bde ba chen po'i mtshan nyid skyon gyis ma gos pa'i chos kyi dbyings nam mkha' sprin la sogs pas gnod par mi 'gyur ba bzhin no //
analyzed: mchog ni bde ba chen po'i mtshan nyid skyon gyis ma gos pa'i chos kyi dbyings nam mkha' sprin la sogs pas gnod par mi 'gyur ba bzhin no //
translated: The supreme is the dharmadhatu, which is characterized by great bliss and is unstained by faults, like the sky that is not harmed by clouds and so forth.

original: kun gyis bsgrub cing thob par bya ba yin pa'i phyir //
analyzed: kun gyis bsgrub cing thob par bya ba yin pa'i phyir //
translated: Because it is to be accomplished and attained by all,

original: gnas de nyid las ma g-yos bzhin du don mdzad pas na byon pa'o //
analyzed: gnas de nyid las ma g-yos bzhin du don mdzad pas na byon pa'o //
translated: it is the arrival, since it performs benefits while not moving from that very place.

original: de yang gzugs kyi sku'i dngos po'i tshul du sa bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa bsam pa rnam par dag pa rnams kyis so //
analyzed: de yang gzugs kyi sku'i dngos po'i tshul du sa bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa bsam pa rnam par dag pa rnams kyis so //
translated: Moreover, it is by those with pure intentions, such as bodhisattvas on the tenth bhumi, in the manner of the entity of the rupakaya.

original: sku gnyis lta ba'i don spyod pa dang 'cham pa bzhin du byis pa so so skye bo la gzigs nas gdul bya'i dbang gis chos ston du gshegs kyang /
analyzed: sku gnyis lta ba'i don spyod pa dang 'cham pa bzhin du byis pa so so skye bo la gzigs nas gdul bya'i dbang gis chos ston du gshegs kyang /
translated: Having seen ordinary beings, like a show of the two kayas, the teacher goes to teach the dharma according to the power of those to be tamed.

original: sku nyid bde ba chen po las mi g-yos par @261a * //🔽bzhugs pa ni /
analyzed: sku nyid bde ba chen po las mi g-yos par @261a * // bzhugs pa ni /
translated: However, the kayas themselves do not move from great bliss.

original: mchog ni nam mkha'i gnas nas gshegs //
analyzed: mchog ni nam mkha'i gnas nas gshegs //
translated: The supreme arrives from the place of the sky.

original: zhes bya'o // bde ba chen po'i sku thams cad kyi rang bzhin yin te /
analyzed: zhes bya'o // bde ba chen po'i sku thams cad kyi rang bzhin yin te /
translated: The nature of the kayas is great bliss.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: phyag rgya chen po'i bde ba 'khor ba ji srid par gnas pa nyid la sogs pa'i bye brag dang ldan pas na /
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po'i bde ba 'khor ba ji srid par gnas pa nyid la sogs pa'i bye brag dang ldan pas na /
translated: Because it is endowed with the distinctions of the bliss of the great seal abiding for as long as cyclic existence lasts, etc.

original: chos kyi sku dang ; longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dang / sprul pa'i sku la sogs pa kun gyi rang bzhin te /
analyzed: chos kyi sku dang ; longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dang / sprul pa'i sku la sogs pa kun gyi rang bzhin te /
translated: It is the nature of all the dharmakāya, the saṃbhogakāya, the nirmāṇakāya, etc.

original: sku de rnams tha mi dad pa mnga' ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sku de rnams tha mi dad pa mnga' ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it possesses those bodies that are not different.🔽Therefore, it is said:

original: de bas na mchog gi nam mkha'i ngal so nas /
analyzed: de bas na mchog gi nam mkha'i ngal so nas /
translated: The supreme sky rests,

original: mchog gi nam mkha'i rtag tu bzhugs //🔽zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: mchog gi nam mkha'i rtag tu bzhugs // zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: the supreme sky always abides.

original: gzhan na re tshig bzhi po bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo la sogs pa bzhi la rim pa bzhin sbyar ro //
analyzed: gzhan na re tshig bzhi po bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo la sogs pa bzhi la rim pa bzhin sbyar ro //
translated: Another says that the four lines are to be applied in order to the four wheels of great bliss, etc.

original: da ni nges pa'i don du bshad de /
analyzed: da ni nges pa'i don du bshad de /
translated: Now it is explained in terms of the definitive meaning.

original: kun rdzob rnam pa'i gzugs kyis ni //
analyzed: kun rdzob rnam pa'i gzugs kyis ni //
translated: By the form of the aspect of the relative,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: etc.

original: bcom ldan 'das dpal ye shes thig le ni shuksha'i rnam pa bde ba chen po'i 'khor lor bzhugs pa'i gzugs so //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das dpal ye shes thig le ni shuksha'i rnam pa bde ba chen po'i 'khor lor bzhugs pa'i gzugs so //
translated: The Bhagavān, the glorious sphere of wisdom, is the form that abides in the wheel of great bliss in the aspect of Śukra.

original: yum phyag rgya chen mo mkha' 'gro ma'i gzugs kyi rnam par rtsa'i khyad par gyi dngos po rtog med ma'i sku ma nor ba thabs nyid la 'khyud pa ni /
analyzed: yum phyag rgya chen mo mkha' 'gro ma'i gzugs kyi rnam par rtsa'i khyad par gyi dngos po rtog med ma'i sku ma nor ba thabs nyid la 'khyud pa ni /
translated: The mother, the Great Seal, in the form of a dakini, is the special channel, the non-conceptual body, embracing the method itself.

original: padma'i skud pa bzhin sku'o //
analyzed: padma'i skud pa bzhin sku'o //
translated: The body is like a lotus fiber.

original: de yang dbus kyi khyad par rtog med ma nyid g-yas dang g-yon du ro ma dang / 'dzin ma de dag gi gnas srog gi dbyug pa'o //
analyzed: de yang dbus kyi khyad par rtog med ma nyid g-yas dang g-yon du ro ma dang / 'dzin ma de dag gi gnas srog gi dbyug pa'o //
translated: Moreover, the special one in the middle, the non-conceptual itself, is to the right and left of the rasanā and lalanā, the locations of those two.

original: gsang ba ni spa bar bya ba'i thabs kyi gsang ba'i rdo rje'i dam tshig med pa la mi bstan pa ni /
analyzed: gsang ba ni spa bar bya ba'i thabs kyi gsang ba'i rdo rje'i dam tshig med pa la mi bstan pa ni /
translated: The secret is the secret commitment of the vajra, the means of arousing, not to be shown to the unworthy.

original: sangs rgyas rin po che ni snod padma 'dab ma brgyad pa'i ge sar dang lte bar bcas pa'i snying po gnas zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: sangs rgyas rin po che ni snod padma 'dab ma brgyad pa'i ge sar dang lte bar bcas pa'i snying po gnas zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The Buddha Jewel is the essence of the heart, the stamen and center of the eight-petaled lotus vessel.

original: mchog gi dga' ba dang / chad pa'i dga' ba'i gnas ma yin pa'i lte ba'i gnas khyad par can no //
analyzed: mchog gi dga' ba dang / chad pa'i dga' ba'i gnas ma yin pa'i lte ba'i gnas khyad par can no //
translated: The supreme joy and the joy of cessation are not the location of the special location of the center.

original: langs nas ni ye shes kyi 'od zer gzugs kyis bzhengs pa'i ngo bo 'di'o //
analyzed: langs nas ni ye shes kyi 'od zer gzugs kyis bzhengs pa'i ngo bo 'di'o //
translated: Arisen means the essence of the form of the light of pristine consciousness.

original: bde ba'i padma zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: bde ba'i padma zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The “lotus of bliss”

original: bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po'i gnas rtog med ma'i lam gyi gnas kyi padma ni thabs dang shes rab gnyis dbyer med par bzhugs pa dang / gshegs pa dang byon pa'i gnas so //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po'i gnas rtog med ma'i lam gyi gnas kyi padma ni thabs dang shes rab gnyis dbyer med par bzhugs pa dang / gshegs pa dang byon pa'i gnas so //
translated: is the abode of the Bhagavān, the place of the path of nonconceptuality, the lotus of the place, which is the indivisibility of method and wisdom, the place of going and coming.

original: thig le khong du chud pa'i phyir //
analyzed: thig le khong du chud pa'i phyir //
translated: Because of the realization of the bindu,

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: means🔽the meaning of the bindu of the light of gnosis is realized by the meaning of the union of the indivisible method and wisdom.

original: thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba'i don gyis ye shes kyi 'od kyi thig le'i don rtogs pa'i rang bzhin spros pa med pa'i gtum mo'i grogs lte ba'i thig @261b les byas pa dang / dbyer med pa'i gzugs su 'gyur te /
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba'i don gyis ye shes kyi 'od kyi thig le'i don rtogs pa'i rang bzhin spros pa med pa'i gtum mo'i grogs lte ba'i thig @261b les byas pa dang / dbyer med pa'i gzugs su 'gyur te /
translated: The form of indivisibility is made by the bindu of the navel, the nature of the nonconceptual caṇḍālī.

original: de yang gshegs so //
analyzed: de yang gshegs so //
translated: Moreover, it goes.

original: gshegs nas brten pa kun ka tshig / ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: gshegs nas brten pa kun ka tshig / ces bya ba ni /
translated: Having gone, all the channels are filled.

original: gyen la gshegs shing 'od 'bar ba'i 'od zer gyis rtsa'i nang gi rnam par rtog pa'i dngos po ji snyed pa de snyed ye shes kyi 'od kyis sbyangs shing bsregs /
analyzed: gyen la gshegs shing 'od 'bar ba'i 'od zer gyis rtsa'i nang gi rnam par rtog pa'i dngos po ji snyed pa de snyed ye shes kyi 'od kyis sbyangs shing bsregs /
translated: The light of the blazing light that goes upward purifies and burns all the conceptual entities in the nāḍīs with the light of gnosis.

original: thal bar 'gyur pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: thal bar 'gyur pa ni ma yin no //
translated: But it does not follow.

original: de'i don ni mi dmigs pa'i rang bzhin du byas pa la ni bsregs shing tshig ces bya'o //
analyzed: de'i don ni mi dmigs pa'i rang bzhin du byas pa la ni bsregs shing tshig ces bya'o //
translated: The meaning of that is: in the nature of non-apprehension, it is said to be burned and consumed.

original: rgyal ba'i thig le khyer nas ni //
analyzed: rgyal ba'i thig le khyer nas ni //
translated: Having taken up the Drop of Victory,

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: this is said.

original: sdig pa thams cad las rgyal ba ni /
analyzed: sdig pa thams cad las rgyal ba ni /
translated: Victory over all evil

original: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi bdag nyid /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi bdag nyid /
translated: is the nature of all the Tathagatas.

original: bcom ldan 'das de nyid kyi gzugs kyis byang chub kyi sems dang ldan par bzhugs nas /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das de nyid kyi gzugs kyis byang chub kyi sems dang ldan par bzhugs nas /
translated: The Blessed One himself, in that form, abiding in the Thought of Enlightenment,

original: spros pa dang bral ba'i rang bzhin du byed pa'i don to //
analyzed: spros pa dang bral ba'i rang bzhin du byed pa'i don to //
translated: has the meaning of making the nature free from conceptual elaboration.

original: yang ni zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: yang ni zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Again,

original: sngar gyi lam nas yang sngon dang mi 'dra bar zhes bstan pa'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: sngar gyi lam nas yang sngon dang mi 'dra bar zhes bstan pa'i tha tshig go //
translated: means that the path of before is again not the same as before.

original: khyod ni bcom ldan 'das ma phyag rgya chen mo nyid de sngar bstan pa dang / phyis 'byung ba dang / da ltar bzhugs pa'i gnas dang 'brel pa'o //
analyzed: khyod ni bcom ldan 'das ma phyag rgya chen mo nyid de sngar bstan pa dang / phyis 'byung ba dang / da ltar bzhugs pa'i gnas dang 'brel pa'o //
translated: You are the Blessed One, the Great Seal herself, connected with the abode of what was taught before, what will occur later, and what is present now.🔽The meaning of “having come here”

original: 'dir byon pa'i don zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: 'dir byon pa'i don zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The phrase “the purpose for which they come here” is explained as follows.🔽

original: lte ba'i rang bzhin dga' ba'i gnas nas gshegs nas yang slar sdud de de rang du byon zhes bya ba'i tshig gi don to //
analyzed: lte ba'i rang bzhin dga' ba'i gnas nas gshegs nas yang slar sdud de de rang du byon zhes bya ba'i tshig gi don to //
translated: Having gone from the place of joy, the nature of the navel, again it is gathered and returns there.

original: de'i gnas ni /
analyzed: de'i gnas ni /
translated: That place is

original: lte ba'i sprul pa'i padma zhes bya ba la sogs pas bstan te /
analyzed: lte ba'i sprul pa'i padma zhes bya ba la sogs pas bstan te /
translated: taught by “the emanation lotus of the navel” and so forth.

original: de nyid du gsal ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de nyid du gsal ba'i phyir /
translated: Since it is clear in just that way,

original: ma bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: ma bshad pa yin no //
translated: it is not explained.

original: de yis ni spros pa med pa'i phyag rgya chen po'i gtum mo ye shes kyi 'od la brten pa ste /
analyzed: de yis ni spros pa med pa'i phyag rgya chen po'i gtum mo ye shes kyi 'od la brten pa ste /
translated: That is the basis of the wisdom light of the nonelaborate mahāmudrā caṇḍālī.

original: dga' ba'i rim pas rang bzhin dga' ba de nyid las spros pa med pa'i rang bzhin dga' ba phyag rgya chen po'i rang bzhin rnyed pa'o ;
analyzed: dga' ba'i rim pas rang bzhin dga' ba de nyid las spros pa med pa'i rang bzhin dga' ba phyag rgya chen po'i rang bzhin rnyed pa'o ;
translated: From the stage of joy, the nature of joy is attained from just that, the nonelaborate nature of joy, the nature of mahāmudrā.

original: / kha cig 'khor lo bzhi'i dbye bas spros pa dang bcas par 'dod /
analyzed: / kha cig 'khor lo bzhi'i dbye bas spros pa dang bcas par 'dod /
translated: Some assert that the elaborations are due to the divisions of the four cakras.

original: kha cig spros pa yod rung med rung /
analyzed: kha cig spros pa yod rung med rung /
translated: Some assert that elaborations are irrelevant.

original: mchog gi nam mkha'i gnas nas byon pa la sogs pa'i tshigs bcad 'dir rang bzhin dga' ba'i gnas gnyis la sbyar te /
analyzed: mchog gi nam mkha'i gnas nas byon pa la sogs pa'i tshigs bcad 'dir rang bzhin dga' ba'i gnas gnyis la sbyar te /
translated: In this verse, “having come from the supreme place of space,” and so on, is applied to the two places of the nature of joy.

original: de yang bde chen gyi gnas dang / sprul pa ru rang bzhin dga' ba skye ba'i dus kyi skabs kyi gnas so zhes zer ro //
analyzed: de yang bde chen gyi gnas dang / sprul pa ru rang bzhin dga' ba skye ba'i dus kyi skabs kyi gnas so zhes zer ro //
translated: Moreover, it is the place of great bliss, and the place of the time of the arising of natural joy in the emanation.

original: kha cig sprul pa'i gnas kho na zhes smra'o //
analyzed: kha cig sprul pa'i gnas kho na zhes smra'o //
translated: Some say it is only the place of emanation.

original: de bzhin kha cig bde ba chen po gcig pur gnas pa dang gshegs pa la sogs pa zer ro //
analyzed: de bzhin kha cig bde ba chen po gcig pur gnas pa dang gshegs pa la sogs pa zer ro //
translated: Likewise, some say it is the abode of great bliss, the going and so forth.

original: tshangs pa'i yul las bye ba mthar //🔽zhes bya ba la sogs pa la byang chub @262a * //
analyzed: tshangs pa'i yul las bye ba mthar // zhes bya ba la sogs pa la byang chub @262a * //
translated: In the realm of Brahma, ten million leagues above.

original: kyi sems bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin gyi spyi bo'i 'khor lo na gnas pa'i phyir dang / sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin can yin pas phyag rgya chen po bcom ldan 'das yum dang / rgyu dang 'bras bu'i rang bzhin du gcig pa'i phyir dang /
analyzed: kyi sems bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin gyi spyi bo'i 'khor lo na gnas pa'i phyir dang / sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin can yin pas phyag rgya chen po bcom ldan 'das yum dang / rgyu dang 'bras bu'i rang bzhin du gcig pa'i phyir dang /
translated: In this way, the bodhicitta, which is of the nature of great bliss, abides in the wheel at the crown, and because all sentient beings possess the nature of the Buddha, the great seal is the Bhagavatī, and because of being the same in terms of cause and effect,

original: rgyas btab pa'i nges pa'i tshig gsungs pa ni /
analyzed: rgyas btab pa'i nges pa'i tshig gsungs pa ni /
translated: the etymology of the seal is stated.

original: de'i phyir phyag rgya chen po khyod grags zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir phyag rgya chen po khyod grags zhes bya'o //
translated: Therefore, you are called the great seal.

original: 'di skad du /
analyzed: 'di skad du /
translated: This is stated.

original: rgyu la 'bras bus rgyas btab cing //
analyzed: rgyu la 'bras bus rgyas btab cing //
translated: The cause is sealed by the result,

original: 'bras bu la yang rgyus rgyas btab //
analyzed: 'bras bu la yang rgyus rgyas btab //
translated: and the result is sealed by the cause.

original: ces gsungs pa dang / sems ni ye shes 'byung ba'i rgyu //
analyzed: ces gsungs pa dang / sems ni ye shes 'byung ba'i rgyu //
translated: And, Mind is the cause of the arising of gnosis.

original: sangs rgyas gzhan du ma tshol cig /
analyzed: sangs rgyas gzhan du ma tshol cig /
translated: Do not search for buddhahood elsewhere.

original: ces gsungs pa dang ; yang na /
analyzed: ces gsungs pa dang ; yang na /
translated: Or,🔽🔽

original: 'jig rten khams ni gang du yang //
analyzed: 'jig rten khams ni gang du yang //
translated: In any world system

original: gzhan nas sangs rgyas rnyed mi 'gyur //
analyzed: gzhan nas sangs rgyas rnyed mi 'gyur //
translated: buddhahood is not found elsewhere.

original: sems ni rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid //
analyzed: sems ni rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid //
translated: Mind is perfect buddhahood itself.

original: gzhan na sangs rgyas bstan du med //🔽ces gsungs so //
analyzed: gzhan na sangs rgyas bstan du med // ces gsungs so //
translated: Buddhahood is not taught elsewhere.

original: dpal ye shes thig le'i dka' 'grel gsang ba'i de kho na nyid ces bya ba le'u nyi shu gcig pa'i bshad pa'o /
analyzed: dpal ye shes thig le'i dka' 'grel gsang ba'i de kho na nyid ces bya ba le'u nyi shu gcig pa'i bshad pa'o /
translated: The commentary on the glorious Essence of Pristine Awareness called The Elucidation of the Secret, the twenty-first chapter.

original: // / sngags kyi don la som nyer gyur pas 'dir zhugs pa ni /
analyzed: // / sngags kyi don la som nyer gyur pas 'dir zhugs pa ni /
translated: Those who have doubts about the meaning of mantra should enter here.

original: gsang ba'i pad snying rgyas byed pa //
analyzed: gsang ba'i pad snying rgyas byed pa //
translated: The one who expands the secret lotus heart,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la rdo rjes dang padma'i sgras bshad pa'i thabs dang shes rab kyi padma 'dab ma dang / lte bar bcas pa'i gsang ba'i thugs yang dag pa'i ye shes kyis 'byed par byed cing rgyas par mdzad pa'i phyir /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la rdo rjes dang padma'i sgras bshad pa'i thabs dang shes rab kyi padma 'dab ma dang / lte bar bcas pa'i gsang ba'i thugs yang dag pa'i ye shes kyis 'byed par byed cing rgyas par mdzad pa'i phyir /
translated: In such passages, the word vajra and the word lotus refer to the method and wisdom that were explained above. Because the secret mind, together with its petals and its center, is opened and expanded by the authentic pristine awareness,

original: gsang ba'i pad snying rgyas byed pa'o //
analyzed: gsang ba'i pad snying rgyas byed pa'o //
translated: it is the expander of the secret lotus heart.

original: ji lta ba'i nyi ma shar ba'i byin gyi rlabs kyis padma'i gzugs kyi rnam par smin pa dang 'brel pa'i dpe brjod pa'i don kyang de bzhin no //
analyzed: ji lta ba'i nyi ma shar ba'i byin gyi rlabs kyis padma'i gzugs kyi rnam par smin pa dang 'brel pa'i dpe brjod pa'i don kyang de bzhin no //
translated: The meaning of the simile, which is related to the form of a lotus, is like the blessing of the rising sun.

original: re zhig ni rim gyis pa'i don yin te /
analyzed: re zhig ni rim gyis pa'i don yin te /
translated: The word now has the meaning of gradually.

original: 'og nas 'byung ba dang 'brel pa'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: 'og nas 'byung ba dang 'brel pa'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: It is a characteristic that is related to what will be explained below.

original: ci'i phyir gsang ba bshad ces bya ba la sogs pa ni /🔽der gnas dang gsang pa'i don bshad pa /
analyzed: ci'i phyir gsang ba bshad ces bya ba la sogs pa ni / der gnas dang gsang pa'i don bshad pa /
translated: Why is the secret explained? and so forth.🔽The meaning of the place and the secret are explained there.

original: 'dir gsang ba'i don gyi mtshan nyid rgyas pa dang gnas kyi don zhus pa'o //
analyzed: 'dir gsang ba'i don gyi mtshan nyid rgyas pa dang gnas kyi don zhus pa'o //
translated: Here, the characteristics of the secret meaning are extensive, and the meaning of the place is requested.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: The Blessed One said, Thus have I heard, etc.

original: 'pho ba dang 'jigs pa la sogs pa dang bral ba'i ri bong can gyi gzugs ni /
analyzed: 'pho ba dang 'jigs pa la sogs pa dang bral ba'i ri bong can gyi gzugs ni /
translated: The form of the rabbit-marked moon, free from passing away, fear, etc.,

original: ga pur dngos po phur dang bral //
analyzed: ga pur dngos po phur dang bral //
translated: is camphor, free from the substance of the spike.

original: zhes bya'o // shes rab kyi skye gnas kyi khyad par de bzhin thabs la yang yin pa'i rang bzhin gnas ni skye gnas yin zhes bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya'o // shes rab kyi skye gnas kyi khyad par de bzhin thabs la yang yin pa'i rang bzhin gnas ni skye gnas yin zhes bya'o //
translated: The special place of origin of wisdom is also the case for method. The nature place is called the place of origin.

original: de dag la @262b brten pa byams pas dga' ba la sogs pa'i 'bras bu'i don 'byung ba bcom ldan mo la gsungs pa ni /
analyzed: de dag la @262b brten pa byams pas dga' ba la sogs pa'i 'bras bu'i don 'byung ba bcom ldan mo la gsungs pa ni /
translated: The result of love, joy, etc., which arises in dependence on them, is taught by the Blessed One to the Blessed Lady:

original: dga' pa sbyin pa mo phyag rgya //
analyzed: dga' pa sbyin pa mo phyag rgya //
translated: The seal of giving joy.

original: zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Thus it is said.

original: de la gsang ba'i don ni rgyu'i rang bzhin 'bras bu dang bcas pa gsum gyi dbye bas rab 'bring dang / tha ma'i don bstan pa yin no ;
analyzed: de la gsang ba'i don ni rgyu'i rang bzhin 'bras bu dang bcas pa gsum gyi dbye bas rab 'bring dang / tha ma'i don bstan pa yin no ;
translated: The secret meaning is the teaching of the meaning of the best, middling, and average by the division of the three natures of the cause along with the result.

original: / bcom ldan mo yum gyis tha mal pa'i 'dod chags dang 'bras bu dang / thabs dang gsum gyi dbye bas rab dang / 'bring dang / tha ma'i don bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: / bcom ldan mo yum gyis tha mal pa'i 'dod chags dang 'bras bu dang / thabs dang gsum gyi dbye bas rab dang / 'bring dang / tha ma'i don bstan pa yin no //
translated: The Bhagavati teaches the meaning of the best, the middling, and the average by the division of ordinary desire, the result, and the method.

original: bcom ldan mo yum gyis tha mal pa'i 'dod chags dang / gos kyis dogs pa'i phyir /
analyzed: bcom ldan mo yum gyis tha mal pa'i 'dod chags dang / gos kyis dogs pa'i phyir /
translated: The Bhagavati, because of the fear of being covered by ordinary desire,

original: bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba'o //
translated: makes a request to the Bhagavat.

original: byang chub sems ni ga pur gzugs //
analyzed: byang chub sems ni ga pur gzugs //
translated: Bodhicitta is the form of camphor.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /🔽kun rdzob kyi byang chub sems gang zag so so'i skye bo thams cad la yod pa'i phyir dang / pho dang mo'i skye gnas kyis phye nas /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la / kun rdzob kyi byang chub sems gang zag so so'i skye bo thams cad la yod pa'i phyir dang / pho dang mo'i skye gnas kyis phye nas /
translated: In this and other passages,🔽because the relative bodhicitta exists in all ordinary individuals, and because the conduct of desire and so on is the same, whether it is divided into male and female birth,

original: 'dod chags la sogs pa'i spyod pa kun byed cing gnas kyang mtshungs pa yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'dod chags la sogs pa'i spyod pa kun byed cing gnas kyang mtshungs pa yin pa'i phyir /
translated: it is practiced and abides.

original: gang zag kun gyi gsang ba'i don nges pa kho nar shes shing khong du chud pa'i don gyis dbang bskur ba'i don dang dam tshig dang / thos pa la sogs pa mi dgos par 'gyur bas na ci zhig bya zhes bya'o //
analyzed: gang zag kun gyi gsang ba'i don nges pa kho nar shes shing khong du chud pa'i don gyis dbang bskur ba'i don dang dam tshig dang / thos pa la sogs pa mi dgos par 'gyur bas na ci zhig bya zhes bya'o //
translated: The meaning of what is the use? is that it is not necessary to know and understand the definite secret meaning of all people, the meaning of empowerment, the commitments, and listening, etc.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa lon kyang ni /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa lon kyang ni /
translated: The Bhagavān said even though and so on.

original: ma rangs pa'i tshig tu rig par bya'o //🔽drang pa'i don gyi tshig gis ldan //
analyzed: ma rangs pa'i tshig tu rig par bya'o // drang pa'i don gyi tshig gis ldan //
translated: It should be understood as a word of displeasure.🔽It is endowed with words of provisional meaning.🔽It is said, The meaning of the Bhagavān's words is not understood by those who are not vessels.

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The meaning of endowed with words of provisional meaning is as follows:

original: byang chub kyi sems ga pur kun rdzob kyi dngos po'i gzugs la yang yon tan yod pa yin pa dang / de bzhin du gnas la yang sbyar bar bya ste /
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems ga pur kun rdzob kyi dngos po'i gzugs la yang yon tan yod pa yin pa dang / de bzhin du gnas la yang sbyar bar bya ste /
translated: The qualities of camphor-like bodhicitta exist in the form of conventional things, and likewise, it should be applied to the abode as well.

original: rten gyi don gyi phyir yang dag nges pa'i don zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: rten gyi don gyi phyir yang dag nges pa'i don zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The meaning of correct and definitive meaning is for the purpose of support.

original: rten kun rdzob kyi gzugs gnas dang / byang chub kyi sems ga pur drang ba'i don gyi tshig la brten nas /
analyzed: rten kun rdzob kyi gzugs gnas dang / byang chub kyi sems ga pur drang ba'i don gyi tshig la brten nas /
translated: The conventional form of the support and the camphor-like bodhicitta of the abode, based on the words of provisional meaning,

original: don dam pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi rang bzhin nges pa'i don yang dag pa'i tshig dang / rten la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid spangs pa /
analyzed: don dam pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi rang bzhin nges pa'i don yang dag pa'i tshig dang / rten la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid spangs pa /
translated: and it is free from the characteristics of a basis and so forth.

original: rten dang rten las rnyed pa de ni /
analyzed: rten dang rten las rnyed pa de ni /
translated: That which is found in the basis and so forth

original: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i bdag nyid do //
analyzed: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i bdag nyid do //
translated: is the nature of cause and effect.

original: de'i phyir rten med na 'bras bu ji ltar rnyed ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: de'i phyir rten med na 'bras bu ji ltar rnyed ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: Therefore, if there is no basis, how can there be an effect?

original: lus kyi dngos med ji ltar 'di ru sems //🔽zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: lus kyi dngos med ji ltar 'di ru sems // zhes bya ba ni /
translated: How can the mind be without a body?

original: dper na lus med par sems gnas pa'i gzhi med pa @263a * //
analyzed: dper na lus med par sems gnas pa'i gzhi med pa @263a * //
translated: For example, just as the mind has no basis for abiding without a body,🔽if there is no form of semen, there is no nature of bliss.

original: bzhin khu ba'i gzugs med na bde ba'i rang bzhin med pa ni bde ba kho na nyid yin no //
analyzed: bzhin khu ba'i gzugs med na bde ba'i rang bzhin med pa ni bde ba kho na nyid yin no //
translated: That is the nature of bliss itself.

original: de skad du /
analyzed: de skad du /
translated: It is said:

original: lus kyi dngos med ci ste bde //
analyzed: lus kyi dngos med ci ste bde //
translated: How can there be bliss without a body?

original: bde ba brjod par yong mi nus //🔽khyab bya khyab byed rang bzhin du //
analyzed: bde ba brjod par yong mi nus // khyab bya khyab byed rang bzhin du //
translated: It is impossible to describe bliss.🔽Beings are pervaded by bliss

original: 'gro ba rnams la bde bas khyab //
analyzed: 'gro ba rnams la bde bas khyab //
translated: as the nature of the pervader and the pervaded.

original: ji ltar me tog la gnas dri /
analyzed: ji ltar me tog la gnas dri /
translated: Just as the scent that resides in a flower

original: me tog dngos med shes mi 'gyur /
analyzed: me tog dngos med shes mi 'gyur /
translated: is not known without the flower,

original: de bzhin gzugs sogs dngos med na //
analyzed: de bzhin gzugs sogs dngos med na //
translated: Likewise, if form and so on are not real,

original: bde ba dmigs su med pa nyid //
analyzed: bde ba dmigs su med pa nyid //
translated: bliss is not perceived.

original: ces gsungs pa dang / yang /🔽khu ba med na bde med 'gyur //
analyzed: ces gsungs pa dang / yang / khu ba med na bde med 'gyur //
translated: And also:🔽Without semen, there is no bliss.

original: bde dang bral na'ang de med 'gyur //
analyzed: bde dang bral na'ang de med 'gyur //
translated: Without bliss, that [semen] does not exist.

original: ltos bcas nus pa med pa'i phyir //
analyzed: ltos bcas nus pa med pa'i phyir //
translated: Because of dependence, it is not possible.

original: lha yi sbyor bas bde ba'o //
analyzed: lha yi sbyor bas bde ba'o //
translated: Bliss is through divine union.

original: zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes gsungs so //
translated: Thus it is said.

original: ji ltar don mthun gsang tshig de ni gsang //
analyzed: ji ltar don mthun gsang tshig de ni gsang //
translated: Just as the secret words of the one with common aims are secret,

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: this is said.

original: lus dang me tog la sogs pa'i bde ba dpe bstan pa rnams dang / de bzhin 'dir mthun par bshad pa'i tshig dang 'brel par don mthun pa 'di ni /
analyzed: lus dang me tog la sogs pa'i bde ba dpe bstan pa rnams dang / de bzhin 'dir mthun par bshad pa'i tshig dang 'brel par don mthun pa 'di ni /
translated: The bliss of the body, flowers, and so on, the examples taught, and likewise, the words explained here in common with that, are related in meaning.

original: rten gyi rgyu'i gsang ba'o / da ni 'bras bu'i gsang ba'i don bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: rten gyi rgyu'i gsang ba'o / da ni 'bras bu'i gsang ba'i don bshad par bya ste /
translated: This is the secret of the causal basis. Now, the meaning of the secret of the result should be explained.

original: drang ba'i don min nges pa'i don yang min //
analyzed: drang ba'i don min nges pa'i don yang min //
translated: It is not the provisional meaning, nor is it the definitive meaning.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: Thus it is said and so forth.

original: da ni thabs dang bcas pa'i gsang ba'i don btsal bar bstan te /
analyzed: da ni thabs dang bcas pa'i gsang ba'i don btsal bar bstan te /
translated: Now, the secret meaning with the method is taught to be sought.

original: yang na mos pa 'bring gi don gyis su //
analyzed: yang na mos pa 'bring gi don gyis su //
translated: Or, it is for the sake of those of middling interest.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: In this way, etc.

original: mchog gi dga' ba zhes bya ba ni dga' ba thams cad kyi mchog tu gyur pa ni /
analyzed: mchog gi dga' ba zhes bya ba ni dga' ba thams cad kyi mchog tu gyur pa ni /
translated: Supreme joy is the supreme of all joys,

original: rang bzhin dga' ba'i ngo bo bzhi pa 'di yin no //
analyzed: rang bzhin dga' ba'i ngo bo bzhi pa 'di yin no //
translated: this fourth nature of innate joy.

original: sbyin pa ni chad pa'i dga' ba'i rgyu'i mtshan nyid kyis bzhi pa'i 'bras bu gzugs su ster ba'i don to //
analyzed: sbyin pa ni chad pa'i dga' ba'i rgyu'i mtshan nyid kyis bzhi pa'i 'bras bu gzugs su ster ba'i don to //
translated: Giving is the characteristic of the cause of the joy of cessation, the meaning of which is the bestowal of the form of the result of the fourth.🔽Therefore,

original: de'i phyir / 'bad pas chad dga' srung bar byed //
analyzed: de'i phyir / 'bad pas chad dga' srung bar byed //
translated: one should protect the joy of cessation with effort.

original: ces bya ba la sogs pa la chad pa'i dga' ba'i gnas su shes rab dang thabs kyi sbyor ba byas pa las /🔽byang chub sems babs pa de rdo rje'i 'khor lor mchog gi dga' bde las 'phos pa nyid 'bad pas te /
analyzed: ces bya ba la sogs pa la chad pa'i dga' ba'i gnas su shes rab dang thabs kyi sbyor ba byas pa las / byang chub sems babs pa de rdo rje'i 'khor lor mchog gi dga' bde las 'phos pa nyid 'bad pas te /
translated: In this way, etc.

original: ye shes kyi rlung 'gugs pa'i srung bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: ye shes kyi rlung 'gugs pa'i srung bar byed pa'o //
translated: The bodhicitta that falls from the application of wisdom and means in the abode of the joy of cessation is the supreme joy of the vajra wheel.🔽One should protect it with effort, that is, by drawing up the gnosis wind.

original: de nyid las rang bzhin dga' ba nyams su myong ba rnyed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nyid las rang bzhin dga' ba nyams su myong ba rnyed par 'gyur ro //
translated: One will attain the experience of innate joy.

original: de'i 'bras bu ni gsang ba'i don te /
analyzed: de'i 'bras bu ni gsang ba'i don te /
translated: Its result is the secret meaning.

original: bzhi pa'i rdo rje'i sku zag pa med pa bde ba dus thams cad par rgya che ba /
analyzed: bzhi pa'i rdo rje'i sku zag pa med pa bde ba dus thams cad par rgya che ba /
translated: The fourth is the vajra body, the inexhaustible bliss, the vastness at all times,

original: spros pa'i mtshan ma mi mnga' ba'i rang bzhin gyi ye shes te /
analyzed: spros pa'i mtshan ma mi mnga' ba'i rang bzhin gyi ye shes te /
translated: the pristine wisdom of the nature that does not have the sign of conceptual elaboration.

original: rab kyi gsang ba zhes bya ba 'bras bu'i don to //
analyzed: rab kyi gsang ba zhes bya ba 'bras bu'i don to //
translated: This is the meaning of the result called “the secret of the best.”

original: gzhan na re chad pa'i dga' @263b ba nas rang bzhin dga' bar 'og tu 'pho ba ste /
analyzed: gzhan na re chad pa'i dga' @263b ba nas rang bzhin dga' bar 'og tu 'pho ba ste /
translated: Another says that the bliss of the cut off is transferred to the natural bliss below.

original: de yang gong ma'i yon tan gyis 'og ma thub pa de las 'bras bu'i don rnyed kyi skye ba ma yin no zhes zer ro //
analyzed: de yang gong ma'i yon tan gyis 'og ma thub pa de las 'bras bu'i don rnyed kyi skye ba ma yin no zhes zer ro //
translated: Moreover, the qualities of the higher one conquer the lower one, and from that the meaning of the result is found, but it is not a birth.

original: nor mdud snying ga yi ni gsang //
analyzed: nor mdud snying ga yi ni gsang //
translated: The knot of wealth is the secret of the heart.
